Aberrant Mind.name: 畸变心智
Aberrant Mind.description:
触手、灵能力量、自星空之外来的恐怖存在——某些人的噩梦是另些人的美好时光。

塔莎

某种外来的影响曾经用它的卷须将你的意识缠绕裹拢，给予了你灵能之力。如今，你能够使用这股力量触碰他人的内心，或是用它操控多元宇宙的魔法能量颠复你周遭的世界。这种力量会从你身上如希望的灯塔一般照耀着旁人吗？抑或是使你成为恐惧之源，使他人得见你怪异的力量，受你的心灵所伤害呢？

作为一名畸变心智术士，你能决定如何获得你的能力。这是你与生俱来的吗？还是后来发生的某件事使你展现出卓越的灵能？参考异常起源表以了解你可能的力量来源。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeAberrantOrig caption=false]

advancement.title: 心灵防御
advancement.hint: 你获得心灵伤害的抗性。

Channel Divinity: Abjure the Extraplanar.name: 引导神力：驱散异域
Channel Divinity: Abjure the Extraplanar.description:
你可以使用你的引导神力惩罚来自异界的存在。以一个动作，你展示你的圣徽，你30尺范围内能够听到你祷言的异怪、天界生物、元素、精类、或邪魔都必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败将受到驱散，持续1分钟。被驱散的生物若受到任何伤害，驱散也将提前结束。

以此方式被驱散的生物必须花费其回合内的所有移动里尽可能的远离你，且无法主动移动到距离你不超过30尺的空间中。至于他们能执行的东西，只能用于执行&Reference[疾走]动作、或花费动作从妨碍其移动的效应中挣脱。当该生物无路可走时，它将执行&Reference[回避]动作。

Foundry Note

此功能包括一个主动效果，用于帮助追踪变形生物。

Turned.name: 驱散
Turned.description:
豁免失败时，该生物会被驱散 1 分钟或直到它受到伤害。

一个被驱散的生物必须花费其回合内的所有移动来试图尽可能远离你，并且它不能在距离你 30 英尺以内的空间内自愿结束移动。对于它的动作，它只能使用疾走动作或尝试挣脱妨碍其移动的效应。如果无路可走，该生物将执行回避动作。

Magic Item Adept.name: 魔法物品熟稔
Magic Item Adept.description:
10级奇械师特性

你对如何使用和制作魔法物品有了深刻的理解：

你最多可以同时同调于四个魔法物品。

你制作一件稀有度为普通或非普通的魔法物品时，所需的时间为通常的四分之一，而且所耗的金钱花费只有通常的一半。

Foundry Note

此特性会自动提升您的同调上限。

Magic Item Adept.name: 魔法物品熟稔
Magic Item Adept.description: 你最多可以同时同调于四个魔法物品。

Alchemist.name: 炼金师
Alchemist.description:
炼金师与女巫的魔法都是源自一个适用于整个多元宇宙的真理凡人无法抗拒带泡泡的东西。

塔莎

炼金师是将奇异的原料混合在一起以产生种种新物质的专家，炼金师的创造物能用来延续生命，也能用来夺走生命。炼金术是最古老的奇械师技艺，它的多功能性在战争与和平时都长期受到重视。

advancement.title: 工具熟练
advancement.hint: 你获得炼金工具的熟练。如果你已经拥有此熟练，作为代替，你能获得另一种工匠工具的熟练。

advancement.title: 炼金专家
advancement.hint: 你获得对强酸和毒素伤害的抗性，并且你免疫中毒状态。

Arcane Propulsion Armor.name: 奥能动力甲
Arcane Propulsion Armor.description:
先决条件：第14级奇械师

物品：一套盔甲（需同调）

这套盔甲的穿戴者获得以下好处：

  • 穿戴者的步行速度增加5尺。

  • 盔甲将附带一对手套，每一只手套在你没有持握物品时皆可被作为一件魔法近战武器持用。穿戴者熟练于这对手套，且每只手套在其命中后会造成 1d8 力场伤害。此手套具有投掷属性，其普通射程为 20 尺，最大射程为 60 尺。投掷时，手套会脱离并飞向攻击的目标，然后立即返回穿戴者身上并重新连接。

  • 除非你自愿，否则此盔甲无法移除。

  • 如果你有肢体缺失，盔甲能够代替你所有缺失的肢体手、臂、脚、腿或类似组件。可以使你如同正常肢体一样使用代替后的它们。

Foundry Note

Enchanting armor with this infusion will grant the Arcane Propulsion Gauntlets and remove them when disenchanted.

Arcane Propulsion Armor.name: 奥能动力甲
Arcane Propulsion Armor.description: 穿戴者的移动速度增加 5 尺。

Arcane Propulsion.name: 奥能动力
Arcane Propulsion.description:
该盔甲穿戴者获得以下好处：

  • 穿戴者的步行速度增加5尺。

  • 该盔甲包含护手，每只护手都是一件魔法近战武器，仅当手部未持握任何物品时方可使用。穿戴者熟练使用该护手，每次命中造成1d8力场伤害，且具有投掷属性（常规射程20尺，最大射程60尺）。投掷时护手会脱离飞向攻击目标，随后立即返回穿戴者并重新附着。

  • 该盔甲无法违背穿戴者意愿被移除。

  • 若穿戴者缺失任何肢体——包括手、臂、足、腿或类似附属部位，盔甲会替代这些肢体，其功能与被替代的身体部位完全相同。

Infiltrator: Lightning Launcher.name: 渗透者：闪电发射器
Infiltrator: Lightning Launcher.description: 你在胸部或覆盖装甲的拳头（根据你的选择）上安装了一个宝石状的节点。它被视为一件简易远程武器，它拥有 90 尺的常规射程和300尺的最大射程，在命中后会造成 1d6闪电伤害。每个你的回合一次，你在通过闪电发射器命中一个生物时，能够额外造成 1d6闪电伤害。

Armor of Magical Strength.name: 魔法力量盔甲
Armor of Magical Strength.description:
物品：一套盔甲（需同调）

此盔甲拥有 6 发充能。穿戴者能以下列方式消耗充能：

  • 当着装者进行力量检定或力量豁免检定时，你能消耗 1 发充能来在那次掷骰上获得等于其智力调整值的加值。

  • 当穿着者被撞击击倒时，它可以用一个反应，消耗 1 发充能避免被撞击倒地。

此盔甲在每天的黎明时会恢复 1d6 发已被消耗的充能。

Foundry Note

This feature is configured as a Reaction. For tracking use of a Strength check/saving throw simply reduce the charges by 1 or use this feature and ignore the chat card.

Armor of Magical Strength.name: 魔法力量盔甲
Armor of Magical Strength.description:
此盔甲拥有 6 发充能。穿戴者能以下列方式消耗充能：

  • 当着装者进行力量检定或力量豁免检定时，你能消耗 1 发充能来在那次掷骰上获得等于其智力调整值的加值。

  • 当穿着者被撞击击倒时，它可以用一个反应，消耗 1 发充能避免被撞击倒地。

此盔甲在每天的黎明时会恢复 1d6 发已被消耗的充能。

changes.name: {} of Magical Strength
changes.system.description.value:
物品：一套盔甲（需同调）

此盔甲拥有 6 发充能。穿戴者能以下列方式消耗充能：

  • 当着装者进行力量检定或力量豁免检定时，你能消耗 1 发充能来在那次掷骰上获得等于其智力调整值的加值 (目前, [[/r @abilities.int.mod]])。

  • 当穿着者被撞击击倒时，它可以用一个反应，消耗 1 发充能避免被撞击倒地。

此盔甲在每天的黎明时会恢复 1d6 发已被消耗的充能。

Foundry Note

该特性被配置为一项反应动作。若将其用于力量检定或豁免检定，只需减少1点充能数。

Armorer.name: 装甲师
Armorer.description:
经典的奇械师逻辑困局：“如果，我们的发明出了那种会爆炸的问题时我们正在里面该怎么办？”

塔莎

对于装甲师专业的奇械师来说，装甲就像是第二层皮肤。这一装甲能够增强奇械师的魔法，释放强力的攻击，产生绝佳的防护。这些奇械师与他们的装甲之间有着强力的纽带，在他们经过实验并改进装甲的魔法性能后，甚至能够合二为一。

advancement.title: 本职工具：护甲
advancement.hint: 你获得重甲的熟练。

advancement.title: 本职工具：工具
advancement.hint: 你获得铁匠工具的熟练，如果你已经熟练于此工具，作为代替，你能获得另一种工匠工具的熟练。

Artificer.name: 奇械师
Artificer.description:
作为奇械师，你获得以下职业特性。

生命值

生命骰：每奇械师等级 1d8
第一级的生命值： 8 + 你的体质调整值
后续升级生命值：第一级之后，每个奇械师等级5（1d8）+你的体质调整值

熟练项

护甲： 轻甲、中甲、盾牌
武器： 简易武器
工具： 盗贼工具、修补工具、以及一种你自选的工匠工具
豁免： 体质、智力
技能： 从奥秘、历史、调查、医药、自然、察觉、巧手中选两项

装备

你带着以下装备开始游戏，此外该角色还可以从其背景项中获得额外的起始装备：

  • 任意两把简易武器
  • 一把轻弩和 20 支弩矢
  • 你可以选择镶钉皮甲或者鳞甲
  • 盗贼工具和地城套装

D&D多元宇宙的各个角落都早已发现火药的秘密。如果你的DM启用《城主指南》中的枪械规则，且你的奇械师已经接触过此类武器的操作方法，那么你的奇械师便也会具有它们的熟练项。

如果你放弃起始装备和你背景提供的装备，你可以使用 5d4 × 10gp 的起始财富来购买你的装备。

奇械师兼职

如果你的团队使用了记述于《玩家手册》的兼职可选规则，以下是你兼职奇械师时需要知晓的内容。

最低属性值 作为一个兼职角色，你必须拥有至少13点的智力属性值才能兼职奇械师。如果你已是一名奇械师，你同样需要拥有至少13点的智力属性值才能兼职其他职业。

获得的熟练项。 若奇械师不是你的初始职业，你在获得第一个奇械师等级时获得以下熟练项：轻甲、中甲、盾牌、盗贼工具、修补工具。

法术位。 奇械师等级的一半（向上取整）将加上其他职业相应的等级来决定你可用的法术位。

advancement.title: 选择注法
advancement.hint: 选择你已知的奇械师注法。每当提升奇械师等级时，可将一个已习得的注法替换为新的。

advancement.title: 工具专精
advancement.hint: 你熟练的所有工具均提升为专精。

Artillerist.name: 魔炮师
Artillerist.description:
有些奇械师总爱追问些煞风景的问题：“这玩意儿造成的附带损害就不能再大点儿吗？"

塔莎

魔炮师是在战场上投射能量、炮弹和爆炸物的专家。这种破坏力在终末战争中受到所有军队的重视。而现在，战争已经结束，这一专业的部分人员开始试图运用自己的力量来消灭科瓦雷中的战争火种，从而建立一个更加和平的世界。看上去不像，但事实上是卡尼斯家族战俑计划关键人物的侏儒奇械师Vi一直都大力宣扬要做正确的事：“现在这个时代，应该致力于修复，而不是把一切都轰下地狱。”

advancement.title: 工具精通
advancement.hint: 你获得木匠工具的熟练。如果你已经拥有此熟练，作为代替，你能获得另一种工匠工具的熟练。

Way of the Astral Self.name: 星我宗
Way of the Astral Self.description:
备忘：去写一个专门用你的背后灵去掐别人喉咙的法术。

塔莎

一个遵循星我宗的武僧相信他们的身体是一种幻觉，他们把气视为他们真实形态的代表，即为星我。星我这个形态，用之以善则正，用之以恶则邪，一些宗派训练学徒使用他们的力量来保护弱者，还有的宗派则教导那些欲追名逐利的学徒在为上位者服务时，能展现他们的真我。

边栏：你的星我形态

星我是武僧精神与灵魂的半透明化身。因此，星我的形态会展现出武僧的背景、理想、牵绊和缺点，而且星我并不一定看起来像武僧一样。例如，一个瘦长的人的星我可能会让人联想到牛头人这代表着武僧内心所感受到的力量；同样，一个兽人武僧可能会表现出丝般嫩滑的手臂和精致的面容这代表着兽人内心深处的温柔。每一个星我都是独一无二的，而这一宗派的武僧们更为人所知的是他们的星我外表，而非他们自己的外表。当你选择这一宗派时，仔细考虑一下能定义你武僧特质的怪癖。他们是否对某种东西充满迷恋？驱使你的动力是正义还是私欲？所有这些特质都可以在你的星我形态上有所体现

Battle Smith.name: 战地匠师
Battle Smith.description:
战地匠师在卡尼斯家族制造战斗构装体和最初的战俑时扮演了关键的角色。在终末战争过后，这些奇械师致力于救助在恐怖的战争中受伤的人。许多运用着近似于创造生命力量的战地匠师将他们的聪明才智用于摸索如何制造技术上无比卓越的小狗小猫。

看来我小看了他们。

塔莎

军队需要保护，但当防卫战失败时，需要有人来进行重整。身为守护者和医生的结合，战地匠师是进行防卫，以及重整工事与人员的专家。战地匠师大多都携带一个由自己制造的防卫性随从——钢铁守卫来辅助自己。无数士兵都曾讲述过关于濒临死亡的自己被一名战地匠师，以及他的钢铁守卫所拯救的故事。

在艾伯伦的奇幻世界中，战地匠师是奇械师的一个重要专业分支，他们与坎尼斯家族的紧密合作，特别是在开发战斗构装体和最初的战俑方面，留下了深刻的印记。在惨烈的终末战争结束后，他们的角色发生了关键转变，从战争的制造者变为生命的守护者和修复者。

advancement.title: 工具精通
advancement.hint: 你获得铁匠工具的熟练。如果你已经拥有此熟练，作为代替，你能获得另一种工匠工具的熟练。

advancement.title: 战斗准备：武器熟练
advancement.hint: 你获得军用武器的熟练。

Path of the Beast.name: 野兽道途
Path of the Beast.description:
我想你最好对他们尊重点，有些人就是喜欢释放内心的野兽出来，一边慢跑散步，一边大喊大叫。

塔莎

踏上野兽道途的野蛮人点燃其灵魂深处熊熊燃烧的兽性火花以激活狂暴。其内心的野兽在嗥叫中被释放，在狂怒中爆发，并改变野蛮人的形态。这些野蛮人可能体内住着一只原初精魂，又或是某个化兽者的后人。请你为自己的野性之力选择一种起源，或在下方的“野兽起源表”随机选择。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeOriginOfTheB classes="caption-top"]

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
你的嘴变成一张野兽的血盆大口或双颚长得巨大（由你选择）。它在击中时造成1d8穿刺伤害。

每个你的回合一次，当你用这一啃咬攻击命中一个生物， 并且你的生命值数值小于一半时，你能恢复等于你的熟练加值点的生命值。

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description: 你的双手变成利爪，它们在你手空闲时可以作为武器使用。它在击中时造成1d6挥砍伤害。此外，当你在自己的回合使用攻击动作进行了爪击，你可以追加执行一次爪击作为该攻击动作的一部分（一回合一次）。

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description:
你长出一条如长鞭般带刺的尾巴，其造成1d8穿刺伤害，具有 &Reference[触及] 属性。

如果一个你可见的、距离你10尺以内的生物发动的攻击击中了你，你可以用反应挥起你的尾巴，骰一个d8并将骰值加在你的AC上，可能导致这次攻击打失。

Blade of Disaster.name: 灾厄之刃
Blade of Disaster.description:
你在法术范围内你能看见的一个未被占据的创造出一把形态如同剑一般的，长约 3 尺的位面裂缝。该剑刃持续存在，直至法术结束。当你施展此法术时，你可以用该剑刃进行至多两次近战法术攻击，每次攻击的目标为位于剑刃5尺内的一个生物、未被携带的物件或建筑。若命中，则目标受到 4d12 力场伤害。该攻击在 d20 投出 18 或更高时造成重击，并在重击时造成额外 8d12 力场伤害（即为合计造成 12d12 力场伤害）。

你可以在自己回合内以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 30 尺到一个你可以看见的未被占据的空间，随后再用其进行两次近战法术攻击。

该剑刃可以无害地通过任何屏障，包括一道 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb]{力场墙}。

Bladesinging.name: 剑咏者
Bladesinging.description:
面对魔法中蕴含的可能性的无尽冲刷，许多法师都会经受身份认同危机。有些法师挺了过来，有些崩溃了，还有一些，成了吟游诗人、还拿起了剑。

塔莎

剑咏者精通一种将剑术与舞蹈相结合的奥法传承。这门传承最初由精灵开创，后来并非精灵的修习者也开始采用，他们信守精灵传统、同时又加以扩展。

在战斗中，剑咏者会使用一系列纷繁优雅的武技，以此偏转攻击并引导魔法化作致命的打击与诡谲的防御。许多目睹过处于战斗之中的剑咏者的人，都会将这伴随歌咏之剑的壮丽舞蹈当作人生中最为美妙的经历之一铭记于心。

advancement.title: 熟练
advancement.hint:
你获得轻甲的熟练项，并获得一把你自选的单手近战武器熟练项。

如果你还没有表演技能熟练的话，你还会获得表演技能的熟练项。

Blessed Warrior.name: 受祝福的勇士
Blessed Warrior.description: 你从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.cuG9d7J9fQH9InYT]{牧师法术列表}中选择两种法术并习得。它们对你来说是圣武士法术，这些戏法的施法属性是魅力。当你提升此职业的等级时，你能够将一个已知戏法替换为牧师法术列表中的另一个戏法。

Blind Fighting.name: 盲斗
Blind Fighting.description: 你拥有&Reference[blindsight]，范围为10尺。在该范围内，即使你处于&Reference[blinded]或{黑暗术 darkness}中，也能有效看见任何未处于&Reference[total-cover]后方的物体。此外，你能看见该范围内的&Reference[invisible]{隐形 invisible}生物，除非该生物成功对你进行了&Reference[hide]{躲藏 Hide}。

Bond of the Talisman.name: 护符牵绊
Bond of the Talisman.description:
先决：第12级魔契师，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePactOfTheTal]{符之魔契} 特性

当除你以外的人佩戴你的护身符时，只要你们存在于同一位面，你可以用一个动作将你传送至它们周围未被占据的空间内。佩戴该护身符的人也能做同样的事，用他们的动作来传送到你身边。该传送能力可使用的次数等于你的熟练加值，且所有已消耗的次数会在你完成一次长休之后完全恢复。

Booming Blade.name: 轰雷剑
Booming Blade.description:
你挥舞作为法术成分的那把武器，对你周围 5 尺范围内的一个生物发动一次近战武器攻击。如果攻击成功命中，目标会受到这次攻击的正常影响，并被包复在爆破性的能量之中，直到你的下回合开始。如果目标在这之前主动移动了 5 尺或更多，法术效应将立刻结束并使其受到 1d8 雷鸣伤害。

此法术的伤害会随你的等级一同提升：到达 5 级后，这次近战攻击将造成额外 1d8 点雷鸣伤害，且目标进行移动时受到的伤害提升为 2d8。两个伤害都会在 11 级后再增加 1d8（2d8 和 3d8），17 级后再加 1d8（3d8 和 4d8）。

Foundry Note

Damage scaling is automatically implemented in this feature. The Damage button covers the booming energy damage and the "Other" formula covers the additional Thunder damage dealt by your weapon.

This feature also includes an optional "Booming Energy" Active Effect for easier tracking. It does not automatically deactivate at the start of your next turn however.

Booming Energy.name: 轰雷能力
Booming Energy.description: 若该生物在施法者的下一回合开始前主动移动 5 尺或更多则其受到 [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]。

Boots of the Winding Path.name: 折返之靴
Boots of the Winding Path.description:
Prerequisite: 6th-level artificer

Item: A pair of boots (requires attunement)

While wearing these boots, a creature can teleport up to 15 feet as a bonus action to an unoccupied space the creature can see. The creature must have occupied that space at some point during the current turn.

Boots of the Winding Path.name: 折返之靴
Boots of the Winding Path.description: While wearing these boots, a creature can teleport up to 15 feet as a bonus action to an unoccupied space the creature can see. The creature must have occupied that space at some point during the current turn.

changes.name: 折返之靴
changes.system.description.value: While wearing these boots, a creature can teleport up to 15 feet as a bonus action to an unoccupied space the creature can see. The creature must have occupied that space at some point during the current turn.

Bottled Respite.name: 瓶中小憩
Bottled Respite.description:
As an action, you can magically vanish and enter your vessel, which remains in the space you left. The interior of the vessel is an extradimensional space in the shape of a 20-foot-radius cylinder, 20 feet high, and resembles your vessel. The interior is appointed with cushions and low tables and is a comfortable temperature. While inside, you can hear the area around your vessel as if you were in its space.

You can remain inside the vessel up to a number of hours equal to twice your proficiency bonus (currently [[@prof * 2]]). You exit the vessel early if you use a bonus action to leave, if you die, or if the vessel is destroyed. When you exit the vessel, you appear in the unoccupied space closest to it. Any objects left in the vessel remain there until carried out, and if the vessel is destroyed, every object stored there harmlessly appears in the unoccupied spaces closest to the vessel’s former space. Once you enter the vessel, you can’t enter again until you finish a long rest.

Canny.name: 精明
Canny.description:
Choose one of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses the chosen skill.

You can also speak, read, and write two additional languages of your choice.

Clockwork Soul.name: 时械之魂
Clockwork Soul.description:
I rarely tell people I speak Modron because, invariably, they just want to learn how to curse, so let’s get this out of the way now.

Lesson one: “beep boop” and other slams.

Tasha

The cosmic force of order has suffused you with magic. That power arises from Mechanus or a realm like it—a plane of existence shaped entirely by clockwork efficiency. You, or someone from your lineage, might have become entangled in the machinations of the modrons, the orderly beings who inhabit Mechanus. Perhaps your ancestor even took part in the Great Modron March. Whatever its origin within you, the power of order can seem strange to others, but for you, it is part of a vast and glorious system.

Cloud Rune.name: 云之符文 Cloud Rune
Cloud Rune.description:
This rune emulates the deceptive magic used by some cloud giants.

While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on [[/check skill=slt]] checks and [[/check skill=dec]] checks.

In addition, when you or a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to invoke the rune and choose a different creature within 30 feet of you, other than the attacker. The chosen creature becomes the target of the attack, using the same roll. This magic can transfer the attack’s effects regardless of the attack’s range. Once you invoke this rune, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

utility.condition: You or a creature you can see within range is hit by an attack

College of Creation.name: 创造学院
College of Creation.description:
One bard’s song of creation is the score to another person’s nightmares.

Tasha

Bards believe the cosmos is a work of art—the creation of the first dragons and gods. That creative work included harmonies that continue to resound through existence today, a power known as the Song of Creation. The bards of the College of Creation draw on that primeval song through dance, music, and poetry, and their teachers share this lesson: “Before the sun and the moon, there was the Song, and its music awoke the first dawn. Its melodies so delighted the stones and trees that some of them gained a voice of their own. And now they sing too. Learn the Song, students, and you too can teach the mountains to sing and dance.”

Dwarves and gnomes often encourage their bards to become students of the Song of Creation. And among dragonborn, the Song of Creation is revered, for legends portray Bahamut and Tiamat—the greatest of dragons—as two of the song’s first singers.

Infiltrator: Dampening Field.name: Infiltrator: Dampening Field
Infiltrator: Dampening Field.description: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on such checks, the advantage and disadvantage cancel each other, as normal.

Guardian: Defensive Field.name: Guardian: Defensive Field
Guardian: Defensive Field.description: As a bonus action, you can gain temporary hit points equal to your level in this class, replacing any temporary hit points you already have. You lose these temporary hit points if you doff the armor. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Dream of the Blue Veil.name: Dream of the Blue Veil
Dream of the Blue Veil.description:
你和射程内至多八个自愿生物在法术{持续时间 duration}内陷入&Reference[unconscious]{昏迷 Unconscious}，并经历{物质位面 Material Plane}上另一个世界的异象，例如欧瑞、托瑞尔、克莱恩或艾伯伦。如果法术达到其完整{持续时间 duration}，异象将以你们每个人遇到并拉开一道神秘蓝色帷幕作为结束。随后法术终止，你们的身心被传送到异象中所见的世界。

要施展此法术，你必须拥有一件源自你希望抵达世界的{魔法物品 Magic Item}，并且你必须知晓该世界的存在，即使你不知道其名称。你在另一个世界的目的地是该{魔法物品 Magic Item}被创造地点1英里范围内的一个安全位置。或者，如果受影响的某个{生物 Creature}出生于另一个世界，你也可以施展此法术，这将使你的目的地成为该{生物 Creature}出生地点1英里范围内的一个安全位置。

若某{生物 Creature}受到任何{伤害 damage}，则法术对其提前终止，且该{生物 Creature}不会被传送。若你受到任何{伤害 damage}，则法术对你和所有其他{生物 Creature}终止，所有{生物 Creature}均不会被传送。

前往其他世界

物质位面承载着无数世界。有些——如欧瑞、托瑞尔、克莱恩和艾伯伦——已被详尽记载，但还有数不尽的其他世界。你和你的伙伴们甚至可能自己创造过一些自制的D&D世界！

过去并非总是如此。不同学者提及一种原初状态，即他们称为"第一世界"的单一现实，它早于我们所知的多元宇宙。栖息在物质位面各世界的许多民族和{怪物 Monsters}都起源于此。在第一世界被一场大灾变粉碎——诞生了随之而来的各个世界——之后，最初的{精灵 elves}、{矮人 Dwarves}、眼魔和其他标志性{生物 Creature}的后裔如同被宇宙之风播撒的种子，在一个又一个世界扎根。若这些伟大先知的沉思属实，那么每个世界都是第一世界的映照——在某些情况下则是扭曲。

这些世界间的穿行虽罕见但并非不可能，可通过多种方式实现。其中一种方法称为"伟大旅程"，这是一段充满危险、遍布需要克服障碍的史诗航行。这种旅程最常发生在由{魔法 Magic}驱动的舰船上。

另一种方法是"异界之梦"；旅者陷入深沉睡眠，在梦境中进入新领域。法术{蓝色面纱之梦 dream of the blue veil}便采用这种穿行方式。

最直接的方法是"跃入异域"；{施法者 spellcaster}施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8aWtP5hcrmcEesBW]{传送法阵 teleportation circle}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.L4J89JXqbKs6puEV]{传送术 Teleport}，旨在出现在另一个世界中已知的传送法阵或其他地点。

无论你使用何种方法抵达世界，由DM判定你是否成功以及若你确实抵达该领域时的具体出现位置。

Druidic Warrior.name: Druidic Warrior
Druidic Warrior.description: 你从@{UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.MWiN7ILEO0Vd3zAZ]{德鲁伊法术列表 druid spell list}}中选择学习两个戏法。它们对你视为游侠法术，且感知是你的这些法术的施法关键属性。每当你在此职业中提升一个等级时，你可以将其中一个戏法替换为德鲁伊法术列表中的另一个戏法。

Eldritch Mind.name: 魔能意志
Eldritch Mind.description: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell.

Boldness Elixir.name: Boldness Elixir
Boldness Elixir.description:
The drinker can roll a [[/r d4]] and add the number rolled to every attack roll and saving throw they make for the next minute.

Foundry Note

This elixir includes an Active Effect for automating the addition of the 1d4 but it does not automatically expire.

Flight Elixir.name: Flight Elixir
Flight Elixir.description:
The drinker gains a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes.

Foundry Note

This elixir includes an Active Effect which grants the flying speed. It does not automatically expire.

Flight Elixir.name: Flight Elixir
Flight Elixir.description: The drinker gains a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes.

Healing Elixir.name: Healing Elixir
Healing Elixir.description: The drinker regains a number of hit points equal to [[/r 2d4 + @abilities.int.mod]].

Resilience Elixir.name: Resilience Elixir
Resilience Elixir.description:
The drinker gains a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes.

Foundry Note

This potion includes an Active Effect which grants the AC bonus.

Resilience Elixir.name: Resilience Elixir
Resilience Elixir.description: The drinker gains a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes.

Swiftness Elixir.name: Swiftness Elixir
Swiftness Elixir.description:
The drinker’s walking speed increases by 10 feet for 1 hour.

Foundry Note

This elixir includes an Active Effect that will increase your walking speed.

Swiftness Elixir.name: Swiftness Elixir
Swiftness Elixir.description: The drinker’s walking speed increases by 10 feet for 1 hour.

Transformation Elixir.name: Transformation Elixir
Transformation Elixir.description: The drinker’s body is transformed as if by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8RTDOt80u8aBv9qx]{alter self} spell. The drinker determines the transformation caused by the spell, the effects of which last for 10 minutes.

College of Eloquence.name: College of Eloquence
College of Eloquence.description:
Note to self: revisit work on a speech-negating spell. Necessity level: ear-bleeding.

Tasha

Adherents of the College of Eloquence master the art of oratory. These bards wield a blend of logic and theatrical wordplay, winning over skeptics and detractors with logical arguments and plucking at heartstrings to appeal to the emotions of audiences.

Enhanced Arcane Focus.name: Enhanced Arcane Focus
Enhanced Arcane Focus.description:
Item: A rod, staff, or wand (requires attunement)

While holding this item, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The increase is not handled automatically. You will need to use the "Enhanced Arcane Focus + 2" enchantment.

Enhanced Arcane Focus.name: Enhanced Arcane Focus
Enhanced Arcane Focus.description:
While holding this item, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack.

The bonus increases to +2 when the caster reach 10th level in their class.

Foundry Note

The increase is not automated and the item will need to be enchanted again.

changes.name: , Enhanced Arcane Focus
changes.system.description.value:
While holding this item, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The infusion will automatically increase at level 10 but it will not automatically update already enchanted Items. Re-enchant the Item to grant the higher bonus.

Enhanced Arcane Focus +2.name: Enhanced Arcane Focus +2
Enhanced Arcane Focus +2.description:
While holding this item, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack.

The bonus increases to +2 when the caster reach 10th level in their class.

Foundry Note

The increase is not automated and the item will need to be enchanted again.

changes.name: , Enhanced Arcane Focus
changes.system.description.value:
While holding this item, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The infusion will automatically increase at level 10 but it will not automatically update already enchanted Items. Re-enchant the Item to grant the higher bonus.

Enhanced Defense.name: Enhanced Defense
Enhanced Defense.description:
Item: A suit of armor or a shield

A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing (armor) or wielding (shield) the infused item.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The increase is not handled automatically. You will need to use the "Enhanced Defense + 2" enchantment.

Enhanced Defense.name: Enhanced Defense
Enhanced Defense.description:
This item is enchanted with the Enhanced Defense infusion.

A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing (armor) or wielding (shield) the infused item.

The bonus increases to +2 when the caster reaches 10th level in their class.

changes.name: , Enhanced Defense
changes.system.description.value:
A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing (armor) or wielding (shield) the infused item.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The infusion will automatically increase at level 10 but it will not automatically update already enchanted Items. Re-enchant the Item to grant the higher bonus.

Enhanced Defense +2.name: Enhanced Defense +2
Enhanced Defense +2.description:
This item is enchanted with the Enhanced Defense infusion.

A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing (armor) or wielding (shield) the infused item.

The bonus increases to +2 when the caster reaches 10th level in their class.

changes.name: , Enhanced Defense
changes.system.description.value:
A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing (armor) or wielding (shield) the infused item.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The infusion will automatically increase at level 10 but it will not automatically update already enchanted Items. Re-enchant the Item to grant the higher bonus.

Enhanced Weapon.name: Enhanced Weapon
Enhanced Weapon.description:
Item: A simple or martial weapon

This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The increase is not handled automatically. You will need to use the "Enhanced Weapon + 2" enchantment.

changes.name: , Enhanced Weapon
changes.system.description.value:
This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The increase is handled automatically by the Active Effect.

changes.name: , Enhanced Weapon
changes.system.description.value:
This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.

The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 10th level in this class.

Foundry Note

The increase is handled automatically by the Active Effect.

Expert.name: Expert
Expert.description:
专家是特定任务或知识领域的大师,偏爱智巧胜过蛮力。它可能是一名斥候,一名乐师,一名图书管理员,一个机灵的街头小子,一个狡猾的商人,或一名窃贼。

要获得专家职业,一个生物必须在其资料卡中拥有至少一种可以说的语言。

随从在升级时会获得以下职业特性,如专家表格中所示。

专家

等级

熟练加值

特性

1环

+2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeExpertBonusP]{额外熟练项 Bonus Proficiencies}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeExpertHelpfu]{乐于助人 Helpful}

2环

+2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeExpertCunnin]{灵巧动作 Cunning Action}

3环

+2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeExpertExpert]{专精 Expertise}

4环

+2

属性值提升

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Saving Throws
advancement.hint: The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: Dexterity, Intelligence, or Charisma.

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Skills
advancement.hint: The sidekick gains proficiency in five skills of your choice.

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Armor
advancement.hint: The sidekick gains proficiency with light armor.

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Weapons
advancement.hint: If the sidekick is a humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block, it also gains proficiency with all simple weapons.

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Tools
advancement.hint: If the sidekick is a humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block, it also gains proficiency with two tools of your choice.

advancement.title: Expertise
advancement.hint: Choose two of the sidekick’s skill proficiencies. The sidekick’s proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check it makes that uses any of the chosen proficiencies.

advancement.title: Expertise
advancement.hint: Choose two of the sidekick’s skill proficiencies. The sidekick’s proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check it makes that uses any of the chosen proficiencies.

advancement.title: Sharp Mind
advancement.hint: The sidekick gains proficiency in one of the following saving throws of your choice: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

Bonus Proficiencies.name: Bonus Proficiencies
Bonus Proficiencies.description:
The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: Dexterity, Intelligence, or Charisma.

In addition, the sidekick gains proficiency in five skills of your choice, and it gains proficiency with light armor. If it is a humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block, it also gains proficiency with all simple weapons and with two tools of your choice.

Coordinated Strike.name: Coordinated Strike
Coordinated Strike.description: The sidekick is adept at fighting in concert with a companion. When the sidekick uses its Helpful feature to aid an ally in attacking a creature, that target can be up to 30 feet away from the sidekick, and the sidekick can deal an extra [[/r 2d6]] damage to it the next time the sidekick hits it with an attack roll before the end of the current turn. The extra damage is the same type of damage dealt by the attack.

Cunning Action.name: Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: The sidekick’s agility or quick thinking allows it to act speedily. On its turn in combat, it can take the &Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage], or &Reference[Hide] action as a bonus action.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: Because of extraordinary good luck, the sidekick is skilled at avoiding danger. When the sidekick is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed. The sidekick doesn’t benefit from this feature while incapacitated.

Expertise.name: Expertise
Expertise.description:
Choose two of the sidekick’s skill proficiencies. The sidekick’s proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check it makes that uses any of the chosen proficiencies.

At 15th level, choose two more of the sidekick’s skill proficiencies to gain this benefit.

Helpful.name: Helpful
Helpful.description: The sidekick is adept at giving well-timed assistance; the sidekick can take the &Reference[Help] action as a bonus action.

Inspiring Help.name: Inspiring Help
Inspiring Help.description:
When the sidekick takes the &Reference[Help] action, the creature who receives the help also gains a [[/r 1d6]] bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

At 20th level, the bonus increases to [[/r 2d6]].

Reliable Talent.name: Reliable Talent
Reliable Talent.description:
The sidekick has refined its skills to an exceptional degree. Whenever the sidekick makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

Foundry Note

This feature enables the Reliable Talent flag which will automate the relevant rolls.

Sharp Mind.name: Sharp Mind
Sharp Mind.description: The sidekick gains proficiency in one of the following saving throws of your choice: &Reference[Intelligence], &Reference[Wisdom], or &Reference[Charisma].

Far Scribe.name: Far Scribe
Far Scribe.description:
先决条件: 5环魔契师, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.MYM908WLZ1lVvA1u]{魔契典籍 Pact of the Tome}特性

你的影之书中出现了一页新书页。在你的允许下,一个生物可以用它的动作在书页上写下它的名字,该书页可以容纳的名字数量等于你的熟练加值(当前: [[lookup @prof]])。

你可以对名字在书页上的生物施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GtGjNjPBgUHxGYAD]{短讯术 sending}法术,无需使用法术位和材料部件。要这么做,你必须在书页上写下讯息。目标会在其脑海中听到讯息,如果目标回复,其回复会出现在书页上,而非你的脑海中。书写内容会在1分钟后消失。

作为一个动作,你可以通过触摸书页来魔法性地擦除上面的一个名字。

Artificer Initiate.name: Artificer Initiate
Artificer Initiate.description:
You’ve learned some of an artificer’s inventiveness:

  • You learn one cantrip of your choice from the artificer spell list, and you learn one 1st-level spell of your choice from that list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

  • You can cast this feat’s 1st-level spell without a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have.

  • You gain proficiency with one type of artisan’s tools of your choice, and you can use that type of tool as a spellcasting focus for any spell you cast that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability.

Chef.name: Chef
Chef.description:
Time spent mastering the culinary arts has paid off, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase your Constitution or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You gain proficiency with @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.Gflnp29aEv5Lc1ZM]{cook’s utensils} if you don’t already have it.

  • As part of a short rest, you can cook special food, provided you have ingredients and cook’s utensils on hand. You can prepare enough of this food for a number of creatures equal to 4 + your proficiency bonus (currently [[lookup @prof]]). At the end of the short rest, any creature who eats the food and spends one or more Hit Dice to regain hit points regains an extra 1d8 hit points.

  • With one hour of work or when you finish a long rest, you can cook a number of treats equal to your proficiency bonus ([[lookup @prof]]). These special treats last 8 hours after being made. A creature can use a bonus action to eat one of those treats to gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

Crusher.name: Crusher
Crusher.description:
You are practiced in the art of crushing your enemies, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals bludgeoning damage, you can move it 5 feet to an unoccupied space, provided the target is no more than one size larger than you.

  • When you score a critical hit that deals bludgeoning damage to a creature, attack rolls against that creature are made with advantage until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an optional Active Effect for tracking crushed enemies but it does not automate the advantage.

Crushed.name: Crushed
Crushed.description: Attack rolls against this creature are made with advantage until the start of the crusher's next turn.

Eldritch Adept.name: Eldritch Adept
Eldritch Adept.description:
{先决条件 Prerequisite}: {施法Spellcasting Spellcasting}或{契约魔法 Pact Magic}{特性 Feature}

通过研习神秘{文化 Lore}，你从{魔契师 Warlock}{职业 Class}中选择一个你所选择的魔能祈唤选项（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-content.JournalEntry.tcoeWarlock00000.JournalEntryPage.SdH3LVzrYgiIDguE]{塔莎的祈唤}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.gqecphEUnz4ktrQ9.JournalEntryPage.nBRkCAhWQOChx5qN]{SRD选项}）。该祈唤的{施法关键属性 spellcasting ability}为{智力 Intelligence}、{感知 Wisdom}或{魅力 Charisma}（选择此{专长 feat}时指定）。如果祈唤有任何类型的先决条件，则你必须是满足该先决条件的{魔契师 Warlock}才能选择该祈唤。

每当你提升一个等级时，你可以将该祈唤替换为{魔契师 Warlock}{职业 Class}的另一个祈唤。

Fey Touched.name: Fey Touched
Fey Touched.description:
你接触妖精荒野的魔法改变了你，赋予你以下效益：

  • 你的智力、感知或魅力属性增加1，最高为20。

  • 你学会@{UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{迷踪步 misty step}法术和你选择的一个1环法术。该1环法术必须来自预言术 divination或附魔系法术学派。你可以不消耗法术位施展这些法术。一旦你以此方式施展了其中任一法术，直到完成一次长休前你都不能再次以此方式施展该法术。你也可以使用你拥有的相应环阶法术位来施展这些法术。这些法术的施法关键属性是由此专长提升的属性。

Foundry 注

此特性包含一个可选附魔，可用于为你选择的法术添加免费限制使用次数。你也可以手动自行添加免费使用次数。

Fighting Initiate.name: Fighting Initiate
Fighting Initiate.description:
先决条件: 熟练于一种军用武器

你的军事训练帮助你发展出一种特定的战斗方式。因此,你从战士职业中选择一个 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoefigFightingS]{战斗风格 Fighting Style}选项。如果你已经拥有一个风格,你选择的必须是不同的。

每当你达到一个授予属性值提升特性的等级时,你可以将此专长的战斗风格替换为另一个你尚未拥有的战士职业战斗风格。

Gunner.name: Gunner
Gunner.description:
你在使用火器时手眼敏锐，获得以下效益：

  • 你的敏捷属性提高1点，最高不超过20。

  • 你获得火器熟练（详见 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-content.JournalEntry.tcoeFirearmRules]{火器 Firearms}）。

  • 你无视火器的装填属性。

  • 身处敌对生物5尺范围内不会使你的远程攻击检定承受劣势。

Metamagic Adept.name: Metamagic Adept
Metamagic Adept.description:
Prerequisite: Spellcasting or Pact Magic feature

You’ve learned how to exert your will on your spells to alter how they function:

  • You learn two @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.9Uh7uTDNZ04oTJsL]{Metamagic} options of your choice from the sorcerer class. You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless the option says otherwise. Whenever you reach a level that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can replace one of these Metamagic options with another one from the sorcerer class.

  • You gain 2 sorcery points to spend on Metamagic (these points are added to any sorcery points you have from another source but can be used only on Metamagic). You regain all spent sorcery points when you finish a long rest.

Piercer.name: 穿刺者
Piercer.description:
You have achieved a penetrating precision in combat, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals piercing damage, you can reroll one of the attack’s damage dice, and you must use the new roll.

  • When you score a critical hit that deals piercing damage to a creature, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the extra piercing damage the target takes.

Poisoner.name: Poisoner
Poisoner.description:
You can prepare and deliver deadly poisons, granting you the following benefits:

  • When you make a damage roll that deals poison damage, it ignores resistance to poison damage.

  • You can apply poison to a weapon or piece of ammunition as a bonus action, instead of an action.

  • You gain proficiency with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.il2GNi8C0DvGLL9P]{poisoner’s kit} if you don’t already have it. With one hour of work using a poisoner’s kit and expending 50 gp worth of materials, you can create a number of doses of potent poison equal to your proficiency bonus. Once applied to a weapon or piece of ammunition, the poison retains its potency for 1 minute or until you hit with the weapon or ammunition. When a creature takes damage from the coated weapon or ammunition, that creature must succeed on a [[/save con 14]] saving throw or take [[/damage 2d8 type=poison]] damage and become &Reference[poisoned] until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Touched.name: Shadow Touched
Shadow Touched.description:
Your exposure to the Shadowfell’s magic has changed you, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]{invisibility} spell and one 1st-level spell of your choice. The 1st-level spell must be from the illusion or necromancy school of magic. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either of these spells in this way, you can’t cast that spell in this way again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells’ spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an optional enchantment which can be used to add the free limited use to the spell of your choice. You can also add the free use yourself manually.

Skill Expert.name: Skill Expert
Skill Expert.description:
You have honed your proficiency with particular skills, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

  • Choose one skill in which you have proficiency. You gain expertise with that skill, which means your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make with it. The skill you choose must be one that isn’t already benefiting from a feature, such as Expertise, that doubles your proficiency bonus.

Foundry Note

Add proficiency to a skill by toggling the "Edit" mode of your character sheet in the top-left and clicking on an empty circle next to your desired skill.

Add expertise to a skill by clicking twice on a filled-in circle.

Slasher.name: Slasher
Slasher.description:
You’ve learned where to cut to have the greatest results, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals slashing damage, you can reduce the speed of the target by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

  • When you score a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, you grievously wound it. Until the start of your next turn, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for decreasing the target's walking speed. It also includes an Active Effect for tracking when you have dealt slashing damage on a critical hit but this functionality is not presently automated.

Slasher.name: Slasher
Slasher.description: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals slashing damage, you can reduce the speed of the target by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

Critical Slashing Damage.name: Critical Slashing Damage
Critical Slashing Damage.description: When you score a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, you grievously wound it. Until the start of your next turn, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls.

Telekinetic.name: Telekinetic
Telekinetic.description:
You learn to move things with your mind, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]{mage hand} cantrip. You can cast it without verbal or somatic components, and you can make the spectral hand invisible. If you already know this spell, its range increases by 30 feet when you cast it. Its spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

  • As a bonus action, you can try to telekinetically shove one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. When you do so, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat) or be moved 5 feet toward you or away from you. A creature can willingly fail this save.

Telepathic.name: Telepathic
Telepathic.description:
You awaken the ability to mentally connect with others, granting you the following benefits:

  • Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see within 60 feet of you. Your telepathic utterances are in a language you know, and the creature understands you only if it knows that language. Your communication doesn’t give the creature the ability to respond to you telepathically.

  • You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]{detect thoughts} spell, requiring no spell slot or components, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it this way again. Your spellcasting ability for the spell is the ability increased by this feat. If you have spell slots of 2nd level or higher, you can cast this spell with them.

utility.condition: One creature you can see within 60 feet

Fey Wanderer.name: Fey Wanderer
Fey Wanderer.description:
Do you think a kilt is a vital part of the fey wandering aesthetic? And if not, why are you so wrong?.

Tasha

A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey, the shining fruit you ate from a talking tree, the magic spring you swam in, or some other auspicious event. However you acquired your fey magic, you are now a Fey Wanderer, a ranger who represents both the mortal and the fey realms. As you wander the multiverse, your joyful laughter brightens the hearts of the downtrodden, and your martial prowess strikes terror in your foes, for great is the mirth of the fey and dreadful is their fury.

Fire Rune.name: Fire Rune
Fire Rune.description:
This rune’s magic channels the masterful craftsmanship of great smiths.

While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses your proficiency with a tool.

In addition, when you hit a creature with an attack using a weapon, you can invoke the rune to summon fiery shackles: the target takes an extra [[/damage 2d6 type=fire]] damage, and it must succeed on a [[/save ability=str]] saving throw or be &Reference[restrained] for 1 minute.

While restrained by the shackles, the target takes [[/damage 2d6 type=fire]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, banishing the shackles on a success. Once you invoke this rune, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

damage.condition: you hit a creature with an attack using a weapon

save.condition: you hit a creature with an attack using a weapon

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description:
• A restrained creature's speed becomes 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed.
  • Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage.
  • The creature has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

Fire Rune.name: Fire Rune
Fire Rune.description: While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses your proficiency with a tool.

Frost Rune.name: Frost Rune
Frost Rune.description:
This rune’s magic evokes the might of those who survive in the wintry wilderness, such as frost giants.

While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on [[/check skill=ani]] checks and [[/check skill=itm]] checks.

In addition, you can invoke the rune as a bonus action to increase your sturdiness. For 10 minutes, you gain a +2 bonus to all ability checks and saving throws that use Strength or Constitution. Once you invoke this rune, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Sturdy.name: Sturdy
Sturdy.description: For 10 minutes, you gain a +2 bonus to all ability checks and saving throws that use Strength or Constitution.

Gathered Swarm.name: Gathered Swarm
Gathered Swarm.description:
@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeSwarmAppeara classes="caption-top"]

Once on each of your turns, you can cause the swarm to assist you in one of the following ways, immediately after you hit a creature with an attack:

  • The attack’s target takes 1d6 piercing damage from the swarm.

  • The attack’s target must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be moved by the swarm up to 15 feet horizontally in a direction of your choice.

  • You are moved by the swarm 5 feet horizontally in a direction of your choice.

save.condition: Once on each of your turns, after hitting with an attack

Arcane Propulsion Gauntlets.name: Arcane Propulsion Gauntlets
Arcane Propulsion Gauntlets.description: The gauntlets included as part of your Arcane Propulsion Armor. Each of which is a magic melee weapon that can be wielded only when the hand is holding nothing. The wearer is proficient with the gauntlets, and each one deals 1d8 force damage on a hit and has the thrown property, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When thrown, the gauntlet detaches and flies at the attack’s target, then immediately returns to the wearer and reattaches.

Genie's Wrath.name: Genie's Wrath
Genie's Wrath.description:
Once during each of your turns when you hit with an attack roll, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to your proficiency bonus. The type of this damage is determined by your patron: [[@prof[bludgeoning]]] (dao), [[@prof[thunder]]] (djinni), [[@prof[fire]]] (efreeti), or [[@prof[cold]]] (marid).

The vessel’s AC equals your spell save DC (currently [[@attributes.spelldc]]). Its hit points equal your warlock level plus your proficiency bonus (currently [[@classes.warlock.system.levels]]), and it is immune to poison and psychic damage.

If the vessel is destroyed or you lose it, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to receive a replacement from your patron. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and the previous vessel is destroyed if it still exists. The vessel vanishes in a flare of elemental power when you die.

Gift of the Protectors.name: Gift of the Protectors
Gift of the Protectors.description:
Prerequisite: 9th-level warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.MYM908WLZ1lVvA1u]{Pact of the Tome} feature

A new page appears in your Book of Shadows. With your permission, a creature can use its action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your proficiency bonus (currently: [[lookup @prof]]).

When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, the creature magically drops to 1 hit point instead. Once this magic is triggered, no creature can benefit from it until you finish a long rest.

As an action, you can magically erase a name on the page by touching it.

Foundry Note

You can track the limited uses with this feature.

Oath of Glory.name: Oath of Glory
Oath of Glory.description:
You. You’re it. You’re the winner of the cosmic fortune lottery. Oh, and you’re going to tell absolutely everyone all about it? Just great.

Tasha

Paladins who take the Oath of Glory believe they and their companions are destined to achieve glory through deeds of heroism. They train diligently and encourage their companions so they’re all ready when destiny calls.

Tenets of Glory

The tenets of the Oath of Glory drive a paladin to attempt heroics that might one day shine in legend.

Actions over Words. Strive to be known by glorious deeds, not words.

Challenges Are but Tests. Face hardships with courage, and encourage your allies to face them with you.

Hone the Body. Like raw stone, your body must be worked so its potential can be realized.

Discipline the Soul. You must marshal the discipline to overcome failings within yourself that threaten to dim the glory of you and your friends.

Green-Flame Blade.name: Green-Flame Blade
Green-Flame Blade.description:
You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a melee attack with it against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and you can cause green fire to leap from the target to a different creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. The second creature takes fire damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

This spell’s damage increases when you reach certain levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target on a hit, and the fire damage to the second creature increases to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by 1d8 at 11th level (2d8 and 2d8) and 17th level (3d8 and 3d8).

Foundry Note

Damage scaling is automatically implemented in this feature. The Damage button covers the fire damage that jumps to the other creature and the "Other" formula covers the additional Fire damage dealt by your weapon.

Helm of Awareness.name: Helm of Awareness
Helm of Awareness.description:
先决条件：10级 artificer

物品：头盔（需要调谐）

佩戴此头盔时，生物在先攻检定中具有优势。此外，只要佩戴者未陷入&Reference[incapacitated]{失能 incapacitated}状态，就不会被&Reference[surprise]{突袭 surprise}。

changes.name: , of Awareness
changes.system.description.value: 佩戴此头盔时，生物在先攻检定中具有优势。此外，只要佩戴者未陷入&Reference[incapacitated]{失能 incapacitated}状态，便不会遭受&Reference[surprise]{突袭 Surprise}。

6CgoZ0ex6qMlptDg.name: Helm of Awareness
6CgoZ0ex6qMlptDg.description: The creature attuned to and wearing this helmet can not be &Reference[surprised] provided it isn't &Reference[incapacitated].

Hill Rune.name: Hill Rune
Hill Rune.description:
此符文魔法赋予的坚韧令人联想到山丘巨人。

当你佩戴或携带一个刻有此符文的物件时，你在对抗 &Reference[poisoned] 的豁免上具有优势，并且你对毒素伤害具有 &Reference[damageresistance]{抗性 resistance}。

此外，你可以以一个附赠动作引动符文，获得对钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性，持续1分钟。一旦你引动了此符文，直至你完成一次短休或长休前，你都无法再次引动它。

Resilience.name: Resilience
Resilience.description: 你在1分钟内获得对钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的&Reference[damageresistance]{抗性 resistance}。

Homing Strikes.name: Homing Strikes
Homing Strikes.description:
If you make an attack roll with your Psychic Blades and miss the target, you can roll one Psionic Energy die ([[/r @scale.soulknife.die]]) and add the number rolled to the attack roll. If this causes the attack to hit, you expend the Psionic Energy die.

Foundry Note

Using this feature can automatically consume one use of your Psionic die.

utility.condition: Missed an attack  with psionic blades

Homunculus Servant.name: Homunculus Servant
Homunculus Servant.description:
物品：价值至少100 gp的宝石或水晶

你学会用魔法创造特殊造妖仆从的复杂方法，该仆从会为你服务。你注入的物品作为该生物的心脏，其身体会瞬间围绕心脏形成。

你决定造妖的外观。有些奇械师偏好机械外观的鸟类，而有些则喜欢带翼的瓶子或微型活化的坩埚。

造妖对你和你的同伴保持友好，并服从你的命令。关于该生物的游戏数据，请参阅造妖仆从资料卡，其中多处使用了你的熟练加值(PB)。

战斗中，造妖共享你的先攻值，但在你的回合结束后立即行动。它可以自主移动和使用反应，但在其回合内唯一能执行的动作是回避动作，除非你在自己的回合使用附赠动作命令它执行另一个动作。该动作可以是其资料卡中的动作或其他动作。若你处于&Reference[incapacitated]{失能 incapacitated}状态，造妖可以执行它选择的任何动作，而不仅是回避。

若对造妖施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL]{修复术 mending}法术，它将恢复2d6生命值。如果你或造妖死亡，它会消失，仅留下其心脏在原空间。

Foundry 注

此注能已整合为召唤功能，无需应用于宝石或水晶，但使用时仍需材料部件（未自动化）。请通过增加注能物品特性的使用次数来追踪造妖仆从的注能。

Channel Divinity: Inspiring Smite.name: Channel Divinity: Inspiring Smite
Channel Divinity: Inspiring Smite.description: Immediately after you deal damage to a creature with your Divine Smite feature, you can use your Channel Divinity as a bonus action and distribute temporary hit points to creatures of your choice within 30 feet of you, which can include you. The total number of temporary hit points equals 2d8 + your level in this class, divided among the chosen creatures however you like.

heal.condition: Immediately after you deal damage to a creature with your Divine Smite feature

Intellect Fortress.name: Intellect Fortress
Intellect Fortress.description:
For the duration, you or one willing creature you can see within range has resistance to psychic damage, as well as advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

Maximum targets for level [[lookup @item.level]]: [[max(1, @item.level - 2)]]

Fortified Intellect.name: Fortified Intellect
Fortified Intellect.description: You have resistance to psychic damage, as well as advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

Interception.name: Interception
Interception.description: When a creature you can see hits a target, other than you, within 5 feet of you with an attack, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage the target takes by 1d10 + your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 0 damage). You must be wielding a shield or a simple or martial weapon to use this reaction.

check.condition: A creature you can see hits a target within range

utility.condition: A creature you can see hits a target within range

Investment of the Chain Master.name: Investment of the Chain Master
Investment of the Chain Master.description:
先决条件: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.Ic1CSjvbWKudVUv9]{链之契约 Pact of the Chain}特性

当你施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JGT5bNqu9REL7Fuz]{获得魔宠 find familiar}时，你会将一部分的异界力量注入被召唤的魔宠，赋予该生物以下效益：

  • 魔宠获得40尺飞行速度或游泳速度（由你选择）。

  • 你可以用一个附赠动作命令魔宠执行攻击动作。

  • 为克服对非魔法攻击的免疫和抗性，魔宠的武器攻击被视为魔法攻击。

  • 如果魔宠迫使一个生物进行豁免，它将使用你的法术豁免DC。

  • 当魔宠受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应赋予它对该伤害的抗性。

Foundry 注

此特性可用于追踪你的反应使用情况，并召唤使用你法术豁免DC的魔宠。它还包括一个可应用于你的魔宠的主动效果，该效果将赋予它飞行或游泳速度。

Flight Speed.name: Flight Speed
Flight Speed.description: The familiar gains a flying speed of 40 feet.

Swimming Speed.name: Swimming Speed
Swimming Speed.description: The familiar gains a swimming speed of 40 feet.

Lightning Lure.name: Lightning Lure
Lightning Lure.description:
You create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at one creature of your choice that you can see within 15 feet of you. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward you and then take 1d8 lightning damage if it is within 5 feet of you.

This spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

Magic Item Master.name: Magic Item Master
Magic Item Master.description:
18th-level artificer feature

You can now attune to up to six magic items at once.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically upgrades your attunement max.

Magic Item Master.name: Magic Item Master
Magic Item Master.description: You can now attune to up to six magic items at once.

Ambush.name: Ambush
Ambush.description: When you make a [[/check skill=ste]] check or an initiative roll, you can expend one superiority die and add the die to the roll, provided you aren’t incapacitated.

utility.condition: When you make a Dex (Stealth) check or an initiative roll

Ambush Bonus.name: Ambush Bonus
Ambush Bonus.description: When you make a Dexterity (Stealth) check or an initiative roll, you can expend one superiority die and add the die to the roll, provided you aren’t incapacitated.

Bait and Switch.name: Bait and Switch
Bait and Switch.description:
When you’re within 5 feet of a creature on your turn, you can expend one superiority die and switch places with that creature, provided you spend at least 5 feet of movement and the creature is willing and isn’t incapacitated. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Roll the superiority die. Until the start of your next turn, you or the other creature (your choice) gains a bonus to AC equal to the number rolled.

utility.condition: Within range of the target on your turn

Brace.name: Brace
Brace.description: When a creature you can see moves into the reach you have with the melee weapon you’re wielding, you can use your reaction to expend one superiority die and make one attack against the creature, using that weapon. If the attack hits, add the superiority die to the weapon’s damage roll.

damage.condition: Creature you can see moves into your reach

Commanding Presence.name: Commanding Presence
Commanding Presence.description: When you make a [[/check skill=itm]], a [[/check skill=per]], or a [[/check skill=persuasion]], you can expend one superiority die and add the superiority die to the ability check.

utility.condition: When you use Intimidation, Performance, or Persuasion

Maneuver Options.name: Maneuver Options
Maneuver Options.description:
If you have access to maneuvers, the following maneuvers are added to the list of options available to you. Maneuvers are available to Battle Masters but also to characters who have a special feature like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSuperiorTech]{Superior Technique} fighting style or the Martial Adept feat.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeManambush000]{Ambush}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeManbaitAndSw]{Bait and Switch}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeManbrace0000]{Brace}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeMancommandin]{Commanding Presence}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeMangrappling]{Grappling Strike}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeManquickToss]{Quick Toss}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeMantacticalA]{Tactical Assessment}

Grappling Strike.name: Grappling Strike
Grappling Strike.description:
在你回合中以一次近战攻击命中一个生物后，你可以立即消耗一颗卓越骰，然后尝试以一次附赠动作对目标进行&Reference[grappling]{擒抱 grappling}。将这颗卓越骰加入你的力量（运动）检定。

擒抱： [[/check skill=ath]]{运动 Athletics} 与目标的[[/check skill=acr]]{特技 Acrobatics}或相同技能进行对抗检定。

utility.condition: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack

Quick Toss.name: Quick Toss
Quick Toss.description: As a bonus action, you can expend one superiority die and make a ranged attack with a weapon that has the thrown property. You can draw the weapon as part of making this attack. If you hit, add the superiority die to the weapon’s damage roll.

damage.condition: Weapon used for attack has the 'thrown' property

Tactical Assessment.name: Tactical Assessment
Tactical Assessment.description: When you make an [[/check skill=inv]], an [[/check skill=his]], or a [[/check skill=ins]] check, you can expend one superiority die and add the superiority die to the ability check.

utility.condition: When you make an Investigation, History, or Insight check

Way of Mercy.name: Way of Mercy
Way of Mercy.description:
Plague doctor—some looks never go out of style.

Tasha

Monks of the Way of Mercy learn to manipulate the life force of others to bring aid to those in need. They are wandering physicians to the poor and hurt. However, to those beyond their help, they bring a swift end as an act of mercy.

Those who follow the Way of Mercy might be members of a religious order, administering to the needy and making grim choices rooted in reality rather than idealism. Some might be gentle-voiced healers, beloved by their communities, while others might be masked bringers of macabre mercies.

The walkers of this way usually don robes with deep cowls, and they often conceal their faces with masks, presenting themselves as the faceless bringers of life and death.

advancement.title: Implements of Mercy: Proficiencies
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in the Insight and Medicine skills, and you gain proficiency with the herbalism kit.

Mind Sharpener.name: Mind Sharpener
Mind Sharpener.description:
Item: A suit of armor or robes

The infused item can send a jolt to the wearer to refocus their mind. The item has 4 charges. When the wearer fails a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, the wearer can use its reaction to expend 1 of the item’s charges to succeed instead. The item regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.

changes.name: {} of Mind Sharpening
changes.system.description.value: The infused item can send a jolt to the wearer to refocus their mind. The item has 4 charges. When the wearer fails a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, the wearer can use its reaction to expend 1 of the item’s charges to succeed instead. The item regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.

Mind Sliver.name: Mind Sliver
Mind Sliver.description:
You drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 1d6 psychic damage and subtract 1d4 from the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn.

This spell’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach certain levels: 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

Order Domain.name: Order Domain
Order Domain.description:
Finally, a whole faith about coloring inside the lines.

Tasha

The Order Domain represents discipline, as well as devotion to the laws that govern a society, an institution, or a philosophy. Clerics of Order meditate on logic and justice as they serve their gods, examples of which appear in the Order Deities table.

Clerics of Order believe that well-crafted laws establish legitimate hierarchies, and those selected by law to lead must be obeyed. Those who obey must do so to the best of their ability, and if those who lead fail to protect the law, they must be replaced. In this manner, law weaves a web of obligations that create order and security in a chaotic multiverse.

Order Deities

Example DeityPantheon

Aureon

Eberron

Bane

Forgotten Realms

Majere

Dragonlance

Pholtus

Greyhawk

Tyr

Forgotten Realms

Wee Jas

Greyhawk

Pact of the Talisman.name: Pact of the Talisman
Pact of the Talisman.description:
Your patron gives you an amulet, a talisman that can aid the wearer when the need is great. When the wearer fails an ability check, they can add [[/r 1d4]] to the roll, potentially turning the roll into a success. This benefit can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and all expended uses are restored when you finish a long rest.

If you lose the talisman, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to receive a replacement from your patron. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and it destroys the previous amulet. The talisman turns to ash when you die.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking uses of the d4 and the roll is implemented in the "Other" formula.

Peace Domain.name: Peace Domain
Peace Domain.description:
Have these peaceful clerics even considered that they’re subverting a most holy system, one where bad decisions coincide with the teaching power of pain?

Tasha

The balm of peace thrives at the heart of healthy communities, between friendly nations, and in the souls of the kindhearted. The gods of peace inspire people of all sorts to resolve conflict and to stand up against those forces that try to prevent peace from flourishing. See the Peace Deities table for a list of some of the gods associated with this domain.

Clerics of the Peace Domain preside over the signing of treaties, and they are often asked to arbitrate in disputes. These clerics’ blessings draw people together and help them shoulder one another’s burdens, and the clerics’ magic aids those who are driven to fight for the way of peace.

Peace Deities

Example DeityPantheon

Angharradh

Elven

Berronar Truesilver

Dwarven

Boldrei

Eberron

Cyrrollalee

Halfling

Eldath

Forgotten Realms

Gaerdal Ironhand

Gnomish

Paladine

Dragonlance

Rao

Greyhawk

Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete.name: Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete
Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete.description:
As a bonus action, you can use your Channel Divinity to augment your athleticism. For the next 10 minutes, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) and Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks; you can carry, push, drag, and lift twice as much weight as normal; and the distance of your long and high jumps increases by 10 feet (this extra distance costs movement as normal).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that can be used as a reminder and handles doubling your encumbrance but does not automate the advantage or other attributes changes.

Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete.name: Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete
Channel Divinity: Peerless Athlete.description: For the next 10 minutes, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) and Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks; you can carry, push, drag, and lift twice as much weight as normal; and the distance of your long and high jumps increases by 10 feet (this extra distance costs movement as normal).

Phantom.name: Phantom
Phantom.description:
Collecting the souls of your defeated foes in everyday objects—what a good idea. Though, I’d probably need an encyclopedia to hold all my anti-admirers.

Tasha

Many rogues walk a fine line between life and death, risking their own lives and taking the lives of others. While adventuring on that line, some rogues discover a mystical connection to death itself. These rogues take knowledge from the dead and become immersed in negative energy, eventually becoming like ghosts. Thieves’ guilds value them as highly effective information gatherers and spies.

Many shadar-kai of the Shadowfell are masters of these macabre techniques, and some are willing to teach this path. In places like Thay in the Forgotten Realms and Karrnath in Eberron, where many necromancers practice their craft, a Phantom can become a wizard’s confidant and right hand. In temples of gods of death, the Phantom might work as an agent to track down those who try to cheat death and to recover knowledge that might otherwise be lost to the grave.

How did you discover this grim power? Did you sleep in a graveyard and awaken to your new abilities? Or did you cultivate them in a temple or thieves’ guild dedicated to a deity of death?

Infiltrator: Powered Steps.name: Infiltrator: Powered Steps
Infiltrator: Powered Steps.description:
Your walking speed increases by 5 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect to increase your walking speed. When you equip the Powered Steps it will applied.

Primal Companion.name: Primal Companion
Primal Companion.description:
Replaces the Ranger's Companion feature

You magically summon a primal beast, which draws strength from your bond with nature. The beast is friendly to you and your companions and obeys your commands. Choose its stat block—@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoePrimallandbe]{Beast of the Land}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoePrimalseabea]{Beast of the Sea}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoePrimalskybea]{Beast of the Sky}—which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) in several places. You also determine the kind of animal the beast is, choosing a kind appropriate for the stat block. Whatever kind you choose, the beast bears primal markings, indicating its mystical origin.

In combat, the beast acts during your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes is the &Reference[dodge] action, unless you take a bonus action on your turn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. You can also sacrifice one of your attacks when you take the &Reference[attack] action to command the beast to take the Attack action. If you are incapacitated, the beast can take any action of its choice, not just Dodge.

If the beast has died within the last hour, you can use your action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

When you finish a long rest, you can summon a different primal beast. The new beast appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, and you choose its stat block and appearance. If you already have a beast from this feature, it vanishes when the new beast appears. The beast also vanishes if you die.

Protection of the Talisman.name: Protection of the Talisman
Protection of the Talisman.description:
Prerequisite: 7th-level warlock, Pact of the Talisman feature

When the wearer of your talisman fails a saving throw, they can add a [[/r d4]] to the roll, potentially turning the save into a success. This benefit can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and all expended uses are restored when you finish a long rest.

Protective Field.name: Protective Field
Protective Field.description: When you or another creature you can see within 30 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to expend one Psionic Energy die, roll the die, and reduce the damage taken by the number rolled plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum reduction of 1), as you create a momentary shield of telekinetic force.

utility.condition: You or another creature within range takes damage

Psi Warrior.name: 灵能武士
Psi Warrior.description:
Brains over brawn? Mind over matter? These canny warriors rightly answer, Why not both?

Tasha

Awake to the psionic power within, a Psi Warrior is a fighter who augments their physical might with psi-infused weapon strikes, telekinetic lashes, and barriers of mental force. Many githyanki train to become such warriors, as do some of the most disciplined high elves. In the world of Eberron, many young kalashtar dream of becoming Psi Warriors.

As a Psi Warrior, you might have honed your psionic abilities through solo discipline, unlocked it under the tutelage of a master, or refined it at an academy dedicated to wielding the mind’s power as both weapon and shield.

Psi-Bolstered Knack.name: Psi-Bolstered Knack
Psi-Bolstered Knack.description:
When your nonpsionic training fails you, your psionic power can help: if you fail an ability check using a skill or tool with which you have proficiency, you can roll one Psionic Energy die ([[/r @scale.soulknife.die]]) and add the number rolled to the check, potentially turning failure into success. You expend the die only if the roll succeeds.

Foundry Note

Using this feature can automatically consumes one use of your Psionic die. The roll is included in the "Other" formula.

Psionic Strike.name: Psionic Strike
Psionic Strike.description: You can propel your weapons with psionic force. Once on each of your turns, immediately after you hit a target within 30 feet of you with an attack and deal damage to it with a weapon, you can expend one Psionic Energy die, rolling it and dealing force damage to the target equal to the number rolled plus your Intelligence modifier.

damage.condition: Once on each of your turns

Psi-Powered Leap.name: Psi-Powered Leap
Psi-Powered Leap.description: 以一个附赠动作，你可以用心灵推动你的身体。你获得等于[[2 * @attributes.movement.walk]]{两倍步行速度 twice your walking speed}的飞行速度，持续到当前回合结束。一旦你使用此附赠动作，直至你完成一次短休或长休前无法再次使用，除非你消耗一颗灵能骰来再次使用它。

Psychic Blades.name: 念刃
Psychic Blades.description:
You have manifested your psionic power as shimmering blades of psychic energy. Whenever you take the Attack action, you can manifest a psychic blade from your free hand and make the attack with that blade. This magic blade is a simple melee weapon with the finesse and thrown properties. It has a normal range of 60 feet and no long range, and on a hit, it deals psychic damage equal to 1d6 plus the ability modifier you used for the attack roll. The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target, and it leaves no mark on its target if it deals damage.

After you attack with the blade, you can make a melee or ranged weapon attack with a second psychic blade as a bonus action on the same turn, provided your other hand is free to create it. The damage die of this bonus attack is 1d4, instead of 1d6.

Foundry Note

The bonus action damage is implemented in the "Other" damage formula.

Psychic Teleportation.name: Psychic Teleportation
Psychic Teleportation.description:
以一个{附赠动作 Bonus Action}，你显现出一把你拥有的{心灵刀锋 Psychic Blade}，消耗一颗{灵能骰 Psionic Energy die}并掷骰，然后将该刀锋投向你能看见的一处{未占据 unoccupied}{空间 space}，最远距离{等于 equal to}所掷点数的10倍尺数。随后你{传送术 teleport}至该{空间 space}，且该刀锋消失。

Foundry 注

此掷骰已在此{特性 Feature}的“{其他 other}”公式中实现。此{特性 Feature}还会在使用时自动消耗{灵能骰 Psionic Energy die}。

Psychic Whispers.name: Psychic Whispers
Psychic Whispers.description:
You can establish telepathic communication between yourself and others—perfect for quiet infiltration. As an action, choose one or more creatures you can see, up to a number of creatures equal to your proficiency bonus, and then roll one Psionic Energy die ([[/r @scale.soulknife.die]]). For a number of hours equal to the number rolled, the chosen creatures can speak telepathically with you, and you can speak telepathically with them. To send or receive a message (no action required), you and the other creature must be within 1 mile of each other. A creature can’t use this telepathy if it can’t speak any languages, and a creature can end the telepathic connection at any time (no action required). You and the creature don’t need to speak a common language to understand each other.

The first time you use this power after each long rest, you don’t expend the Psionic Energy die. All other times you use the power, you expend the die.

Foundry Note

To use the "free" usage of this feature uncheck the "Consume Resource?" option. To use the feature by expending a psionic energy die uncheck the "Consume Available Usage?" option.

This feature includes an optional Active Effect for tracking characters in your telepathic network but it does not automatically expire.

Psychic Whispers.name: Psychic Whispers
Psychic Whispers.description: This character can telepathically communicate with the caster of Psychic Whispers and the other chosen characters for a number of hours.

save.condition: Immediately after being hit by an attack

Radiant Weapon.name: Radiant Weapon
Radiant Weapon.description:
Prerequisite: 6th-level artificer

Item: A simple or martial weapon (requires attunement)

This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding it, the wielder can take a bonus action to cause it to shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The wielder can extinguish the light as a bonus action.

The weapon has 4 charges. As a reaction immediately after being hit by an attack, the wielder can expend 1 charge and cause the attacker to be blinded until the end of the attacker’s next turn, unless the attacker succeeds on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. The weapon regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.

Foundry Note

This infusion adds the bonus to attack and damage rolls and the charges but they are not automatically consumed nor are you prompted on each use. This is to enable quick use of the weapon's normal abilities. The chat card includes an option to consume the charge if needed.

This infusion also grants the [[/item Radiant Weapon Reaction]] item for handling its charges and saving throw. When the infusion is removed the reaction item will be as well.

changes.name: , Radiant
changes.system.description.value:
这把{魔化武器 magic weapon}在使用时使{攻击 Attack}和伤害骰获得+1{加值 bonus}。持握时，持有者可以用一个{附赠动作 Bonus Action}使其散发出{30尺 30 feet}{半径 radius}的{明亮光照 Bright Light}和额外{30尺 30 feet}的{微光光照 Dim Light}。持有者可以用一个{附赠动作 Bonus Action}熄灭该光芒。

该{武器 Weapon}有4发充能。在被{攻击 Attack}{命中 hit}后，持有者可以立即用一个{反应 Reaction}消耗1发充能，使{攻击 Attack}者陷入{目盲 Blinded}状态，直到{攻击 Attack}者的下一个{回合 turn}结束，除非该{攻击 Attack}者通过一次对抗你{法术豁免DC spell save DC}的{体质 Constitution}{豁免 Saving Throw}。该{武器 Weapon}在每天{拂晓 dawn}时恢复1d4发已消耗的充能。

Foundry 注

此注能将{加值 bonus}添加到{攻击 Attack}和伤害骰，并提供充能，但它们不会自动{消耗 Consume}，也不会在每次使用时提示你。这是为了快速使用{武器 Weapon}的正常能力。聊天卡包含一个选项，可在需要时{消耗 Consume}充能。

此注能还授予[[/item Radiant Weapon Reaction]]物品，用于处理其充能和{豁免 Saving Throw}。当注能被移除时，该{反应 Reaction}物品也会被移除。

Rebuke of the Talisman.name: Rebuke of the Talisman
Rebuke of the Talisman.description:
先决条件: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePactOfTheTal]{护符之契 Pact of the Talisman}特性

当你的护符佩戴者被你能看见的30尺内攻击者命中时，你可以用你的反应对该攻击者造成等于你的熟练加值的心灵伤害，并将其推离护符佩戴者至多10尺。

damage.condition: When the wearer of your talisman is hit within 30 feet of you

Regain Psionic Energy.name: Regain Psionic Energy
Regain Psionic Energy.description: As a bonus action, you can regain one expended Psionic Energy die, but you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Repeating Shot.name: Repeating Shot
Repeating Shot.description:
Item: A simple or martial weapon with the ammunition property (requires attunement)

This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it when it’s used to make a ranged attack, and it ignores the loading property if it has it.

If the weapon lacks ammunition, it produces its own, automatically creating one piece of magic ammunition when the wielder makes a ranged attack with it. The ammunition created by the weapon vanishes the instant after it hits or misses a target.

changes.name: , Repeating Shot
changes.system.description.value:
This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it when it’s used to make a ranged attack, and it ignores the loading property if it has it.

If the weapon lacks ammunition, it produces its own, automatically creating one piece of magic ammunition when the wielder makes a ranged attack with it. The ammunition created by the weapon vanishes the instant after it hits or misses a target.

Replicate Magic Item.name: Replicate Magic Item
Replicate Magic Item.description:
Using this infusion, you replicate a particular magic item. You can learn this infusion multiple times; each time you do so, choose a magic item that you can make with it, picking from the Replicable Items tables. A table’s title tells you the level you must be in the class to choose an item from the table. Alternatively, you can choose the magic item from among the common magic items in the game, not including potions or scrolls.

In the tables, an item’s entry tells you whether the item requires attunement. See the item’s description for more information about it, including the type of object required for its making.

Foundry Note

Rather than create an infusion for every magic item, when you would like to replicate an item, drag it onto your character sheet. You can then use this feature to infuse it for tracking your infusion uses.
