Replicated Magic Item.name: Replicated Magic Item
Replicated Magic Item.description: This item was replicated using the Replicate Magic Item infusion.

Repulsion Shield.name: Repulsion Shield
Repulsion Shield.description:
Prerequisite: 6th-level artificer

Item: A shield (requires attunement)

A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wielding this shield.

The shield has 4 charges. While holding it, the wielder can use a reaction immediately after being hit by a melee attack to expend 1 of the shield’s charges and push the attacker up to 15 feet away. The shield regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.

Foundry Note

This Infusion includes the bonus to armor class.

changes.name: , Repulsion Shield
changes.system.description.value:
A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wielding this shield.

The shield has 4 charges. While holding it, the wielder can use a reaction immediately after being hit by a melee attack to expend 1 of the shield’s charges and push the attacker up to 15 feet away. The shield regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.

Foundry Note

This Infusion includes the bonus to armor class.

Resistant Armor.name: Resistant Armor
Resistant Armor.description:
Prerequisite: 6th-level artificer

Item: A suit of armor (requires attunement)

While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to one of the following damage types, which you choose when you infuse the item: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder.

Foundry Note

This infusion includes an enchantment for each type of damage and an associated Active Effect that will provide the resistance.

changes.name: , Acid Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to acid damage.

changes.name: , Cold Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to cold damage.

changes.name: , Fire Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to fire damage.

changes.name: , Force Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to force damage.

changes.name: , Lightning Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to lightning damage.

changes.name: , Necrotic Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to necrotic damage.

changes.name: , Poison Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to poison damage.

changes.name: , Psychic Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to psychic damage.

changes.name: , Radiant Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to radiant damage.

changes.name: , Thunder Resistant
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to thunder damage.

Returning Weapon.name: Returning Weapon
Returning Weapon.description:
Item: A simple or martial weapon with the thrown property

This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it, and it returns to the wielder’s hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack.

changes.name: , Returning
changes.system.description.value: This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it, and it returns to the wielder’s hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack.

Roving.name: Roving
Roving.description: Your walking speed increases by 5, and you gain a climbing speed and a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

Rune Knight.name: Rune Knight
Rune Knight.description:
You’re researching ancient arts and drawing runes. It’s okay to just say you want to be a witch!

Tasha

Rune Knights enhance their martial prowess using the supernatural power of runes, an ancient practice that originated with giants. Rune cutters can be found among any family of giants, and you likely learned your methods first or second hand from such a mystical artisan. Whether you found the giant’s work carved into a hill or cave, learned of the runes from a sage, or met the giant in person, you studied the giant’s craft and learned how to apply magic runes to empower your equipment.

advancement.title: 附赠熟练
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency with smith’s tools, and you learn to speak, read, and write Giant.

advancement.title: Runes Known
advancement.hint: Hill and Storm runes require level 7 or higher.

Magic Item Savant.name: Magic Item Savant
Magic Item Savant.description:
14th-level artificer feature

Your skill with magic items deepens:

  • You can attune to up to five magic items at once.

  • You ignore all class, race, spell, and level requirements on attuning to or using a magic item.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically upgrades your attunement max.

Magic Item Savant.name: Magic Item Savant
Magic Item Savant.description: You can attune to up to five magic items at once.

Order of Scribes.name: Order of Scribes
Order of Scribes.description:
Magic is great and all, but have you smelled a book?

Tasha

Magic of the book—that’s what many folk call wizardry. The name is apt, given how much time wizards spend poring over tomes and penning theories about the nature of magic. It’s rare to see wizards traveling without books and scrolls sprouting from their bags, and a wizard would go to great lengths to plumb an archive of ancient knowledge.

Among wizards, the Order of Scribes is the most bookish. It takes many forms in different worlds, but its primary mission is the same everywhere: recording magical discoveries so that wizardry can flourish. And while all wizards value spellbooks, a wizard in the Order of Scribes magically awakens their book, turning it into a trusted companion. All wizards study books, but a wizardly scribe talks to theirs!

Seeking Spell.name: Seeking Spell
Seeking Spell.description:
If you make an attack roll for a spell and miss, you can spend 2 sorcery points to reroll the [[/r d20]], and you must use the new roll.

You can use Seeking Spell even if you have already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

Foundry Note

This feature will consume 2 sorcery points.

utility.condition: Miss with a spell's attack roll

Soul Trinket.name: Soul Trinket
Soul Trinket.description:
A soul trinket created using the Tokens of the Departed feature.

Foundry Note

Soul trinkets are configured as consumables that will destroy on use for easier tracking of each captured soul.

Soulknife.name: 魂刃
Soulknife.description:
I also have the ability to manifest my thoughts in ways that cut people. I call this power … words.

Tasha

Most assassins strike with physical weapons, and many burglars and spies use thieves’ tools to infiltrate secure locations. In contrast, a Soulknife strikes and infiltrates with the mind, cutting through barriers both physical and psychic. These rogues discover psionic power within themselves and channel it to do their roguish work. They find easy employment as members of thieves’ guilds, though they are often mistrusted by rogues who are leery of anyone using strange mind powers to conduct their business. Most governments would also be happy to employ a Soulknife as a spy.

Amid the trees of ancient forests on the Material Plane and in the Feywild, some wood elves walk the path of the Soulknife, serving as silent, lethal guardians of their woods. In the endless war among the gith, a githzerai is encouraged to become a Soulknife when stealth is required against the githyanki foe.

As a Soulknife, your psionic abilities might have haunted you since you were a child, only revealing their full potential as you experienced the stress of adventure. Or you might have sought out a reclusive order of psychic adepts and spent years learning how to manifest your power.

Spectral Unarmed Strike.name: Spectral Unarmed Strike
Spectral Unarmed Strike.description:
You can make an [[/item Uarmed Strike]] using your Spectral Arms when Arms of the Astral Self feature's duration is active. When you make an unarmed strike with the arms on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal. The unarmed strikes you make with the arms can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls, and their damage type is force.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for the attack utilizing your wisdom.

tcoeSpellcastBon.name: 附赠熟练
tcoeSpellcastBon.description:
The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: &Reference[Wisdom], &Reference[Intelligence], or &Reference[Charisma].

In addition, the sidekick gains proficiency in two skills of your choice from the following list: &Reference[Arcana], &Reference[History], &Reference[Insight], &Reference[Investigation], &Reference[Medicine], &Reference[Performance], &Reference[Persuasion], and &Reference[Religion].

The sidekick gains proficiency with light armor, and if it is a humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block, it also gains proficiency with all simple weapons.

Empowered Spells.name: Empowered Spells
Empowered Spells.description:
Choose one school of magic. Whenever the sidekick casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, the sidekick can add its spellcasting ability modifier (currently [[lookup @attributes.spellmod]]) to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

Foundry Note

The increase to a specific school of magic is not currently automated.

Focused Casting.name: Focused Casting
Focused Casting.description: Taking damage can’t break the sidekick’s concentration on a spell.

Potent Cantrips.name: Potent Cantrips
Potent Cantrips.description:
The sidekick can add its spellcasting ability modifier (currently, [[lookup @attributes.spellmod]]) to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

Foundry Note

The increase to damage is not currently automated.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
助手获得施法能力。(如果该生物已有施法特性，此特性将取代该特性。)选择施法者角色：法师、医疗师或奇才。此选择决定助手使用的法术列表和施法关键属性，如施法表格所示。

施法 Spellcasting

角色

法术列表

属性

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSpellcasterM]{法师}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{法师 Wizard}

&Reference[Intelligence]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSpellcasterH]{医疗师}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{牧师 Cleric}和@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{德鲁伊 Druid}

&Reference[Wisdom]

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSpellcasterP]{奇才}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{吟游诗人 Bard}和@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{魔契师 Warlock}

&Reference[Charisma]

法术位。施法者表格显示助手有多少法术位可用于施展其施法者法术的1环及更高环阶法术。要施展这些法术之一，助手必须消耗一个等于或高于该法术环阶的法术位。助手在完成一次长休后恢复所有已消耗的法术位。

已知法术。助手知晓两个戏法和一个由你从其法术列表中选择的1环法术。以下是各角色1环施法者的推荐法术：

法师：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]{法师之手 mage hand}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ctW81uiX56xZR2c5]{冷冻射线 ray of frost}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ]{雷鸣波 thunderwave}

医疗师：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP]{疗伤术 cure wounds}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.P7mF2MxSuVJwHRRY]{神导术 guidance}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.n9pJzTDsAwQxJVRl]{圣火术 sacred flame}

奇才：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Z9p1vezIn95jw1Yw]{魔能爆 eldritch blast}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.o8Dh7fblk1d16tnO]{治愈真言 healing word}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]{光亮术 light}

施法者表格的已知戏法和已知法术列显示助手何时学习更多由你选择的法术。已知法术列中的每个法术必须是助手拥有法术位对应环阶的法术，如表格所示。例如，当助手在此职业达到5级时，它可以学习一个1环或2环的新法术。

此外，当助手在此职业中升级时，你可以选择它从此职业中知晓的一个法术，并用其法术列表中的另一个法术替换它。新法术必须是戏法或助手拥有法术位对应环阶的法术。

施法关键属性。助手施展这些法术的施法关键属性取决于你在施法表格中所做的选择。

每当法术提及该属性时，助手使用其施法关键属性。此外，它在设定所施法术的豁免DC和进行攻击检定时使用其施法关键属性调整值。

法术豁免DC = 8 + 助手的熟练加值 + 施法关键属性调整值

法术攻击调整值 = 助手的熟练加值 + 施法关键属性调整值

法器。助手可以使用法器施展其法术，具体取决于你在施法表格中所做的选择。法师可以使用奥术法器，医疗师可以使用圣徽，奇才可以使用奥术法器或乐器。

Spellcaster Healer.name: Spellcaster Healer
Spellcaster Healer.description:
医疗师施法者角色允许使用@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{牧师 Cleric}和@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{德鲁伊 Druid}的法术列表,并将随从的施法关键属性设为&Reference[Wisdom]。

成为施法者的随从行走在魔法之路上。该随从可能是一名野法师,一名祭司,一名预言者,一名魔法表演者,或是一名血脉中流淌着魔法的人。

要获得施法者职业,一个生物必须在其资料卡中拥有至少一种可以说的语言。

随从在此职业中升级时会获得下列职业特性,如施法者表格中所示。

Spellcaster Mage.name: Spellcaster Mage
Spellcaster Mage.description:
The Mage spellcaster role grants access to the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s]{Wizard}'s Spell List and sets the sidekick's spellcasting ability to &Reference[Intelligence].

A sidekick who becomes a Spellcaster walks the paths of magic. The sidekick might be a hedge wizard, a priest, a soothsayer, a magical performer, or a person with magic in their veins.

To gain the Spellcaster class, a creature must have at least one language in its stat block that it can speak.

A sidekick gains the following class features as it gains levels in this class, as summarized on the Spellcaster table.
