Spell-Refueling Ring.name: Spell-Refueling Ring
Spell-Refueling Ring.description:
Prerequisite: 6th-level artificer

Item: A ring (requires attunement)

While wearing this ring, the creature can recover one expended spell slot as an action. The recovered slot can be of 3rd level or lower. Once used, the ring can’t be used again until the next dawn.

changes.name: , Spell-Refueling
changes.system.description.value: While wearing this ring, the creature can recover one expended spell slot as an action. The recovered slot can be of 3rd level or lower. Once used, the ring can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Spirit Shroud.name: Spirit Shroud
Spirit Shroud.description:
你召唤出亡者的精魄，它们在法术持续时间内围绕着你飞舞。这些精魄是无形的且无法被伤害。

在法术结束前，你对10尺内的生物发动的任何攻击在命中时都会造成1d8点额外伤害。该伤害类型为光耀、暗蚀或寒冷（你在施法时选择）。任何受到此伤害的生物在你的下个回合开始前无法恢复生命值。

此外，由你指定且你能看见的任一生物，若在你的10尺范围内开始其回合，则其速度会减少10尺，直到你的下个回合开始。

升环施法效应。 当你使用4环或更高法术位施展该法术时，所使用的法术位每比3环高两环，伤害就增加1d8。

法术位等级: [[lookup @item.level]]

[[/damage (floor(@item.level - 1)/2)d8 type=radiant]]{光耀伤害 radiant}

[[/damage (floor(@item.level - 1)/2)d8 type=necrotic]]{暗蚀伤害 necrotic}

[[/damage (floor(@item.level - 1)/2)d8 type=cold]]{寒冷伤害 cold}

Slowed.name: Slowed
Slowed.description: Starting your turn within 10 feet of the caster reduces your speed by 10 feet until the start of the caster's next turn.

Circle of Spores.name: Circle of Spores
Circle of Spores.description:
I’m an avid collector of spores, molds, and fungi—my most prized find being a sapiens zuggtmata from the depths of Mount Zogon. I wouldn’t want it steering a corpse around and touching my stuff, though.

Tasha

Druids of the Circle of Spores find beauty in decay. They see within mold and other fungi the ability to transform lifeless material into abundant, albeit somewhat strange, life. These druids believe that life and death are parts of a grand cycle, with one leading to the other and then back again. Death isn’t the end of life, but instead a change of state that sees life shift into a new form.

Druids of this circle have a complex relationship with the undead. They see nothing inherently wrong with undeath, which they consider to be a companion to life and death. But these druids believe that the natural cycle is healthiest when each segment of it is vibrant and changing. Undead that seek to replace all life with undeath, or that try to avoid passing to a final rest, violate the cycle and must be thwarted.

Archer.name: Archer
Archer.description: A constellation of an archer appears on you. When you activate this form, and as a bonus action on your subsequent turns while it lasts, you can make a ranged spell attack, hurling a luminous arrow that targets one creature within 60 feet of you. On a hit, the attack deals radiant damage equal to 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier.

Chalice.name: Chalice
Chalice.description: A constellation of a life-giving goblet appears on you. Whenever you cast a spell using a spell slot that restores hit points to a creature, you or another creature within 30 feet of you can regain hit points equal to [[/r @scale.stars-circle.die + @abilities.wis.mod#Hit points regained]]{1d8 + your Wisdom modifier.}

heal.condition: Casting a healing spell using a spell slot

Dragon.name: Dragon
Dragon.description:
一个智者龙类的星座显现在你身上。当你进行一次[[/check ability=int]]或[[/check ability=wis]]检定，或为维持法术专注而进行体质豁免检定时，你可以将d20骰出的9或更低点数视为10。

Foundry 注

该星座的效益@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoestaTwinkling]{提升}在10级时还会获得飞行速度。为此，系统提供了两个主动效果，可根据角色当前的德鲁伊等级按需激活。

Dragon's Wisdom.name: Dragon's Wisdom
Dragon's Wisdom.description: When you make an Intelligence or a Wisdom check or a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.

Twinkling Wisdom (10th Level).name: Twinkling Wisdom (10th Level)
Twinkling Wisdom (10th Level).description:
• When you make an Intelligence or a Wisdom check or a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.

  • You have a flying speed of 20 feet and can hover.

Circle of Stars.name: Circle of Stars
Circle of Stars.description:
What about the dark places between the stars? Don’t you realize that’s where the good stuff is?

Tasha

The Circle of Stars allows druids to draw on the power of starlight. These druids have tracked heavenly patterns since time immemorial, discovering secrets hidden amid the constellations. By revealing and understanding these secrets, the Circle of the Stars seeks to harness the powers of the cosmos.

Many druids of this circle keep records of the constellations and the stars’ effects on the world. Some groups document these observations at megalithic sites, which serve as enigmatic libraries of lore. These repositories might take the form of stone circles, pyramids, petroglyphs, and underground temples—any construction durable enough to protect the circle’s sacred knowledge even against a great cataclysm.

Stone Rune.name: Stone Rune
Stone Rune.description:
This rune’s magic channels the judiciousness associated with stone giants.

While wearing or carrying an object inscribed with this rune, you have advantage on [[/check skill=ins]] checks, and you have &Reference[darkvision] out to a range of 120 feet.

In addition, when a creature you can see ends its turn within 30 feet of you, you can use your reaction to invoke the rune and force the creature to make a [[/save ability=wis]] saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature is &Reference[charmed] by you for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has a speed of 0 and is &Reference[incapacitated], descending into a dreamy stupor.

The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. Once you invoke this rune, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

save.condition: a creature you can see ends its turn within range

Judiciousness.name: Judiciousness
Judiciousness.description: You have advantage on [[/check skill=ins]] checks, and you gain &Reference[darkvision] out to a range of 120 feet.

Judged.name: Judged
Judged.description: While &Reference[charmed] in this way, the creature has a speed of 0 and is incapacitated, descending into a dreamy stupor.

Storm Rune.name: Storm Rune
Storm Rune.description:
通过使用此符文，你能像风暴巨人先知一样窥见未来。

当你佩戴或携带刻有此符文的物件时，你在[[/check skill=arc]]检定上具有优势，且只要你未处于&Reference[incapacitated]{失能 Incapacitated}状态，就不会受到&Reference[surprise]{突袭 Surprise}。

此外，你可以用一个附赠动作激活符文，进入持续1分钟或直至你失能的预言状态。此状态持续期间，当你或你能看到的60尺内其他生物进行攻击检定、豁免或属性检定时，你可以用你的反应使该检定具有优势或劣势。一旦你激活此符文，直至你完成一次短休或长休前都无法再次使用。

Seer Sight.name: Seer Sight
Seer Sight.description:
You enter a prophetic state for 1 minute or until you are incapacitated.

Until the state ends, when you or another creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, you can use your reaction to cause the roll to have advantage or disadvantage.

Summon Aberration.name: 异怪召唤术
Summon Aberration.description:
你召唤出一个异怪精魄。它显现在你施法范围内一个你能看见的未占据空间。这个具象形态使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeAberrantSpirit]{异怪精魄 Aberrant Spirit} 资料卡。当你施展该法术时，选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeAberrantbhol]{眼魔裔 Beholderkin}、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeAberrantslaa]{史拉蟾 Slaad} 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeAberrantstar]{星之眷族 Star Spawn}。该生物的外形类似该种类的异怪，这决定了其资料卡中的某些特质。当该生物生命值降至0或法术终止时，它会消失。

该生物是你和你的同伴的盟友。在战斗中，该生物共享你的先攻值，但它在你的回合之后立即行动。它服从你的言语命令（无需你执行动作）。如果你没有下达任何命令，它会采取回避动作并利用移动来规避风险。

升环施法效应。 当你用五环或更高法术位施展该法术时，在资料卡中出现法术环阶的位置使用更高的环阶。

Summon Beast.name: 野兽召唤术
Summon Beast.description:
你召唤出一头野兽精魄。它显现在施法范围内一个你能看见的未占据空间里。这个实体形态使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeBeastSpiritT]{野兽精魄 Bestial Spirit} 资料卡。施展该法术时，选择一个环境：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeAirSpirit000]{天空 Air}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeLandSpirit00]{陆地 Land}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeWaterSpirit0]{水域 Water}。该生物外形类似你选择的、源自该环境的某种动物，这决定了其资料卡中的特定特质。当该生物生命值降至0或法术终止时，它会消失。

该生物是你和你的伙伴的盟友。战斗中，该生物共享你的先攻值，但它在你的回合结束后立即行动。它会服从你的言语命令（无需你执行动作）。如果你没有下达任何命令，它会采取回避动作并移动来规避风险。

升环施法效应。 当你使用3环或更高法术位施展该法术时，资料卡中所有涉及法术环阶的数值均按更高环阶计算。

Summon Celestial.name: Summon Celestial
Summon Celestial.description:
You call forth a celestial spirit. It manifests in an angelic form in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. This corporeal form uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeCelestialSpi]{Celestial Spirit} stat block. When you cast the spell, choose @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeAvengerSpiri]{Avenger} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeDefenderSpir]{Defender}. Your choice determines the creature’s attack in its stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

The creature is an ally to you and your companions. In combat, the creature shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It obeys your verbal commands (no action required by you). If you don’t issue any, it takes the &Reference[dodge] action and uses its move to avoid danger.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell’s level appears in the stat block.

Summon Construct.name: Summon Construct
Summon Construct.description:
你呼唤一个构装生物的精魄。它显现在你施法范围内一个你能看见的未占据空间。这个实体形态使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeConstructSpi]{构装精魄 Construct Spirit} 资料卡。施展该法术时，选择一种材料：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeClaySpirit00]{黏土 Clay}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeMetalSpirit0]{金属 Metal}，或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeStoneSpirit0]{石料 Stone}。该生物形似由所选材料制成的魔像或魔冢（由你选择），这决定了其资料卡中的某些特质。当该生物生命值降至0或法术终止时，它会消失。

该生物是你和你的同伴的盟友。在战斗中，该生物共享你的先攻值，但它在你的回合之后立即行动。它服从你的言语命令（无需你执行动作）。如果你没有下达任何命令，它会发动&Reference[dodge]动作并使用其移动来规避风险。

升环施法效应。当你使用4环或更高法术位施展该法术时，在资料卡中出现法术环阶的位置使用更高环阶。

Summon Elemental.name: Summon Elemental
Summon Elemental.description:
你呼唤一个元素精魄。它显现在射程内你能看见的一个未被占据的空间中。这个实体形态使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeElementalSpi]{元素精魄 Elemental Spirit} 资料卡。当你施展该法术时，选择一个元素： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeAirElemental]{气 Air}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeEarthElement]{土 Earth}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeFireElementa]{火 Fire}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeWaterElement]{水 Water}。该生物类似一个被所选元素环绕的双足形态，这决定了其资料卡中的某些特质。当该生物生命值降至0或法术结束时，它消失。

该生物是你和你的同伴的盟友。在战斗中，该生物共享你的先攻值，但它在你的回合之后立即行动。它服从你的言语命令（无需你花费动作）。如果你不发出任何命令，它会采取 &Reference[dodge] 动作并使用其移动力来规避风险。

升环施法效应。 当你用五环或更高法术位施展该法术时，在资料卡中出现法术环阶的地方使用更高环阶。

Summon Fey.name: Summon Fey
Summon Fey.description:
你召唤出一只精类精魄。它显现在你施法距离内一个你能看见的未占据空间。这个实体形态使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeFeySpiritTem]{精类精魄 Fey Spirit} 资料卡。施展该法术时，选择一个情绪：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeFumingSpirit]{暴怒 Fuming}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeMirthfulSpir]{欢欣 Mirthful}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeTricksySpiri]{诡诈 Tricksy}。该生物的外形类似你选择的、带有选定情绪特征的精类生物，该情绪决定了其资料卡中的一项特质。当该生物生命值降至0或法术终止时，它会消失。

该生物是你和你的同伴的盟友。在战斗中，该生物共享你的先攻值，但它在你的回合结束后立即行动。它服从你的言语命令（无需你执行动作）。如果你没有下达任何命令，它会采取 &Reference[dodge] 动作并使用其移动力来规避风险。

升环施法效应。 当你使用4环或更高法术位施展该法术时，资料卡中所有出现法术环阶的位置均使用更高环阶。

Summon Fiend.name: Summon Fiend
Summon Fiend.description:
你召唤出一只邪魔精魄。它显现在施法范围内你能看见的一处未占据空间内。这个具象化的形体使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeFiendishSpir]{邪魔精魄 Fiendish Spirit} 资料卡。施展该法术时，选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeDemonSpirit0]{恶魔 Demon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeDevilSpirit0]{魔鬼 Devil}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeYugolothSpir]{尤格罗斯魔 Yugoloth}。该生物的外形类似于所选类型的邪魔，这将决定其资料卡中的某些特质。当该生物生命值降至0或法术终止时，它会消失。

该生物是你和你的同伴的盟友。战斗中，该生物共享你的先攻值，但在你的回合结束后立即行动。它会服从你的言语命令（无需你执行动作）。如果你未下达任何命令，它会采取 &Reference[dodge]{回避 Dodge} 动作并利用移动来规避风险。

升环施法效应。 当你使用7环或更高法术位施展该法术时，资料卡中法术等级出现的位置均使用更高环阶。

Summon Shadowspawn.name: Summon Shadowspawn
Summon Shadowspawn.description:
You call forth a shadowy spirit. It manifests in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. This corporeal form uses the Shadow Spirit stat block. When you cast the spell, choose an emotion: Fury, Despair, or Fear. The creature resembles a misshapen biped marked by the chosen emotion, which determines certain traits in its stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

The creature is an ally to you and your companions. In combat, the creature shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It obeys your verbal commands (no action required by you). If you don’t issue any, it takes the &Reference[Dodge] action and uses its move to avoid danger.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell’s level appears in the stat block.

Summon Undead.name: Summon Undead
Summon Undead.description:
You call forth an undead spirit. It manifests in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. This corporeal form uses the Undead Spirit stat block. When you cast the spell, choose the creature’s form: Ghostly, Putrid, or Skeletal. The spirit resembles an undead creature with the chosen form, which determines certain traits in its stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

The creature is an ally to you and your companions. In combat, the creature shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It obeys your verbal commands (no action required by you). If you don’t issue any, it takes the Dodge action and uses its move to avoid danger.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell’s level appears in the stat block.

Superior Technique.name: Superior Technique
Superior Technique.description:
You learn one maneuver of your choice from among those available to the Battle Master archetype. If a maneuver you use requires your target to make a saving throw to resist the maneuver’s effects, the saving throw DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice).

You gain one superiority die, which is a d6 (this die is added to any superiority dice you have from another source). This die is used to fuel your maneuvers. A superiority die is expended when you use it. You regain your expended superiority dice when you finish a short or long rest.

Swarmkeeper.name: Swarmkeeper
Swarmkeeper.description:
I love insects—organized, relentless, specialized little champions. And aligning their single-minded will with your own: beautiful. Just keep them out of my lab.

Tasha

Feeling a deep connection to the environment around them, some rangers reach out through their magical connection to the world and bond with a swarm of nature spirits. The swarm becomes a potent force in battle, as well as helpful company for the ranger. Some Swarmkeepers are outcasts or hermits, keeping to themselves and their attendant swarms rather than dealing with the discomfort of others. Other Swarmkeepers enjoy building vibrant communities that work for the mutual benefit of all those they consider part of their swarm.

It's Your Swarm

A Swarmkeeper’s swarm and spells are reflections of the character’s bond with nature spirits. Take the opportunity to describe the swarm and the ranger’s magic in play. For example, when your ranger casts gaseous form, they might appear to melt into the swarm, instead of a cloud of mist, or the arcane eye spell could create an extension of your swarm that spies for you. Such descriptions don’t change the effects of spells, but they are an exciting opportunity to explore your character’s narrative through their class abilities. For more guidance on customizing spells, see the “Personalizing Spells” section in chapter 3.

Also, remember that the swarm’s appearance is yours to customize, and don’t feel confined to a single appearance. Perhaps the spirits’ look changes with the ranger’s mood or with the seasons. You decide!

Sword Burst.name: Sword Burst
Sword Burst.description:
You create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you. All other creatures within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 force damage.

This spell’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

Tasha's Caustic Brew.name: Tasha's Caustic Brew
Tasha's Caustic Brew.description:
A stream of acid emanates from you in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for the spell’s duration or until a creature uses its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes 2d4 acid damage at start of each of its turns.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 2d4 for each slot level above 1st.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect, "Covered in Caustic Brew", which can be used for tracking impacted creatures but it does not automate applying the damage.

Tasha's Mind Whip.name: Tasha's Mind Whip
Tasha's Mind Whip.description:
You psychically lash out at one creature you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 3d6 psychic damage, and it can’t take a reaction until the end of its next turn. Moreover, on its next turn, it must choose whether it gets a move, an action, or a bonus action; it gets only one of the three. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers none of the spell’s other effects.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

Maximum targets for level: [[max(1, @item.level - 2)]]

Foundry Note

This spell includes an Active Effect, "Mind Whipped", for tracking impacted creatures. It does not automatically expire at the end of the creature's turn.

Mind Whipped.name: Mind Whipped
Mind Whipped.description: The impacted creature can’t take a reaction until the end of its next turn. Moreover, on its next turn, it must choose whether it gets a move, an action, or a bonus action; it gets only one of the three.

Tasha's Otherworldly Guise.name: Tasha's Otherworldly Guise
Tasha's Otherworldly Guise.description:
Uttering an incantation, you draw on the magic of the Lower Planes or Upper Planes (your choice) to transform yourself. You gain the following benefits until the spell ends:

Always

  • Spectral wings appear on your back, giving you a flying speed of 40 feet.

  • You have a +2 bonus to AC.

  • All your weapon attacks are magical, and when you make a weapon attack, you can use your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls.

  • You can attack twice, instead of once, when you take the Attack action on your turn. You ignore this benefit if you already have a feature, like Extra Attack, that lets you attack more than once when you take the Attack action on your turn.

Upper Planes

  • You are immune to radiant and necrotic damage.

  • You are immune to the &Reference[charmed] condition.

Lower Planes

  • You are immune to fire and poison damage.

  • You are immune to the &Reference[poisoned] condition.

Foundry Note

This feature includes two Active Effects, Upper and Lower Planes, that automatically grant you immunity to the relevant damage types and conditions, the flying speed, and the bonus to AC. It does not automate the use of your spellcasting ability modifier in place of strength/dexterity.

Upper Planes.name: Upper Planes
Upper Planes.description:
• You are immune to radiant and necrotic damage.

  • You are immune to the &Reference[charmed] condition.

Telekinetic Movement.name: Telekinetic Movement
Telekinetic Movement.description: You can move an object or a creature with your mind. As an action, you target one loose object that is Large or smaller or one willing creature, other than yourself. If you can see the target and it is within 30 feet of you, you can move it up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Alternatively, if it is a Tiny object, you can move it to or from your hand. Either way, you can move the target horizontally, vertically, or both. Once you take this action, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to take it again.

utility.condition: Willing creature or large (or smaller) object

Telekinetic Thrust.name: Telekinetic Thrust
Telekinetic Thrust.description:
When you deal damage to a target with your Psionic Strike, you can force the target to make a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier. If the save fails, you can knock the target prone or move it up to 10 feet in any direction horizontally.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used in place of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePsionicStrik] when choosing to apply this feature's extended effects.

save.condition: Once on each of your turns
save.chatFlavor: On save failure: knock prone or move 10 feet.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description:
• A prone creature's only movement option is to crawl, unless it stands up and thereby ends the condition.

  • The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.

  • An attack roll against the creature has advantage if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature. Otherwise, the attack roll has disadvantage.

The Fathomless.name: The Fathomless
The Fathomless.description:
I never understood why some people get so jittery about tentacles. Have you ever had octopus nigiri? One of the few pieces of evidence of a benevolent multiverse.

Tasha

You have plunged into a pact with the deeps. An entity of the ocean, the Elemental Plane of Water, or another otherworldly sea now allows you to draw on its thalassic power. Is it merely using you to learn about terrestrial realms, or does it want you to open cosmic floodgates and drown the world?

Perhaps you were born into a generational cult that venerates the Fathomless and its spawn. Or you might have been shipwrecked and on the brink of drowning when your patron’s grasp offered you a chance at life. Whatever the reason for your pact, the sea and its unknown depths call to you.

Entities of the deep that might empower a warlock include krakens, ancient water elementals, godlike hallucinations dreamed into being by kuo-toa, merfolk demigods, and sea hag covens.

The Genie.name: The Genie
The Genie.description:
我知道在灰鹰找房子很困难，但当巨灵或魔契师向你提供廉价租金时，快跑。

塔莎

你与最稀有的巨灵种类之一——贵族巨灵——缔结了契约。这类存在统治着元素位面上的广阔封地，并对较弱的巨灵和元素生物拥有巨大影响。贵族巨灵的动机各不相同，但大多傲慢自大，掌握着堪比次级神祇的力量。他们乐于扭转凡人的局面——凡人常将巨灵束缚为奴仆——并欣然缔结能扩展其触及范围的契约。

你可以选择或随机决定守护神的种类，使用巨灵种类表。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeGenieKind000 caption=false]{巨灵种类 Genie Kind}

advancement.title: Elemental Gift Resistances
advancement.hint: You begin to take on characteristics of your patron’s kind. You now have resistance to a damage type determined by your patron’s kind: bludgeoning (dao), thunder (djinni), fire (efreeti), or cold (marid).

Thrown Weapon Fighting.name: Thrown Weapon Fighting
Thrown Weapon Fighting.description:
You can draw a weapon that has the thrown property as part of the attack you make with the weapon.

In addition, when you hit with a ranged attack using a thrown weapon, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll.

Guardian: Thunder Gauntlets.name: Guardian: Thunder Gauntlets
Guardian: Thunder Gauntlets.description:
来自护卫魔 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoearmArmorMode]{护甲模式 Armor Model}的雷鸣铁腕。

当你未持握任何物品时，该护甲的每只铁腕视为简易近战武器，命中时造成1d8雷鸣伤害。被铁腕击中的生物在攻击你以外的目标时，其攻击检定具有劣势，直至你的下个回合开始，因为当该生物攻击其他目标时，护甲会魔法性地释放出干扰脉冲。

Foundry 注

此特性包含一个用于追踪被雷鸣铁腕击中的生物的主动效果，作为劣势的提醒，但不会自动应用该效果。

Thunder Gauntlets: Disadvantage.name: Thunder Gauntlets: Disadvantage
Thunder Gauntlets: Disadvantage.description: A creature hit by the gauntlet has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the start of your next turn, as the armor magically emits a distracting pulse when the creature attacks someone else.

Tireless.name: Tireless
Tireless.description:
As an action, you can give yourself a number of temporary hit points equal to 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You can use this action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

In addition, whenever you finish a short rest, your &Reference[exhaustion] level, if any, is decreased by 1.

Transmuted Spell.name: Transmuted Spell
Transmuted Spell.description:
When you cast a spell that deals a type of damage from the following list, you can spend 1 sorcery point to change that damage type to one of the other listed types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, thunder.

Foundry Note

This feature will consume 1 sorcery point but does not handle automatically changing the damage type of a spell.

utility.condition: Cast a spell that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder damage

Twilight Domain.name: Twilight Domain
Twilight Domain.description:
I can’t believe I’m writing this, but I think I could get behind a faith focused on mood lighting and evening wear.

Tasha

The twilit transition from light into darkness often brings calm and even joy, as the day’s labors end and the hours of rest begin. The darkness can also bring terrors, but the gods of twilight guard against the horrors of the night.

Clerics who serve these deities—examples of which appear on the Twilight Deities table—bring comfort to those who seek rest and protect them by venturing into the encroaching darkness to ensure that the dark is a comfort, not a terror.

Twilight Deities

Example Deity

Pantheon

Boldrei

Eberron

Celestian

Greyhawk

Dol Arrah

Eberron

Helm

Forgotten Realms

Ilmater

Forgotten Realms

Mishakal

Dragonlance

Selûne

Forgotten Realms

Yondalla

Halfling

Unarmed Fighting.name: Unarmed Fighting
Unarmed Fighting.description:
Your &Reference[unarmedstrike] can deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier on a hit. If you aren’t wielding any weapons or a shield when you make the attack roll, the d6 becomes a d8.

At the start of each of your turns, you can deal 1d4 bludgeoning damage to one creature grappled by you.

Undying Servitude.name: Undying Servitude
Undying Servitude.description:
Prerequisite: 5th-level warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.oyE5nVppa5mde5gT]{animate dead} without using a spell slot. Once you do so, you can’t cast it in this way again until you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking the free use of Animate Dead.

Warrior.name: 武者
Warrior.description:
A Warrior sidekick grows in martial prowess as it fights by your side. It might be a soldier, a town guard, a battle-trained beast, or any other creature honed for combat.

A sidekick gains the following class features as it gains levels in this class, as summarized on the Warrior table.

Warrior

Level

Proficiency Bonus

Features

1st

+2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorBonus]{Bonus Proficiencies}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorMarti]{Martial Role}

2nd

+2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorSecon]{Second Wind} (1 use)

3rd

+2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorImpro]{Improved Critical}

4th

+2

Ability Score Improvement

5th

+3

—

6th

+3

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorExtra]{Extra Attack} (1 extra)

7th

+3

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorBattl]{Battle Readiness}

8th

+3

Ability Score Improvement

9th

+4

—

10th

+4

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorDefen]{Improved Defense}

11th

+4

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorIndom]{Indomitable}

12th

+4

Ability Score Improvement

13th

+5

—

14th

+5

Ability Score Improvement

15th

+5

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorExtra]{Extra Attack} (2 extra)

16th

+5

Ability Score Improvement

17th

+6

—

18th

+6

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorIndom]{Indomitable} (2 uses)

19th

+6

Ability Score Improvement

20th

+6

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorSecon]{Second Wind} (2 uses)

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Saving Throw
advancement.hint: The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution.

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Skills
advancement.hint: The sidekick gains proficiency in two skills of your choice from the following list: Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival.

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Armor
advancement.hint: The sidekick gains proficiency with all armor.

advancement.title: Bonus Proficiencies: Weapons
advancement.hint: If the sidekick is a humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block, it gains proficiency with shields and all simple and martial weapons.

Battle Readiness.name: Battle Readiness
Battle Readiness.description:
The sidekick has advantage on initiative rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically enables advantage on initiative rolls.

Battle Readiness.name: Battle Readiness
Battle Readiness.description: The sidekick has advantage on initiative rolls.

tcoeWarriorBonus.name: 附赠熟练
tcoeWarriorBonus.description:
The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw of your choice: &Reference[Strength], &Reference[Dexterity], or &Reference[Constitution].

In addition, the sidekick gains proficiency in two skills of your choice from the following list: &Reference[Acrobatics], &Reference[animal-handling], &Reference[Athletics], &Reference[Intimidation], &Reference[Nature], &Reference[Perception], and &Reference[Survival].

The sidekick gains proficiency with all armor, and if it is a humanoid or has a simple or martial weapon in its stat block, it gains proficiency with shields and all simple and martial weapons.

Improved Defense.name: Improved Defense
Improved Defense.description:
The sidekick’s Armor Class increases by 1.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically applies the Armor Class bonus.

Extra Attack.name: Extra Attack
Extra Attack.description:
The sidekick can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

The number of attacks increases to three when the sidekick reaches 15th level.

If the sidekick has the Multiattack action, it can use Extra Attack or Multiattack on a turn, not both.

Improved Critical.name: Improved Critical
Improved Critical.description:
The sidekick’s attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically increases the critical threshold to 19.

Improved Critical.name: Improved Critical
Improved Critical.description: The sidekick’s attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

Indomitable.name: Indomitable
Indomitable.description:
The sidekick can reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new roll. When it uses this feature, it can’t use the feature again until it finishes a long rest.

The sidekick can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 18th level.

Foundry Note

The uses will automatically scale at the relevant levels.

Martial Role.name: Martial Role
Martial Role.description:
每位武者在训练中都专注于攻势或防御。选择以下选项之一：

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorRoleA]{攻击者 Attacker}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeWarriorRoleD]{防御者 Defender}

Attacker.name: Attacker
Attacker.description: The sidekick gains a +2 bonus to all attack rolls.

Attacker.name: Attacker
Attacker.description: The sidekick gains a +2 bonus to all attack rolls.

Defender.name: Defender
Defender.description: The sidekick can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn’t the sidekick, provided the sidekick can see the attacker.

utility.condition: See a creature within 5 feet attacking another creature

Second Wind.name: Second Wind
Second Wind.description:
The sidekick can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level in this class ([[lookup @classes.warrior.system.levels]]). Once it uses this feature, it must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.

The sidekick can use this feature twice between rests starting at 20th level.

Foundry Note

The healing and uses will scale automatically.

Oath of the Watchers.name: Oath of the Watchers
Oath of the Watchers.description:
These paladins aren’t at all up to what I expected. Worse, they send home your party’s best guests.

Tasha

The Oath of the Watchers binds paladins to protect mortal realms from the predations of extraplanar creatures, many of which can lay waste to mortal soldiers. Thus, the Watchers hone their minds, spirits, and bodies to be the ultimate weapons against such threats.

Paladins who follow the Watchers’ oath are ever vigilant in spotting the influence of extraplanar forces, often establishing a network of spies and informants to gather information on suspected cults. To a Watcher, keeping a healthy suspicion and awareness about one’s surroundings is as natural as wearing armor in battle.

Tenets of the Watchers

A paladin who assumes the Oath of the Watchers swears to safeguard mortal realms from otherworldly threats.

Vigilance. Never accept gifts or favors from fiends or those who truck with them. Stay true to your order, your comrades, and your duty.

Loyalty. Face hardships with courage, and encourage your allies to face them with you.

Discipline. You are the shield against the endless terrors that lie beyond the stars. Your blade must be forever sharp and your mind keen to survive what lies beyond.

Channel Divinity: Watcher's Will.name: Channel Divinity: Watcher's Will
Channel Divinity: Watcher's Will.description:
You can use your Channel Divinity to invest your presence with the warding power of your faith. As an action, you can choose a number of creatures you can see within 30 feet of you, up to a number equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature, currently [[max(@abilities.cha.mod,1)]]). For 1 minute, you and the chosen creatures have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used as a reminder but does not automate the above benefits.

Channel Divinity: Watcher's Will.name: Channel Divinity: Watcher's Will
Channel Divinity: Watcher's Will.description: For 1 minute, you and the chosen creatures have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

Path of Wild Magic.name: Path of Wild Magic
Path of Wild Magic.description:
I don’t recommend letting magic take the reins, but I’m not your mom. Live deliciously.

Tasha

Many places in the multiverse abound with beauty, intense emotion, and rampant magic; the Feywild, the Upper Planes, and other realms of supernatural power radiate with such forces and can profoundly influence people. As folk of deep feeling, barbarians are especially susceptible to these wild influences, with some barbarians being transformed by the magic. These magic-suffused barbarians walk the Path of Wild Magic. Elf, tiefling, aasimar, and genasi barbarians often seek this path, eager to manifest the otherworldly magic of their ancestors.

Circle of Wildfire.name: Circle of Wildfire
Circle of Wildfire.description:
I can’t tell you how many times I’ve burned everything to the ground and started over.

Tasha

Druids within the Circle of Wildfire understand that destruction is sometimes the precursor of creation, such as when a forest fire promotes later growth. These druids bond with a primal spirit that harbors both destructive and creative power, allowing the druids to create controlled flames that burn away one thing but give life to another.

Psionic Sorcery.name: Psionic Sorcery
Psionic Sorcery.description:
When you cast any spell of 1st level or higher from your Psionic Spells feature, you can cast it by expending a spell slot as normal or by spending a number of sorcery points equal to the spell’s level. If you cast the spell using sorcery points, it requires no verbal or somatic components, and it requires no material components, unless they are consumed by the spell.

Foundry Note

This feature uses one sorcery point by default. To cast a spell at a higher level manually subtract the points from the Font of Magic feature.

Psychic Defenses.name: Psychic Defenses
Psychic Defenses.description:
You gain resistance to psychic damage, and you have advantage on saving throws against being &Reference[charmed] or &Reference[frightened].

Foundry Note

The damage resistance is added to your sheet automatically by this advancement.

Revelation in Flesh.name: Revelation in Flesh
Revelation in Flesh.description:
You can unleash the aberrant truth hidden within yourself. As a bonus action, you can spend 1 or more sorcery points to magically transform your body for 10 minutes. For each sorcery point you spend, you can gain one of the following benefits of your choice, the effects of which last until the transformation ends:

  • You can see any &Reference[invisible] creature within 60 feet of you, provided it isn’t behind &Reference[total-cover]. Your eyes also turn black or become writhing sensory tendrils.

  • You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed, and you can hover. As you fly, your skin glistens with mucus or shines with an otherworldly light.

  • You gain a swimming speed equal to twice your walking speed, and you can breathe underwater. Moreover, gills grow from your neck or fan out from behind your ears, your fingers become webbed, or you grow writhing cilia that extend through your clothing.

  • Your body, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, becomes slimy and pliable. You can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing, and you can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being &Reference[grappled].

Foundry Note

You can track which of these effects are active with the Active Effects on this feature but they do not automate the changes.

This feature defaults to use 1 sorcery point. You can either use this feature for each effect you'd like to activate or manually reduce the Font of Magic feature for the number of effects you would like to use.

Revelation in Flesh: Vision.name: Revelation in Flesh: Vision
Revelation in Flesh: Vision.description: You can see any &Reference[invisible] creature within 60 feet of you, provided it isn’t behind &Reference[total-cover]. Your eyes also turn black or become writhing sensory tendrils.

Revelation in Flesh: Flying.name: Revelation in Flesh: Flying
Revelation in Flesh: Flying.description: You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed, and you can hover. As you fly, your skin glistens with mucus or shines with an otherworldly light.

Revelation in Flesh: Swimming.name: Revelation in Flesh: Swimming
Revelation in Flesh: Swimming.description: You gain a swimming speed equal to twice your walking speed, and you can breathe underwater. Moreover, gills grow from your neck or fan out from behind your ears, your fingers become webbed, or you grow writhing cilia that extend through your clothing.

Revelation in Flesh: Slimy.name: Revelation in Flesh: Slimy
Revelation in Flesh: Slimy.description: Your body, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, becomes slimy and pliable. You can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing, and you can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being &Reference[grappled].

Psionic Spells.name: Psionic Spells
Psionic Spells.description:
当你达到本职业的特定等级时，你会如灵能法术表所示习得一些额外法术。这些法术均视为你的术士法术，且不计入你的已知术士法术总数中。

每当你提升一个术士等级时，你可以将该特性赋予你的一个法术替换为同环阶的另一个法术。新法术必须是从术士、魔契师或法师法术列表中选择的预言系或附魔系法术。

术士等级

法术

1环

哈达之臂 Arms of Hadar、不谐低语 Dissonant Whispers、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeMindSliver00]{心灵刺缠}

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj]{安定心神 Calm Emotions}、@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]{侦测思想 Detect Thoughts}

5环

哈达之欲 Hunger of Hadar、@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GtGjNjPBgUHxGYAD]{短讯术 Sending}

7环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DGONTFbk5eORs5qv]{艾伐黑触手 Evard's Black Tentacles}、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonAberra]{召唤异怪 Summon Aberration}

9环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uAwtVZkiSTyP6ORB]{拉瑞心灵联结 Rary's Telepathic Bond}、@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.HQfd7jJyULIoGxrZ]{心灵遥控 Telekinesis}

Telepathic Speech.name: Telepathic Speech
Telepathic Speech.description:
You can form a telepathic connection between your mind and the mind of another. As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. You and the chosen creature can speak telepathically with each other while the two of you are within a number of miles of each other equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1 mile, currently [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]). To understand each other, you each must speak mentally in a language the other knows.

The telepathic connection lasts for a number of minutes equal to your sorcerer level (currently [[lookup @classes.sorcerer.system.levels]]). It ends early if you are &Reference[incapacitated] or die or if you use this ability to form a connection with a different creature.

Warping Implosion.name: Warping Implosion
Warping Implosion.description:
You can unleash your aberrant power as a space-warping anomaly. As an action, you can teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of you. Immediately after you disappear, each creature within 30 feet of the space you left must make a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d10 force damage and is pulled straight toward the space you left, ending in an unoccupied space as close to your former space as possible. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn’t pulled.

Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you spend 5 sorcery points to use it again.

Foundry Note

This feature integrates the Strength saving throw, the force damage, and allows you to place a measured template to mark where your Token was previously and to make it easier to identify affected creatures. It allows one free usage and if you would like to use it again you can use the "Consume Resource" button in the chat card.

Alchemical Savant.name: Alchemical Savant
Alchemical Savant.description:
You’ve developed masterful command of magical chemicals, enhancing the healing and damage you create through them. Whenever you cast a spell using your alchemist’s supplies as the spellcasting focus, you gain a bonus to one roll of the spell. That roll must restore hit points or be a damage roll that deals acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage, and the bonus equals your Intelligence modifier (currently [[lookup @abilities.int.mod]], minimum of +1).

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the additional roll.

Chemical Mastery.name: Chemical Mastery
Chemical Mastery.description:
You have been exposed to so many chemicals that they pose little risk to you, and you can use them to quickly end certain ailments:

You gain resistance to acid damage and poison damage, and you are immune to the &Reference[poisoned] condition.

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.qcYitWoSMTnKkzM1]{heal} without expending a spell slot, without preparing the spell, and without material components, provided you use alchemist’s supplies as the spellcasting focus. Once you cast either spell with this feature, you can’t cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

You are automatically given the resistances and immunities as part of this advancement.

The Greater Restoration and Heal spells are granted to you at this level as Always Prepared spells with the correct number of limited uses.

Experimental Elixir.name: Experimental Elixir
Experimental Elixir.description:
每当你完成一次{长休 long rest}时，你可以魔法性地在一个你{触及 touch}的空@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-magic-items.Item.tcoeFlask0000000]{烧瓶}中制造出一份实验药剂。在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeExperimental]{实验药剂 Experimental Elixir}表格上{骰 roll}出药剂的效果，该效果在某人饮用药剂时触发。作为一个{动作 action}，一个{生物 creature}可以饮用该药剂或将其喂给一个&Reference[incapacitated]{失能 incapacitated}生物。

你可以通过{消耗 consume}一个{1环 1st}或更高{法术位 spell slot}来制造额外的实验药剂。当你这样做时，你使用你的{动作 action}在你{触及 touch}的一个空烧瓶中制造药剂，并且你从下方的实验药剂表格中选择药剂的效果。

制造实验药剂需要你随身携带@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SztwZhbhZeCqyAes]{炼金工具 alchemist's supplies}，并且你通过此{特性 feature}制造的任何药剂都会持续到被饮用或直到你的下一次{长休 long rest}结束。

{当你达到本职业的特定等级时 when you reach certain levels in this class}，你可以在一次{长休 long rest}结束时制造更多药剂：在{6环 6th}时两个，在15级时三个。为每个药剂的效果分别{骰 roll}。每个药剂都需要其自己的烧瓶。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeExperimental caption=false]

Foundry 注 Foundry Note

此{特性 feature}会自动调整免费使用次数，但不会自动化用于额外使用的{法术位 spell slot}{消耗 consume}。要将其与{法术位 spell slot}一起使用，请取消勾选使用后将出现的"{消耗 consume}可用使用次数"框，并手动减少你的{法术位 spell slot}。

要创建实验药剂，你可以将上述任一药剂拖到你的角色卡上，或者使用此{特性 feature}包含的附魔。烧瓶物品应为与这些附魔一起使用的消耗品。

changes.name: Healing Elixir
changes.system.description.value: The drinker regains a number of hit points equal to [[/r 2d4 + @abilities.int.mod]].

changes.name: Swiftness Elixir
changes.system.description.value:
The drinker’s walking speed increases by 10 feet for 1 hour.

Foundry Note

This elixir includes an Active Effect that will increase your walking speed.

changes.name: Resilience Elixir
changes.system.description.value:
The drinker gains a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes.

Foundry Note

This potion includes an Active Effect which grants the AC bonus.

changes.name: Boldness Elixir
changes.system.description.value: The drinker can roll a [[/r d4]] and add the number rolled to every attack roll and saving throw they make for the next minute.

changes.name: Flight Elixir
changes.system.description.value:
The drinker gains a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes.

Foundry Note

This elixir includes an Active Effect which grants the flying speed. It does not automatically expire.

o7bBh25LXZDTJCQC.name: Swiftness Elixir
o7bBh25LXZDTJCQC.description: The drinker’s walking speed increases by 10 feet for 1 hour.

2ybMzNqFDrBOZdFB.name: Resilience Elixir
2ybMzNqFDrBOZdFB.description: The drinker gains a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes.

N0mXaMNVch7Rukh5.name: Flight Elixir
N0mXaMNVch7Rukh5.description: The drinker gains a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes.

changes.name: Transformation Elixir
changes.system.description.value: The drinker’s body is transformed as if by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8RTDOt80u8aBv9qx]{alter self} spell. The drinker determines the transformation caused by the spell, the effects of which last for 10 minutes.

Restorative Reagents.name: Restorative Reagents
Restorative Reagents.description:
你可以将一些恢复性试剂融入你的作品中：

每当一个生物饮用你创造的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoealcExperimen]{实验药剂} 时，该生物获得等于 [[/r 2d6 + @abilities.int.mod]] 的临时生命值（至少1点临时生命值）。

你可以使用炼金工具作为法器，在不消耗法术位且无需准备法术的情况下施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{次级复原术 lesser restoration}。你可以这样做的次数等于你的智力调整值（至少一次），且当你完成一次长休后重新获得所有已使用的次数。

Foundry 注

次级复原术法术在此等级作为常备法术授予你，并带有正确的使用次数限制。

当你的实验药剂被使用时，你可以使用此特性来添加临时治疗。

Alchemist Spells.name: Alchemist Spells
Alchemist Spells.description:
You always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Alchemist Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they don’t count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

Artificer Level

Spell

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.o8Dh7fblk1d16tnO], Ray of Sickness

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FjYE214HTERCRZNm], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4H6YgYdKgnX6ZQ8M]{Melf's Acid Arrow}

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz]}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.34ddoYIrnOZ2GFYi]

13th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.VtCXMdyM6mAdIJZb]

17th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LkvI11Uue774QBKZ], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.AGFMPAmuzwWO6Dfz]

Tool Proficiency.name: 工具熟练
Tool Proficiency.description:
3rd-level Alchemist feature

You gain proficiency with alchemist’s supplies. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of artisan’s tools of your choice.

Arcane Armor.name: Arcane Armor
Arcane Armor.description:
Your metallurgical pursuits have led to you making armor a conduit for your magic. As an action, you can turn a suit of armor you are wearing into Arcane Armor, provided you have @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.KndVe2insuctjIaj]{smith’s tools} in hand.

You gain the following benefits while wearing this armor:

  • If the armor normally has a Strength requirement, the arcane armor lacks this requirement for you.

  • You can use the arcane armor as a spellcasting focus for your artificer spells.

  • The armor attaches to you and can’t be removed against your will. It also expands to cover your entire body, although you can retract or deploy the helmet as a bonus action. The armor replaces any missing limbs, functioning identically to a limb it replaces.

  • You can doff or don the armor as an action.

The armor continues to be Arcane Armor until you don another suit of armor or you die.

Foundry Note

Enchanting a set of armor with this feature will automatically remove the Strength requirement and grant you the following items:

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeDefensiveFie]{Guardian: Defensive Field}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeThunderGaunt]{Guardian: Thunder Gauntlets}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeDampeningFie]{Infiltrator: Dampening Field}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeArmLightning]{Infiltrator: Lightning Launcher}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePoweredSteps]{Infiltrator: Powered Steps}

changes.system.description.value:
You gain the following benefits while wearing this armor:

  • If the armor normally has a Strength requirement, the arcane armor lacks this requirement for you.

  • You can use the arcane armor as a spellcasting focus for your artificer spells.

  • The armor attaches to you and can’t be removed against your will. It also expands to cover your entire body, although you can retract or deploy the helmet as a bonus action. The armor replaces any missing limbs, functioning identically to a limb it replaces.

  • You can doff or don the armor as an action.

The armor continues to be Arcane Armor until you don another suit of armor or you die.

Foundry Note

Enchanting a set of armor with this feature will automatically remove the Strength requirement.

Armor Model.name: Armor Model
Armor Model.description:
You can customize your @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoearmArcaneArm]{Arcane Armor}. When you do so, choose one of the following armor models: Guardian or Infiltrator. The model you choose gives you special benefits while you wear it.

Each model includes a special weapon. When you attack with that weapon, you can add your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, to the attack and damage rolls.

You can change the armor’s model whenever you finish a short or long rest, provided you have @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.KndVe2insuctjIaj]{smith's tools} in hand.

Guardian. You design your armor to be in the front line of conflict. It has the following features:

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeThunderGaunt]{Thunder Gauntlets}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeDefensiveFie]{Defensive Field}

Infiltrator. You customize your armor for subtle undertakings. It has the following features:

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeArmLightning]{Lightning Launcher}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePoweredSteps]{Powered Steps}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeDampeningFie]{Dampening Field}

Foundry Note

The Guardian and Infiltrator items are granted as Items when you enchant a piece of armor with this feature and removed when you disenchant them.

changes.name: {}, Guardian Armor
changes.system.description.value:
Guardian. You design your armor to be in the front line of conflict. It has the following features:

[[/item Guardian: Thunder Gauntlets]]. Each of the armor’s gauntlets counts as a simple melee weapon while you aren’t holding anything in it, and it deals 1d8 thunder damage on a hit. A creature hit by the gauntlet has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the start of your next turn, as the armor magically emits a distracting pulse when the creature attacks someone else.

[[/item Guardian: Defensive Field]]. As a bonus action, you can gain temporary hit points equal to your level in this class, replacing any temporary hit points you already have. You lose these temporary hit points if you doff the armor. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

changes.name: {}, Infiltrator
changes.system.description.value:
Infiltrator. You have customized your armor for subtle undertakings. It has the following features:

[[/item Infiltrator: Lightning Launcher]]. A gemlike node appears on one of your armored fists or on the chest (your choice). It counts as a simple ranged weapon, with a normal range of 90 feet and a long range of 300 feet, and it deals 1d6 lightning damage on a hit. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with it, you can deal an extra 1d6 lightning damage to that target.

[[/item Powered Steps]]. Your walking speed increases by 5 feet.

[[/item Infiltrator: Dampening Field]]. You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on such checks, the advantage and disadvantage cancel each other, as normal.

tcoearmExtraAtta.name: 额外攻击
tcoearmExtraAtta.description: You can attack twice, rather than once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Armor Modifications.name: Armor Modifications
Armor Modifications.description:
You learn how to use your artificer infusions to specially modify your @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoearmArcaneArm]{Arcane Armor}. That armor now counts as separate items for the purposes of your Infuse Item feature: armor (the chest piece), boots, helmet, and the armor’s special weapon. Each of those items can bear one of your infusions, and the infusions transfer over if you change your armor’s model with the Armor Model feature. In addition, the maximum number of items you can infuse at once increases by 2, but those extra items must be part of your Arcane Armor.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically increases the maximum number of items you can infuse but does not automate enforcement of the additional pieces being part of your armor.

Armor Modifications.name: Armor Modifications
Armor Modifications.description: The maximum number of items you can infuse at once increases by 2, but those extra items must be part of your arcane armor.

Perfected Armor.name: Perfected Armor
Perfected Armor.description:
Your Arcane Armor gains additional benefits based on its model, as shown below.

Guardian. When a Huge or smaller creature you can see ends its turn within 30 feet of you, you can use your reaction to magically force it to make a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, you pull the creature up to 25 feet directly to an unoccupied space. If you pull the target to a space within 5 feet of you, you can make a melee weapon attack against it as part of this reaction.

You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

Infiltrator. Any creature that takes lightning damage from your Lightning Launcher glimmers with magical light until the start of your next turn. The glimmering creature sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls against you, as the light jolts it if it attacks you. In addition, the next attack roll against it has advantage, and if that attack hits, the target takes an extra [[/damage 1d6 type=lightning]] damage.

Foundry Note

The reaction, saving throw, and limited uses for the Guardian version is integrated as part of this feature.

It also includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking creatures damaged by your Lightning Launcher though it does not automate its other effects.

Lightning Glimmer.name: Lightning Glimmer
Lightning Glimmer.description: This creature has been damaged by the Lightning Launcher glimmers with magical light until the start of your next turn. The glimmering creature sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls against you, as the light jolts it if it attacks you. In addition, the next attack roll against it has advantage, and if that attack hits, the target takes an extra [[/damage 1d6 type=lightning]] damage.

Armorer Spells.name: 装甲师法术
Armorer Spells.description:
You always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Armorer Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they don’t count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

Artificer Level

Spell

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]{Magic Missile}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ]{Thunderwave}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz]{Mirror Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wJKpSvSTbSkTjqyb]{Shatter}

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.6g3WLOZ2u0EbaLAd]{Hypnotic Pattern}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.IyikgTEOTv701jgQ]{Lightning Bolt}

13th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.avD5XUtkBPQQR97c]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ]{Greater Invisibility}

17th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.d9MwcXi7Il3HROXd]{Passwall}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb]{Wall of Force}

Tools of the Trade.name: Tools of the Trade
Tools of the Trade.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor. You also gain proficiency with smith’s tools. If you already have this tool proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of artisan’s tools of your choice.

Arcane Firearm.name: Arcane Firearm
Arcane Firearm.description:
You know how to turn a wand, staff, or rod into an arcane firearm, a conduit for your destructive spells. When you finish a long rest, you can use woodcarver’s tools to carve special sigils into a wand, staff, or rod and thereby turn it into your arcane firearm. The sigils disappear from the object if you later carve them on a different item. The sigils otherwise last indefinitely.

You can use your arcane firearm as a spellcasting focus for your artificer spells. When you cast an artificer spell through the firearm, roll a [[/r d8]], and you gain a bonus to one of the spell’s damage rolls equal to the number rolled.

changes.name: Arcane Firearm
changes.system.description.value: This item has has been turned into an Arcane Firearm. You can use your arcane firearm as a spellcasting focus for your artificer spells. When you cast an artificer spell through the firearm, roll a [[/r d8]], and you gain a bonus to one of the spell’s damage rolls equal to the number rolled.

Eldritch Cannon.name: Eldritch Cannon
Eldritch Cannon.description:
You’ve learned how to create a magical cannon. Using @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.xKErqkLo4ASYr5EP]{woodcarver’s tools} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.KndVe2insuctjIaj]{smith’s tools}, you can take an action to magically create a Small or Tiny eldritch cannon in an unoccupied space on a horizontal surface within 5 feet of you. A Small eldritch cannon occupies its space, and a Tiny one can be held in one hand.

Once you create a cannon, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest or until you expend a spell slot to create one. You can have only one cannon at a time and can’t create one while your cannon is present.

The cannon is a magical object. Regardless of size, the cannon has an AC of 18 and a number of hit points equal to five times your artificer level. It is immune to poison damage and psychic damage. If it is forced to make an ability check or a saving throw, treat all its ability scores as 10 (+0). If the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL]{mending} spell is cast on it, it regains [[/r 2d6]] hit points. It disappears if it is reduced to 0 hit points or after 1 hour. You can dismiss it early as an action.

When you create the cannon, you determine its appearance and whether it has legs. You also decide which type it is, choosing from the options on the Eldritch Cannons table. On each of your turns, you can take a bonus action to cause the cannon to activate if you are within 60 feet of it. As part of the same bonus action, you can direct the cannon to walk or climb up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space, provided it has legs.

Cannon

Activation

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeArtFlamethro]{Flamethrower}

The cannon exhales fire in an adjacent 15-foot cone that you designate. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, taking 2d8 fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeArtForceBall]{Force Ballista}

Make a ranged spell attack, originating from the cannon, at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the cannon.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeArtProtector]{Protector}

The cannon emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and each creature of your choice within 10 feet of it a number of temporary hit points equal to 1d8 + your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

Foundry Note

This feature is configured to summon the Eldritch Cannon of your choice and place it on the Scene. Their feature can be used from its character sheet. When you reach Artificer level 9 it will automatically upgrade new summons to their Explosive variants.

Explosive Cannon.name: Explosive Cannon
Explosive Cannon.description:
你创造的每门魔导炮现在都更具毁灭性：

  • 魔导炮的所有伤害骰都增加1d8。

  • 以一个动作，若你处于魔导炮60尺范围内，可命令其自爆。此举会摧毁魔导炮，并迫使20尺内的所有生物进行对抗你法术豁免DC的敏捷豁免，豁免失败者承受3d8力场伤害，成功则伤害减半。

炮型

启动效果

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeExplosiveFla]{爆裂火焰喷射器 Explosive Flamethrower}

魔导炮向你指定的相邻15尺锥形区域喷吐火焰。区域内每个生物必须进行对抗你法术豁免DC的敏捷豁免，豁免失败承受2d8火焰伤害，成功则伤害减半。火焰会引燃区域内未被穿戴或携带的可燃物。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeExplosiveFor]{爆裂力场弩炮 Explosive Force Ballista}

以魔导炮为原点，对120尺内单一生物或物件发动远程法术攻击。命中时目标承受2d8力场伤害，若目标为生物，则被推离魔导炮至多5尺。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeExplosivePro]{爆裂守护者 Explosive Protector}

魔导炮迸发正能量，使其自身与你指定的10尺内所有生物获得临时生命值，数值等于1d8+你的智力调整值（最低+1）。

Foundry 注

自爆豁免与伤害已在此特性中实现。

魔导炮特性现已配置为召唤所选爆裂版魔导炮并放置于场景。其特性可从角色面板中使用。

Flash of Genius.name: Flash of Genius
Flash of Genius.description:
7th-level artificer feature

You’ve gained the ability to come up with solutions under pressure. When you or another creature you can see within 30 feet of you makes an ability check or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to add your Intelligence modifier ([[lookup @abilities.int.mod]]) to the roll.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier ([[lookup @abilities.int.mod]], minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

utility.condition: You or a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an ability check or saving throw

Fortified Position.name: Fortified Position
Fortified Position.description:
你是使用魔能火炮{魔能火炮 Eldritch Cannon}构筑防御工事的大师：

  • 由于魔能火炮散发出的魔法防护灵光，你和你的盟友在距离你通过魔能火炮创造的任何一门火炮10尺范围内时拥有半身掩护{半身掩护 half cover}。

  • 你现在可以同时拥有两门火炮。你可以用同一个动作{动作 Action}（但非法术位{法术位 spell slot}）创造两门火炮，并且你可以用同一个附赠动作{附赠动作 Bonus Action}激活它们。你可以决定这两门火炮是相同还是不同。当你拥有两门火炮时，你无法创造第三门。

Foundry 注

要召唤第二门魔能火炮，请重新使用魔能火炮特性{特性 Feature}，并取消勾选“消耗{消耗 Consume}可用使用次数？”。

10尺半身掩护{半身掩护 half cover}灵光{灵光 Aura}未自动化。

Infuse Item.name: Infuse Item
Infuse Item.description:
2环工匠特性

你获得了为普通物品注入特定魔法注能的能力，将这些物件转变为魔法物品。

已知注能

当你获得此特性时，从职业描述末尾的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-content.JournalEntry.tcoeArtificer000.JournalEntryPage.JwSjzW6J4upFpIgY]{工匠注能 Artificer Infusions}章节中选择四个工匠注能进行学习。当你达到本职业的特定等级时，如工匠表的已知注能栏所示，你将学会更多自选的注能。

每当你在此职业中提升一个等级，你可以将一个已学的工匠注能替换为一个新的注能。

注能物品

每当你完成一次长休，你可以触碰一个非魔法物件并为其注入你的一个工匠注能，将其转变为魔法物品。注能仅对特定类型的物件生效，具体见注能描述。如果该物品需要同调，你可以在注能物品的瞬间立即与之同调。如果你决定稍后再同调该物品，则必须使用正常的同调流程（见@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.t6scHTmpmHBTZGTX.JournalEntryPage.YHsuCV4IZZZoyDap#attunement]{同调规则 attunement rules}）。

你的注能会永久存留在物品中，但当你死亡时，注能会在等同于你智力调整值的天数（至少1天）后消失。如果你替换了该注能的知识，注能也会消失。

你可以在长休结束时为多个非魔法物件注能；最大注能物件数量见@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeArtificer000]{工匠 Artificer}表的注能物品栏（当前为[[lookup @scale.artificer.infusions]]）。你必须触碰每个物件，且每个注能同时只能存在于一个物件中。此外，任何物件同时不能承载超过一个你的注能。若你试图超过最大注能数量，最旧的注能会结束，然后新的注能生效。

若注能结束于一个容纳其他物品的物件（例如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.aDHRuUs29SrumWfq]{次元袋 bag of holding}），其内容物会无害地出现在该物件所在及周围的空间。

Foundry 注

此特性配置的使用次数等于你可同时激活的注能数量。初始值为0，每次使用注能时会增加1。

changes.system.description.value: This item is being tracked as an infusion.

Magical Tinkering.name: Magical Tinkering
Magical Tinkering.description:
1st-level artificer feature

You’ve learned how to invest a spark of magic into mundane objects. To use this ability, you must have @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.woWZ1sO5IUVGzo58] tools or artisan's tools in hand. You then touch a Tiny nonmagical object as an action and give it one of the following magical properties of your choice:

  • The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

  • Whenever tapped by a creature, the object emits a recorded message that can be heard up to 10 feet away. You utter the message when you bestow this property on the object, and the recording can be no more than 6 seconds long.

  • The object continuously emits your choice of an odor or a nonverbal sound (wind, waves, chirping, or the like). The chosen phenomenon is perceivable up to 10 feet away.

  • A static visual effect appears on one of the object’s surfaces. This effect can be a picture, up to 25 words of text, lines and shapes, or a mixture of these elements, as you like.

The chosen property lasts indefinitely. As an action, you can touch the object and end the property early.

You can bestow magic on multiple objects, touching one object each time you use this feature, though a single object can only bear one property at a time. The maximum number of objects you can affect with this feature at one time is equal to your Intelligence modifier (Currently [[lookup @abilities.int.mod]], minimum of one object). If you try to exceed your maximum, the oldest property immediately ends, and then the new property applies.

Foundry Note

This feature includes enchantments for tracking the above options.

Light.name: Light
Light.description: The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

Sound.name: Sound
Sound.description: Whenever tapped by a creature, the object emits a recorded message that can be heard up to 10 feet away. You utter the message when you bestow this property on the object, and the recording can be no more than 6 seconds long.

Smell/Non-Verbal Sound.name: Smell/Non-Verbal Sound
Smell/Non-Verbal Sound.description: The object continuously emits your choice of an odor or a nonverbal sound (wind, waves, chirping, or the like). The chosen phenomenon is perceivable up to 10 feet away.

Visual.name: Visual
Visual.description: A static visual effect appears on one of the object’s surfaces. This effect can be a picture, up to 25 words of text, lines and shapes, or a mixture of these elements, as you like.

Soul of Artifice.name: Soul of Artifice
Soul of Artifice.description:
20th-level artificer feature

You have developed a mystical connection to your magic items, which you can draw on for protection:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to all saving throws per magic item you are currently attuned to.

  • If you’re reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can use your reaction to end one of your artificer infusions, causing you to drop to 1 hit point instead of 0.

Foundry Note

The +1 to saving throws is handled automatically by this feature.

utility.condition: Reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright

Soul of Artifice.name: Soul of Artifice
Soul of Artifice.description: You gain a +1 bonus to all saving throws per magic item you are currently attuned to.

Artificer Specialist.name: 奇械师子职
Artificer Specialist.description:
3环工匠特性

选择你的专家类型：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeAlchemist000]{炼金师 Alchemist}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeArmorer00000]{护甲师 Armorer}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeArtillerist0]{炮兵 Artillerist}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBattleSmith0]{战斗铁匠 Battle Smith}。你的选择将在5环, 9环和15环时再次赋予你特性。

tcoeartSpellcast.name: 施法
tcoeartSpellcast.description:
1级奇械师特性

你研究过魔法的运作原理以及如何施法,通过物品引导魔法。在旁观者看来,你并非以传统方式施法;你似乎是从普通物品和奇特的发明中创造出奇迹。

所需工具

你通过工具产生奇械师法术效果。当你使用此施法特性施展任何法术时(意味着该法术在你施放时具有"M"部件),你必须手持一件法器——具体而言是盗贼工具或某种工匠工具。你必须熟练于该工具才能以此方式使用它。有关这些工具的描述,请参阅装备章节的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.BYFd9hiJGo9L5aOM.JournalEntryPage.Rs0xLMFGbcCkEhuA]{工具}部分。

当你在2级获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeartInfuseIte]{注能物品}特性后,你也可以使用任何带有你注能的物品作为法器。

奇械魔法

作为奇械师,你在施法时使用工具。在描述你的施法时,请思考你如何使用工具。例如,如果你使用炼金工具施展{疗伤术 cure wounds},你可能是在快速制作药膏。如果你使用修补工具施展它,你可能有一个能包扎伤口的小型机械蜘蛛。无论哪种方式,法术的效果都是相同的。

此类细节不会以任何方式限制你,也不会在法术效果之外为你提供任何效益。你无需证明你如何使用工具施法。但创造性地描述你的施法是一种有趣的方式,使你与其他施法者区分开来。

戏法

你知晓自选的来自@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-content.JournalEntry.tcoeSpellLists00.JournalEntryPage.btQIVPtSLQewCrTZ]{奇械师法术列表}的两个戏法。在更高等级,你学习自选的额外奇械师戏法,如奇械师表格的"已知戏法"栏所示。

当你在该职业中升级时,你可以将你已知的一个奇械师戏法替换为奇械师法术列表中的另一个戏法。

准备与施展法术

奇械师表格显示了你拥有多少法术位来施展你的奇械师法术。要施展一个1环或更高环阶的奇械师法术,你必须消耗一个等于或高于该法术环阶的法术位。当你完成一次长休后,你恢复所有已消耗的法术位。

你准备可供你施展的奇械师法术列表,从@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-content.JournalEntry.tcoeSpellLists00.JournalEntryPage.btQIVPtSLQewCrTZ]{奇械师法术列表}中选择。当你这样做时,选择数量等于你的智力调整值+你的奇械师等级的一半(向下取整,至少一个法术)的奇械师法术。这些法术必须是你拥有法术位的环阶。

例如,如果你是一个5级奇械师,你拥有四个1环和两个2环法术位。智力为14时,你准备的法术列表可以包括四个1环或2环法术,任意组合。如果你准备了1环法术{疗伤术 cure wounds},你可以使用1环或2环法术位施展它。施展该法术不会将其从你准备的法术列表中移除。

当你完成一次长休后,你可以更改你准备的法术列表。准备一个新的奇械师法术列表需要花费时间摆弄你的法器:列表中的每个法术每环阶至少1分钟。

施法关键属性

智力是你奇械师法术的施法关键属性;你对魔法背后理论的理解使你能够以高超的技巧运用这些法术。每当奇械师法术提及你的施法关键属性时,你使用你的智力。此外,当你设定你所施展的奇械师法术的豁免DC时,以及当你使用奇械师法术进行攻击检定时,你使用你的智力调整值。

法术豁免DC = 8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的智力调整值

法术攻击调整值 = 你的熟练加值 + 你的智力调整值

仪式施法

如果一个奇械师法术具有仪式烙印且你准备了该法术,你可以将其作为仪式施展。

Artillerist Spells.name: Artillerist Spells
Artillerist Spells.description:
You always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Artillerist Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they don’t count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.

Artificer Level

Spell

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ]{Thunderwave}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7u2obDvuvtZBkTfq]{Scorching Ray}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wJKpSvSTbSkTjqyb]{Shatter}

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{Fireball}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ew6GA8dJy2spQmFW]{Wind Wall}

Spell-Storing Item.name: Spell-Storing Item
Spell-Storing Item.description:
11th-level artificer feature

You can now store a spell in an object. Whenever you finish a long rest, you can touch one simple or martial weapon or one item that you can use as a spellcasting focus, and you store a spell in it, choosing a 1st- or 2nd-level spell from the artificer spell list that requires 1 action to cast (you needn’t have it prepared).

While holding the object, a creature can take an action to produce the spell’s effect from it, using your spellcasting ability modifier. If the spell requires concentration, the creature must concentrate. The spell stays in the object until it’s been used a number of times equal to twice your Intelligence modifier ([[lookup @abilities.int.mod]], minimum of twice) or until you use this feature again to store a spell in an object.

changes.name: , Spell Storing
changes.system.description.value: This item has had a spell stored within it.

The Right Tool for the Job.name: The Right Tool for the Job
The Right Tool for the Job.description:
3环工匠特性

你学会了如何精确制造所需的工具：手持盗贼工具或工匠工具时，你能在5尺内一个未占据空间魔法性地创造出一套工匠工具。此创造过程需要1小时不间断工作，可与短休或长休同时进行。虽然由魔法产生，但这些工具本身是非魔法的，且当你再次使用此特性时它们会消失。

工匠工具

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SztwZhbhZeCqyAes]{炼金工具 Alchemist's Supplies}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.Y9S75go1hLMXUD48]{酿酒工具 Brewer's Supplies}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.jhjo20QoiD5exf09]{书法工具 Calligrapher's Supplies}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.8NS6MSOdXtUqD7Ib]{木匠工具 Carpenter's Tools}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.YfBwELTgPFHmQdHh]{珠宝匠工具 Jeweler's Tools}
