Tool Expertise.name: Tool Expertise
Tool Expertise.description:
6th-level artificer feature

Your proficiency bonus is now doubled for any ability check you make that uses your proficiency with a tool.

Foundry Note

The proficiency bonus doubling is handled automatically.

tcoeartToolProfi.name: 工具熟练
tcoeartToolProfi.description: You gain proficiency with woodcarver’s tools. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of artisan’s tools of your choice.

Arms of the Astral Self.name: Arms of the Astral Self
Arms of the Astral Self.description:
你对气的掌控使你能够召唤一部分的星界自我。以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗1点气来召唤你的星界自我的双臂。当你这样做时，你所能看见的、在你周围10尺内的每个你选择的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到等于你两次武艺骰掷骰结果的力场伤害。

这些虚体手臂会在接下来的10分钟内悬浮在你的肩旁或环绕着你的手臂（由你选择）。你决定这些手臂的外形，并且如果你陷入&Reference[incapacitated]或死亡，它们会提前消失。

当这些虚体手臂存在时，你获得以下效益：

  • 当你进行力量检定和力量豁免时，你可以用你的感知调整值代替你的力量调整值。

  • 你可以使用这些虚体手臂来发动[[/item Unarmed Strike]]{徒手打击 unarmed strikes}}。

  • 当你在你的回合使用这些手臂发动徒手打击时，其触及范围比正常情况增加5尺。

  • 你使用这些手臂发动的徒手打击，在攻击检定和伤害掷骰中可以用你的感知调整值代替你的力量或敏捷调整值，并且其伤害类型为力场。

Foundry 注

附赠动作、豁免及其伤害效果以及气点消耗均在此特性中实现。

徒手打击的变更效果在同样在此等级授予的“虚体徒手打击”特性中实现。

如果你希望你的力量检定和豁免使用你的感知调整值，你可以将此特性的主动效果应用至你的令牌上。请注意，它不会在十分钟后自动失效。

Arms of the Astral Self.name: Arms of the Astral Self
Arms of the Astral Self.description:
For 10 minutes, these spectral arms hover near your shoulders or surround your arms (your choice). You determine the arms’ appearance, and they vanish early if you are &Reference[incapacitated] or die.

While the spectral arms are present, you gain the following benefits:

  • You can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier when making Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

  • You can use the spectral arms to make unarmed strikes.

  • When you make an unarmed strike with the arms on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

  • The unarmed strikes you make with the arms can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls, and their damage type is force.

Awakened Astral Self.name: Awakened Astral Self
Awakened Astral Self.description:
Your connection to your astral self is complete, allowing you to unleash its full potential. As a bonus action, you can spend 5 ki points to summon the arms, visage, and body of your astral self and awaken it for 10 minutes. This awakening ends early if you are incapacitated or die.

While your astral self is awakened, you gain the following benefits.

Armor of the Spirit. You gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class.

Astral Barrage. Whenever you use the Extra Attack feature to attack twice, you can instead attack three times if all the attacks are made with your astral arms.

Foundry Note

The Armor of the Spirit AC bonus is implemented as an Active Effect on this feature.

Armor of the Spirit.name: Armor of the Spirit
Armor of the Spirit.description: You gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class. Granted by Awakened Astral Self.

Body of the Astral Self.name: Body of the Astral Self
Body of the Astral Self.description:
When you have both your astral arms and visage summoned, you can cause the body of your astral self to appear (no action required). This spectral body covers your physical form like a suit of armor, connecting with the arms and visage. You determine its appearance.

While the spectral body is present, you gain the following benefits.

Deflect Energy. When you take acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to deflect it. When you do so, the damage you take is reduced by [[/r 1d10 + @abilities.wis.mod]] (minimum reduction of 1).

Empowered Arms. Once on each of your turns when you hit a target with the Arms of the Astral Self, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to your Martial Arts die (currently [[/r max(@scale.monk.die,1)]]).

Foundry Note

The damage for Empowered Arms has been implemented in this feature. An Active Effect has been added for tracking Body of the Astral Self's usage but it does not automate the damage reduction.

damage.condition: When you hit a target with the Arms of the Astral Self

Deflect Energy.name: Deflect Energy
Deflect Energy.description: When you take acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to deflect it. When you do so, the damage you take is reduced by 1d10 + @abilities.wis.mod (minimum reduction of 1).

Visage of the Astral Self.name: Visage of the Astral Self
Visage of the Astral Self.description:
You can summon the visage of your astral self. As a bonus action, or as part of the bonus action you take to activate Arms of the Astral Self, you can spend 1 ki point to summon this visage for 10 minutes. It vanishes early if you are &Reference[incapacitated] or die.

The spectral visage covers your face like a helmet or mask. You determine its appearance.

While the spectral visage is present, you gain the following benefits.

Astral Sight. You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

Wisdom of the Spirit. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Intimidation) checks.

Word of the Spirit. When you speak, you can direct your words to a creature of your choice that you can see within 60 feet of you, making it so only that creature can hear you. Alternatively, you can amplify your voice so that all creatures within 600 feet can hear you.

Foundry Note

Astral Sight is integrated as an Active Effect on this feature. The advantage on Wisdom and Charisma checks is not automated.

Astral Sight.name: Astral Sight
Astral Sight.description: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

Bardic Versatility.name: Bardic Versatility
Bardic Versatility.description:
每当你在该职业中达到一个授予@{属性值提升 Ability Score Improvement}特性的等级时，你可以执行以下一项操作，代表你在运用技能和魔法时焦点的转变：

  • 将你为 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.aQLg7BWdRnm4Hr9S]{专精}特性选择的一项技能，替换为你其他未受专精加成的@{技能熟练项 Skill Proficiencies}之一。

  • 将你从该职业@{施法 Spellcasting}特性中学到的一个@{戏法 Cantrip}，替换为来自 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.ziBzRlrpBm1KVV0j]{吟游诗人法术列表}的另一个戏法。

Instinctive Pounce.name: Instinctive Pounce
Instinctive Pounce.description: As part of the bonus action you take to enter your rage, you can move up to half your speed.

Magical Inspiration.name: Magical Inspiration
Magical Inspiration.description: 如果一个生物拥有来自你的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.hpLNiGq7y67d2EHA]{诗人激励 Bardic Inspiration}骰并施放能恢复生命值或造成伤害的法术，该生物可以投掷该骰并选择受法术影响的目标。将掷出的数值作为加值添加到恢复的生命值或造成的伤害中。随后该诗人激励骰消失。

Primal Knowledge.name: Primal Knowledge
Primal Knowledge.description:
When you reach 3rd level and again at 10th level, you gain proficiency in one skill of your choice from the list of skills available to barbarians at 1st level (repeated below).

Proficiency options: Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival.

Additional Bard Spells.name: Additional Bard Spells
Additional Bard Spells.description:
以下列表中的法术扩展了《玩家手册》中的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.ziBzRlrpBm1KVV0j]{吟游诗人法术列表}。该列表按法术环阶而非角色等级排列。若某法术可作为仪式施放，其名称后将标注仪式标签。除标有星号（第三章法术）者外，所有法术均收录于《玩家手册》。《万物万法》亦提供更多法术。

环阶

法术

1环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LWTUqKkUQdMAmOe0]{七彩喷射 color spray}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]{命令术 command}

2环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Opwh2PdX4runSBlm]{援助术 aid}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{变巨/缩小术 enlarge/reduce}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz]{镜影术 mirror image}

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeIntellectFor]{心智堡垒*}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.34ddoYIrnOZ2GFYi]{群体治愈真言 mass healing word}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yqUDoxk4x0NWG5Bz]{缓慢术 slow}

4环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.BYNvBJzHcF5VJhXw]{魅影杀手 phantasmal killer}

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uAwtVZkiSTyP6ORB]{心灵联结 telepathic bond (仪式)}

6环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.mgFqi0ev8f7Ut19y]{英雄宴 heroes' feast}

7环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeDreamOfTheBl]{蓝纱之梦*}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.eGMhwmuleAM46C6L]{虹光喷射 prismatic spray}

8环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GJ2WYm3SQFR0winH]{嫌恶/关怀术 antipathy/sympathy}

9环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.jmfu8zj4zjjzUbeh]{虹光法墙 Prismatic Wall}

Arcane Jolt.name: Arcane Jolt
Arcane Jolt.description:
You’ve learned new ways to channel arcane energy to harm or heal. When either you hit a target with a magic weapon attack or your steel defender hits a target, you can channel magical energy through the strike to create one of the following effects:

  • The target takes an extra 2d6 force damage.

  • Choose one creature or object you can see within 30 feet of the target. Healing energy flows into the chosen recipient, restoring 2d6 hit points to it.

You can use this energy a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of once), but you can do so no more than once on a turn. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

Healing is implemented in the "Other" formula.

damage.condition: When you hit a target with a magic weapon attack or your steel defender hits a target

utility.condition: When you hit a target with a magic weapon attack or your steel defender hits a target

Battle Ready.name: Battle Ready
Battle Ready.description:
Your combat training and your experiments with magic have paid off in two ways:

  • You gain proficiency with martial weapons.

  • When you attack with a magic weapon, you can use your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity modifier, for the attack and damage rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an enchantment that can be used on your magic weapons so they will use your Intelligence modifier.

Battle Ready.name: 即时备战
Battle Ready.description: This item has been changed to use the Intelligence modifier instead of Strength or Dexterity.

tcoebatExtraAtta.name: 额外攻击
tcoebatExtraAtta.description: You can attack twice, rather than once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Improved Defender.name: Improved Defender
Improved Defender.description:
Your Arcane Jolt and steel defender have become more powerful:

  • The extra damage and the healing of your Arcane Jolt both increase to 4d6.

  • Your steel defender gains a +2 bonus to Armor Class.

  • Whenever your steel defender uses its Deflect Attack, the attacker takes force damage equal to 1d4 + your Intelligence modifier.

Foundry Note

The increased damage/healing is handled automatically as part of the Arcane Jolt feature.

Battle Smith Spells.name: Battle Smith Spells
Battle Smith Spells.description:
当你在此职业中达到特定等级后,你将始终准备着某些法术,如战铁匠法术表所示。这些法术对你而言视为工匠法术,但它们不计入你准备的工匠法术数量。

工匠等级

法术

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ge3Saet9zPTDyaoL]{英雄气概 Heroism}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]{护盾术 Shield}

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7UwUjJ6owIQkEPrs]{印记斩 Branding Smite}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JVhKeanAXZH62DrF]{守护之链 Warding Bond}

9环

活力灵光 aura of vitality, 召唤箭雨 conjure barrage

13环

净化灵光 aura of purity, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.avD5XUtkBPQQR97c]{火焰护盾 Fire Shield}

17环

放逐斩 banishing smite, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Pyzmm8R7rVsNAPsd]{群体疗伤术 Mass Cure Wounds}

Foundry 注

部分战铁匠法术未包含在SRD或《塔莎万事大全》中,因此无法包含在此职业中。

Steel Defender.name: Steel Defender
Steel Defender.description:
Your tinkering has borne you a companion, a steel defender. It’s friendly to you and your companions, and it obeys your commands. See its game statistics in the Steel Defender stat block, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) in several places. You determine the creature’s appearance and whether it has two legs or four; your choice has no effect on its game statistics.

In combat, the defender shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is the Dodge action, unless you take a bonus action on your turn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. If you are &Reference[incapacitated], the defender can take any action of its choice, not just Dodge.

If the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL]{mending} spell is cast on the defender, it regains [[/r 2d6]] hit points. If it has died within the last hour, you can use your smith’s tools as an action to revive it, provided you are within 5 feet of it and you expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The defender returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

At the end of a long rest, you can create a new steel defender if you have smith’s tools with you. If you already have a defender from this feature, the first one immediately perishes. The defender also perishes if you die.

Foundry Note

At level 15 this feature will automatically upgrade the Steel Defender to the Improved Defender.

tcoebatToolProfi.name: 工具熟练
tcoebatToolProfi.description: You gain proficiency with smith’s tools. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of artisan’s tools of your choice.

Bestial Soul.name: Bestial Soul
Bestial Soul.description:
你体内的野性力量增强，使你@{UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoebeaFormOfThe]{野兽形态 Form of the Beast}}的天生武器在克服非魔法攻击与伤害的抗性和免疫时视为魔法武器。

你还能改变形态以适应环境。当你完成一次短休或长休时，选择下列效益之一，其效果持续至你完成下一次短休或长休：

  • 你获得等于你步行速度的游泳速度，并且可以在水下呼吸。

  • 你获得等于你步行速度的攀爬速度，并且可以在困难表面（包括倒挂在天花板上）攀爬而无需进行属性检定。

  • 当你跳跃时，可以进行一次[[/check skill=ath]]检定，跳跃距离延长相当于检定总结果尺数。每回合你只能进行一次此特殊检定。

Aquatic Soul.name: Aquatic Soul
Aquatic Soul.description: You gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed, and you can breathe underwater.

Arboreal Soul.name: Arboreal Soul
Arboreal Soul.description: You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed, and you can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Saltatorial Soul.name: Saltatorial Soul
Saltatorial Soul.description: When you jump, you can make a [[/check skill=ath]] check and extend your jump by a number of feet equal to the check’s total. You can make this special check only once per turn.

Call the Hunt.name: Call the Hunt
Call the Hunt.description:
The beast within you grows so powerful that you can spread its ferocity to others and gain resilience from them joining your hunt.

When you enter your rage, you can choose a number of other willing creatures ([[max(@abilities.con.mod, 1)]]) you can see within 30 feet of you equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of one creature). You gain 5 temporary hit points for each creature that accepts this feature.

Until the rage ends, the chosen creatures can each use the following benefit once on each of their turns: when the creature hits a target with an attack roll and deals damage to it, the creature can roll a [[/damage 1d6 type=Additional]] and gain a bonus to the damage equal to the number rolled.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Temporary HP Gained

[[/r 5#Temporary HP]]{1 Creature}

[[/r 20#Temporary HP]]{4 Creatures}

[[/r 10#Temporary HP]]{2 Creatures}

[[/r 25#Temporary HP]]{5 Creatures}

[[/r 15#Temporary HP]]{3 Creatures}

[[/r 30#Temporary HP]]{6 Creatures}

Hunting Party.name: Hunting Party
Hunting Party.description:
Until the Barbarian's rage ends, you can use the following benefit once on each of your turns:

When the creature hits a target with an attack roll and deals damage to it, the creature can roll a [[/damage 1d6 type=Additional]] and gain a bonus to the damage equal to the number rolled.

Form of the Beast.name: Form of the Beast
Form of the Beast.description:
当你进入狂暴状态时，你可以变形，展现出体内的野兽力量。在狂暴结束前，你会显现出一种天生武器。它对你而言视为简易近战武器，当你用它攻击时，照常将你的力量调整值加入攻击检定和伤害掷骰。

你每次狂暴时选择该武器的形态：

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBeastbite000]{啃咬 Bite}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBeastclaw000]{爪击 Claws}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBeasttail000]{尾击 Tail}

Infectious Fury.name: Infectious Fury
Infectious Fury.description:
When you hit a creature with your natural weapons while you are raging, the beast within you can curse your target with rabid fury. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus) or suffer one of the following effects (your choice):

  • The target must use its reaction to make a melee attack against another creature of your choice that you can see.

  • The target takes 2d12 psychic damage.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

save.condition: When you hit with your natural weapons

Bladesong.name: Bladesong
Bladesong.description:
You can invoke an elven magic called the Bladesong, provided that you aren’t wearing medium or heavy armor or using a shield. It graces you with supernatural speed, agility, and focus.

You can use a bonus action to start the Bladesong, which lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if you are &Reference[incapacitated], if you don medium or heavy armor or a shield, or if you use two hands to make an attack with a weapon. You can also dismiss the Bladesong at any time (no action required).

While your Bladesong is active, you gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a bonus to your AC equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

  • Your walking speed increases by 10 feet.

  • You have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.

  • You gain a bonus to any Constitution saving throw you make to maintain your concentration on a spell. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1, currently: [[/r @abilities.int.mod]]).

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the AC, walking speed, and concentration save increases.

Bladesong.name: Bladesong
Bladesong.description:
While your Bladesong is active, you gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a bonus to your AC equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

  • Your walking speed increases by 10 feet.

  • You have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks.

You gain a bonus to any Constitution saving throw you make to maintain your concentration on a spell. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier (currently, [[lookup @abilities.int.mod]], minimum of +1).

Song of Defense.name: Song of Defense
Song of Defense.description: You can direct your magic to absorb damage while your Bladesong is active. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to expend one spell slot and reduce that damage to you by an amount equal to five times the spell slot’s level.

utility.condition: When you take damage

tcoeblaExtraAtta.name: 额外攻击
tcoeblaExtraAtta.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. Moreover, you can cast one of your cantrips in place of one of those attacks.

Training in War and Song.name: Training in War and Song
Training in War and Song.description:
You gain proficiency with light armor, and you gain proficiency with one type of one-handed melee weapon of your choice.

You also gain proficiency in the Performance skill if you don’t already have it.

Song of Victory.name: Song of Victory
Song of Victory.description:
You can add your Intelligence modifier (currently [[lookup @abilities.int.mod]], minimum of +1) to the damage of your melee weapon attacks while your Bladesong is active.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect is implemented on this feature that can be used to add your intelligence modifier to your melee weapon attacks.

Song of Victory.name: Song of Victory
Song of Victory.description: You can add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to the damage of your melee weapon attacks while your Bladesong is active.

Blessed Strikes.name: Blessed Strikes
Blessed Strikes.description:
Replaces Divine Strike or Potent Spellcasting.

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal [[/damage 1d8 type=radiant]] damage to that creature. Once you deal this damage, you can’t use this feature again until the start of your next turn.

damage.condition: Once per round, after dealing cantrip or weapon damage

Cantrip Versatility.name: Cantrip Versatility
Cantrip Versatility.description: 每当你在此职业中达到一个授予属性值提升特性的等级时，你可以将从此职业施法特性中学到的一个戏法替换为来自 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.cuG9d7J9fQH9InYT]{牧师法术列表 cleric spell list} 的另一个戏法。

Harness Divine Power.name: Harness Divine Power
Harness Divine Power.description: 你可以消耗一次@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.YpiLQEKGalROn7iJ]{引导神力 Channel Divinity}的使用次数来为你的法术充能。以一个附赠动作，你触碰你的圣徽，诵出一段祷言，并恢复一个已消耗的法术位，其环阶不能高于你[[ceil(@prof / 2)]]{熟练加值 proficiency bonus}的一半（向上取整）。你能使用此特性的次数基于你在此职业中达到的等级：2级时，一次；6级时，两次；18级时，三次。当你完成一次长休后，你重新获得所有已使用的次数。

Additional Cleric Spells.name: Additional Cleric Spells
Additional Cleric Spells.description:
以下列表中的法术扩展了《玩家手册》中的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.cuG9d7J9fQH9InYT]{牧师法术列表}。该列表按法术环阶而非角色等级排列。若某法术可作为仪式施展，其名称后会标注仪式标签。除标有星号的法术（见第三章）外，所有法术均收录于《玩家手册》。《瓦罗的万物指南》亦提供更多法术。

环阶

法术

3环

活力灵光 aura of vitality, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSpiritShroud]{精魄披风 Spirit shroud *}

4环

生命灵光 aura of life, 净化灵光 aura of purity

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonCelest]{召唤天族 Summon celestial *}

6环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.2RC0EyvBLPH88PZF]{阳炎射线 Sunbeam}

8环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.hzK7FQya0BDjSmLE]{阳炎爆 Sunburst}

9环

律令医疗 Power Word Heal

Bastion of Law.name: Bastion of Law
Bastion of Law.description:
You can tap into the grand equation of existence to imbue a creature with a shimmering shield of order. As an action, you can expend 1 to 5 sorcery points to create a magical ward around yourself or another creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The ward lasts until you finish a long rest or until you use this feature again.

The ward is represented by a number of d8s equal to the number of sorcery points spent to create it. When the warded creature takes damage, it can expend a number of those dice, roll them, and reduce the damage taken by the total rolled on those dice.

Foundry Note

Foundry does not automatically create/track usage of the d8s.

This feature defaults to using one sorcery point. To subtract more you can manually adjust the Font of Magic feature.

Clockwork Cavalcade.name: Clockwork Cavalcade
Clockwork Cavalcade.description:
You summon spirits of order to expunge disorder around you. As an action, you summon the spirits in a 30-foot cube originating from you. The spirits look like modrons or other constructs of your choice. The spirits are intangible and invulnerable, and they create the following effects within the cube before vanishing:

  • The spirits restore up to 100 hit points, divided as you choose among any number of creatures of your choice in the cube.

  • Any damaged objects entirely in the cube are repaired instantly.

  • Every spell of 6th level or lower ends on creatures and objects of your choice in the cube.

Once you use this action, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you spend 7 sorcery points to use it again.

Foundry Note

To use the "free" usage of this feature uncheck the "Consume Resource?" option. To use the feature with sorcery points uncheck the "Consume Available Usage?" option.

Restore Balance.name: Restore Balance
Restore Balance.description:
Your connection to the plane of absolute order allows you to equalize chaotic moments. When a creature you can see within 60 feet of you is about to roll a d20 with advantage or disadvantage, you can use your reaction to prevent the roll from being affected by advantage and disadvantage.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

utility.condition: When a create you can see within 60 feet is about to roll with advantage or disadvantage

Clockwork Magic.name: Clockwork Magic
Clockwork Magic.description:
你习得一些额外法术当你达到本职业的特定等级时，如发条法术表所示。这些法术均视为术士法术，但不计入你的已知术士法术总数中。

每当你提升术士等级时，你可以将此特性授予的一个法术替换为同环阶的另一个法术。新法术必须是来自@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.PVgly1xB2S2I8GLQ]{术士}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.mx4TsSbBIAaAkhQ7]{魔契师}，或@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.k7Rs5EyXeA0SFTXD]{法师}法术列表的防护系或变化学派法术。

术士等级

法术

1环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7p9IuWrSWFgfyQo2]{警报术 alarm}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.xmDBqZhRVrtLP8h2]{防护善恶 protection from evil and good}

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Opwh2PdX4runSBlm]{援助术 aid}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{次级复原术 lesser restoration}

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]{解除魔法 dispel magic}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.j8NtLXOOJ3GAKF8I]{防护能量伤害 protection from energy}

7环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.da0a1t2FqaTjRZGT]{行动自如 freedom of movement}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonConstr]{召唤构装生物 summon construct}

9环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{高等复原术 greater restoration}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb]{力场墙 wall of force}

此外，查阅秩序显形表，选择或随机决定一种形式，来表现你在施展任何术士法术时与秩序的联系。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeManifestatio caption=false]

Trance of Order.name: Trance of Order
Trance of Order.description:
You gain the ability to align your consciousness to the endless calculations of Mechanus. As a bonus action, you can enter this state for 1 minute. For the duration, attack rolls against you can’t benefit from advantage, and whenever you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.

Once you use this bonus action, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you spend 5 sorcery points to use it again.

Foundry Note

To use the "free" usage of this feature uncheck the "Consume Resource?" option. To use the feature with sorcery points uncheck the "Consume Available Usage?" option.

This feature includes an Active Effect which will automate the floor rolling but it does not automatically expire after 1 minute.

Trance of Order.name: Trance of Order
Trance of Order.description: For the duration, attack rolls against you can’t benefit from advantage, and whenever you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.

Animating Performance.name: Animating Performance
Animating Performance.description:
以一个动作，你可以活化一个距离你30尺内、未被穿着或携带的大型或更小的非魔法物品。该活化物品使用@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeDancingItem0]{舞动物品 Dancing Item}资料卡，并使用你的熟练加值。该物品对你和你的同伴保持友善，并服从你的命令。它持续存在1小时，直到其生命值降至0，或直到你死亡。

在战斗中，该物品共享你的先攻值，但在你的回合结束后立即行动。它可以自行移动和使用反应，但在其回合中只能执行&Reference[dodge]动作，除非你在你的回合中用一个附赠动作命令它执行另一个动作。该动作可以是其资料卡中的动作或其他动作。如果你处于失能状态，该物品可以执行任何它选择的动作，而不仅仅是回避。

当你使用你的诗人激励特性时，你可以作为用于诗人激励的同一附赠动作的一部分来命令该物品。

一旦你使用此特性活化了一个物品，直至完成一次长休前，你都无法再次使用它，除非你消耗一个3环或更高的法术位来再次使用此特性。你一次只能通过此特性活化一个物品；如果你使用此动作且已有一个通过此特性存在的舞动物品，则第一个物品立即变为非活化状态。

summon.condition: Target is not being worn or carried

Creative Crescendo.name: Creative Crescendo
Creative Crescendo.description:
当你使用你的{表演造物术 Performance of Creation}特性时，你可以一次性创造多于一个物品。物品数量等于你的[[max(@abilities.cha.mod,2)]]{魅力调整值}（最少为两个物品）。若你创造的物品将超过该数量，则由你选择先前创造的哪个物品消失。这些物品中仅有一个能达到你可创造的最大尺寸；其余必须为{小型 Small}或{微型 Tiny}。

当你使用{表演造物术 Performance of Creation}创造物品时，不再受gp价值限制。

Mote of Potential.name: Mote of Potential
Mote of Potential.description:
每当你赋予一个生物一颗诗人激励骰时，你可以吟唱造物术的一个音符，创造出一颗微型的潜能微粒，该微粒会环绕该生物5尺范围内飞行。微粒是无实体且不受伤害的，它会持续存在直到诗人激励骰被消耗。微粒的外观可以是你选择的音符、星辰、花朵或其他艺术或生命的象征。

当该生物使用诗人激励骰时，根据该骰是用于属性检定、攻击检定还是豁免，微粒会提供如下所述的额外效果：

[[/r {1@scale.bard.inspiration, 1@scale.bard.inspiration}kh#Mote Bonus, Ability Check]]{属性检定 Ability Check} 当该生物投掷诗人激励骰并将其加入属性检定时，该生物可以重新投掷该诗人激励骰并选择使用哪次投掷结果，同时微粒会啪地一声爆开，短暂地散发出五彩缤纷且无害的火花。

[[/r 1@scale.bard.inspiration#Mote Bonus, Attack Roll and Thunder Damage]]{攻击检定 Attack Roll} 在该生物投掷诗人激励骰并将其加入对目标的攻击检定后，微粒立即雷鸣般地碎裂。目标和每个你能看见的、你选择的其周围5尺内的生物必须进行一次[[/save ability=con dc=@attributes.spelldc]]豁免，对抗你的法术豁免DC，失败则受到等同于诗人激励骰所投出数值的雷鸣伤害。

[[/r {1@scale.bard.inspiration, @abilities.cha.mod}min1#Mote Bonus, Saving Throw (die) and Temp HP (total)]]{豁免 Saving Throw} 在该生物投掷诗人激励骰并将其加入豁免后，微粒伴随着轻柔的音乐声消失，使该生物获得临时生命值，其数值等于诗人激励骰所投出的数值加上你的魅力调整值（至少为1点临时生命值）。

Performance of Creation.name: Performance of Creation
Performance of Creation.description:
作为一个动作，你可以引导创世之歌的魔法，在你周围10尺内一处未被占据的空间创造一件你选择的非魔法物品。该物品必须出现在能够支撑它的表面或液体上。物品的gp价值不能超过你的吟游诗人等级的20倍，[[20 * @classes.bard.levels]] gp，且物品必须是中型或更小的。该物品微微发光，生物在触摸它时可以隐约听到音乐。创造的物品在经过等同于你熟练加值的小时数后消失。关于你可以创造的物品示例，请参阅玩家手册的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.BYFd9hiJGo9L5aOM]{装备 Equipment}章节。

一旦你使用此特性创造了一件物品，直至完成一次长休前，你都无法再次使用它，除非你消耗一个2环或更高的法术位来再次使用此特性。你一次只能拥有一件通过此特性创造的物品；如果你使用此动作且已拥有从此特性获得的物品，则第一件物品立即消失。

当你达到6级（大型）和14级（巨型）时，你可以通过此特性创造的物品体型增大一个等级。

tcoedruCantripVe.name: 替换戏法
tcoedruCantripVe.description: 每当你在此职业中达到一个授予{属性值提升 Ability Score Improvement}特性的等级时，你可以将从此职业{施法 Spellcasting}特性中学到的一个戏法替换为来自 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.MWiN7ILEO0Vd3zAZ#cantrips-(0-level)]{德鲁伊法术列表 druid spell list} 的另一个戏法。

Additional Druid Spells.name: Additional Druid Spells
Additional Druid Spells.description:
以下列表中的法术扩展了《玩家手册》中的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.QvPDSUsAiEn3hD8s.JournalEntryPage.MWiN7ILEO0Vd3zAZ]{德鲁伊法术列表}。该列表按法术环阶而非角色等级排列。若某法术可作为仪式施展，其名称后将标注仪式标签。除带星号法术（见第三章）外，所有法术均出自《玩家手册》。《珊娜萨的万事指南》亦提供更多法术。

德鲁伊等级

法术

1环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.xmDBqZhRVrtLP8h2]{防护善恶 protection from evil and good}

2环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4v2H3hHb3Ph9XLNd]{卜筮术 augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MK6gpQMeDFo0cP9f]{不灭明焰 continual flame}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{变巨/缩小术 enlarge/reduce}, 召唤野兽 summon beast

3环

活力灵光 aura of vitality, 元素武器 elemental weapon, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LmRHHMtplpxr9fX6]{回生术 revivify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonFey000]{精类召唤术 summon fey}

4环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XqzXSKNR75ZdYTA9]{预言术 divination}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.avD5XUtkBPQQR97c]{火焰护盾 fire shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonElemen]{元素召唤术 summon elemental}

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA]{寒冰锥 cone of cold}

6环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kozNy29b0X6exFhY]{石化术 flesh to stone}

7环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.B2kbmgbA2WQR00kx]{魔法徽记 symbol}

8环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pV04y1iXoWiom6bp]{焚云术 incendiary cloud}

Wild Companion.name: 荒野伙伴
Wild Companion.description:
You gain the ability to summon a spirit that assumes an animal form: as an action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JGT5bNqu9REL7Fuz]{find familiar} spell, without material components.

When you cast the spell in this way, the familiar is a fey instead of a beast, and the familiar disappears after a number of hours equal to half your druid level.

Infectious Inspiration.name: Infectious Inspiration
Infectious Inspiration.description:
When you successfully inspire someone, the power of your eloquence can now spread to someone else. When a creature within 60 feet of you adds one of your Bardic Inspiration dice to its ability check, attack roll, or saving throw and the roll succeeds, you can use your reaction to encourage a different creature (other than yourself) that can hear you within 60 feet of you, giving it a Bardic Inspiration die without expending any of your Bardic Inspiration uses.

You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

utility.condition: When a creature within range uses your Inspiration die

Silver Tongue.name: Silver Tongue
Silver Tongue.description: You are a master at saying the right thing at the right time. When you make a [[/check skill=per]] or [[/check skill=dec]] check, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

Silver Tongue.name: Silver Tongue
Silver Tongue.description: When you make a [[/check skill=per]] or [[/check skill=dec]] check, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

Unfailing Inspiration.name: Unfailing Inspiration
Unfailing Inspiration.description: Your inspiring words are so persuasive that others feel driven to succeed. When a creature adds one of your Bardic Inspiration dice to its ability check, attack roll, or saving throw and the roll fails, the creature can keep the Bardic Inspiration die.

Universal Speech.name: Universal Speech
Universal Speech.description:
你获得使你的言语能被任何生物理解的能力。作为一个动作,选择你60尺内的一个或多个生物,数量最多等于你的[[max(@abilities.cha.mod, 1)]]{魅力 调整值}(最低为单一生物)。被选择的生物能魔法般地理解你,无论你使用何种语言,持续1小时。

一旦你使用了此特性,在完成一次长休前无法再次使用,除非你消耗任意环阶的法术位来再次使用它。

Unsettling Words.name: Unsettling Words
Unsettling Words.description: You can spin words laced with magic that unsettle a creature and cause it to doubt itself. As a bonus action, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration and choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. Roll the Bardic Inspiration die. The creature must subtract the number rolled from the next saving throw it makes before the start of your next turn.

Fathomless Plunge.name: Fathomless Plunge
Fathomless Plunge.description:
You can magically open temporary conduits to watery destinations. As an action, you can teleport yourself and up to five other willing creatures that you can see within 30 feet of you. Amid a whirl of tentacles, you all vanish and then reappear up to 1 mile away in a body of water you’ve seen (pond size or larger) or within 30 feet of it, each of you appearing in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the others.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Gift of the Sea.name: Gift of the Sea
Gift of the Sea.description:
You gain a swimming speed of 40 feet, and you can breathe underwater.

Foundry Note

The swimming speed is integrated in this feature as an Active Effect.

Gift of the Sea.name: Gift of the Sea
Gift of the Sea.description: You gain a swimming speed of 40 feet, and you can breathe underwater.

Grasping Tentacles.name: Grasping Tentacles
Grasping Tentacles.description:
You learn the spell @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DGONTFbk5eORs5qv]{Evard's black tentacles}. It counts as a warlock spell for you, but it doesn’t count against the number of spells you know. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

Whenever you cast this spell, your patron’s magic bolsters you, granting you a number of temporary hit points equal to your warlock level. Moreover, damage can’t break your concentration on this spell.

Foundry Notes

The spell is granted to you at this level and includes 1 limited use. The temporary HP is included as part of this feature.

Guardian Coil.name: Guardian Coil
Guardian Coil.description:
Your Tentacle of the Deeps can defend you and others, interposing itself between them and harm. When you or a creature you can see takes damage while within 10 feet of the tentacle, you can use your reaction to choose one of those creatures and reduce the damage to that creature by 1d8. When you reach 10th level in this class, the damage reduced by the tentacle increases to 2d8.

Foundry Note

The damage reduction roll is implemented in the "Other" formula and automatically scales at level 10.

utility.condition: Creature you can see that is within ten feets of tentacle takes damage

Oceanic Soul.name: Oceanic Soul
Oceanic Soul.description:
You are now even more at home in the depths. You gain resistance to cold damage. In addition, when you are fully submerged, any creature that is also fully submerged can understand your speech, and you can understand theirs.

Foundry Note

The resistance is integrated in this feature as an Active Effect.

Expanded Spell List.name: Expanded Spell List
Expanded Spell List.description:
The Fathomless lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Fathomless Expanded Spells
Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.a3XtAO5n2GrqiAh5]{Create or Destroy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ]{Thunderwave}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FSMy6VAjDnXY9vWz]{Gust of Wind}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5VhqFROQYjr1P9lp]{Silence}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.IyikgTEOTv701jgQ]{Lightning Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.dhqBY4TvVjxVmOZd]{Sleet Storm}
4th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7fFHlBk3UNX8gPKL]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonElemen]{Summon Elemental} (water only)
5th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.a2KJHCIbY5Mi4Dmn]{Bigby's Hand} (appears as a tentacle), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA]{Cone of Cold}

Tentacle of the Deeps.name: Tentacle of the Deeps
Tentacle of the Deeps.description:
You can magically summon a spectral tentacle that strikes at your foes. As a bonus action, you create a 10-foot-long tentacle at a point you can see within 60 feet of you. The tentacle lasts for 1 minute or until you use this feature to create another tentacle.

When you create the tentacle, you can make a melee spell attack against one creature within 10 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. When you reach 10th level in this class, the damage increases to 2d8.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the tentacle up to 30 feet and repeat the attack.

You can summon the tentacle a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

To simplify usage of the attack the summon and resource consumption prompts are off by default. Use the chat card buttons to track resource consumption and summon the tentacle of the deeps.

Tentacle of the Deeps.name: Tentacle of the Deeps
Tentacle of the Deeps.description: After being hit by a tentacle of the deep this creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the warlock's next turn.

Beguiling Twist.name: Beguiling Twist
Beguiling Twist.description:
The magic of the Feywild guards your mind. You have advantage on saving throws against being &Reference[charmed] or &Reference[frightened].

In addition, whenever you or a creature you can see within 120 feet of you succeeds on a saving throw against being charmed or frightened, you can use your reaction to force a different creature you can see within 120 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. If the save fails, the target is charmed or frightened by you (your choice) for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

save.condition: A creature within range succeeds on a saving throw against certain effects

Charming Twist.name: Charming Twist
Charming Twist.description:
• A charmed creature can’t attack the charmer or target the charmer with harmful abilities or magical effects.
  • The charmer has advantage on any ability check to interact socially with the creature.
  • The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

Frightening Twist.name: Frightening Twist
Frightening Twist.description:
• A frightened creature has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls while the source of its fear is within line of sight.
  • The creature can’t willingly move closer to the source of its fear.

Dreadful Strikes.name: Dreadful Strikes
Dreadful Strikes.description:
当前恐惧打击骰: [[/damage @scale.fey-wanderer.die type=psychic]]

你可以从妖精荒野的幽暗洞穴中汲取令人心智受创的魔法，用以增强你的武器打击。当你用武器命中一个生物时，你可以对目标造成1d4点额外心灵伤害，该目标每回合只能受到一次此额外伤害。

当你在本职业达到11级时，此额外伤害扩展至1d6。

Foundry 注

一个可选用的主动效果，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoefeyDreadfulS.ActiveEffect.PfXO45qajMO1iOIu]{恐惧 Dread}，已附加于此特性，以协助追踪每回合受影响的生物。

damage.condition: Once per creature per turn, after hitting a creature

Dread.name: Dread
Dread.description: This creature has taken extra damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoefeyDreadfulS]{Dreadful Strikes} this turn.

Fey Reinforcements.name: Fey Reinforcements
Fey Reinforcements.description:
The royal courts of the Feywild have blessed you with the assistance of fey beings: you know @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonFey000]{summon fey}. It doesn’t count against the number of ranger spells you know, and you can cast it without a material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

Misty Wanderer.name: Misty Wanderer
Misty Wanderer.description:
You can slip in and out of the Feywild to move in a blink of an eye: you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{misty step} without expending a spell slot. You can do so a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

In addition, whenever you cast misty step, you can bring along one willing creature you can see within 5 feet of you. That creature teleports to an unoccupied space of your choice within 5 feet of your destination space.

Otherworldly Glamour.name: Otherworldly Glamour
Otherworldly Glamour.description:
Your fey qualities give you a supernatural charm. As a result, whenever you make a Charisma check, you gain a bonus to the check equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).

In addition, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: &Reference[deception], &Reference[performance], or &Reference[persuasion].

Fey Wanderer Magic.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
Fey Wanderer Magic.description:
You learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Fey Wanderer Spells table. Each spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn’t count against the number of ranger spells you know.

Fey Wanderer Spells

Ranger LevelSpell

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.eS7XnnApoxRxYXPs]

5th

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeFeywildGifts classes="caption-top"]

Fighting Style Options.name: Fighting Style Options
Fighting Style Options.description:
当你选择一种战斗风格时，以下风格会加入你的可选列表。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBlindFightin]{盲斗 Blind Fighting}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeInterception]{拦截 Interception}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSuperiorTech]{卓越技艺 Superior Technique}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeThrownWeapon]{投掷武器战斗 Thrown Weapon Fighting}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeUnarmedFight]{徒手战斗 Unarmed Fighting}

Martial Versatility.name: 替换武术
Martial Versatility.description:
每当你在此职业中达到一个授予 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.sPy2OLoN7JaAcMl4]{属性值提升 属性值提升}特性的等级时，你可以执行以下一项操作，以此调整你军用武艺的专精方向：

将你掌握的一项战斗风格替换为战士可用的其他战斗风格：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.fbExzwNwEAl2kW9c]{战斗风格 战斗风格}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoefigFightingS]{战斗风格选项 战斗风格选项}

若你掌握任何出自战斗大师范型的战技，你可以将一项已知战技替换为其他战技。

Elemental Gift.name: Elemental Gift
Elemental Gift.description:
You begin to take on characteristics of your patron’s kind. You now have resistance to a damage type determined by your patron’s kind: bludgeoning (dao), thunder (djinni), fire (efreeti), or cold (marid).

In addition, as a bonus action, you can give yourself a flying speed of 30 feet that lasts for 10 minutes, during which you can hover. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

During advancement you'll be able to select the type of resistance for your patron. The flying speed is integrated as an Active Effect on this feature.

Elemental Gift.name: Elemental Gift
Elemental Gift.description: As a bonus action, you can give yourself a flying speed of 30 feet that lasts for 10 minutes.

Genie's Vessel.name: Genie's Vessel
Genie's Vessel.description:
你的守护神赠予你一个魔法容器，使你获得一部分巨灵的力量。该容器是一个微型物件，你可以将其用作魔契师法术的法器。你可以自行决定该物件是什么，或者通过投掷巨灵容器表随机决定。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeGeniesVessel caption=false]{巨灵容器 Genie's Vessel}

当你接触该容器时，你可以通过以下方式使用它：

  • 瓶中庇护

  • 巨灵之怒

Foundry 注

召唤容器的功能已在此特性中实现，且瓶中庇护和巨灵之怒已作为独立特性添加。

Limited Wish.name: Limited Wish
Limited Wish.description:
You entreat your patron to grant you a small wish. As an action, you can speak your desire to your Genie’s Vessel, requesting the effect of one spell that is 6th level or lower and has a casting time of 1 action. The spell can be from any class’s spell list, and you don’t need to meet the requirements in that spell, including costly components; the spell simply takes effect as part of this action.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish [[/r 1d4]] long rests.

Sanctuary Vessel.name: Sanctuary Vessel
Sanctuary Vessel.description:
When you enter your Genie’s Vessel via the Bottled Respite feature, you can now choose up to five willing creatures that you can see within 30 feet of you, and the chosen creatures are drawn into the vessel with you.

As a bonus action, you can eject any number of creatures from the vessel, and everyone is ejected if you leave or die or if the vessel is destroyed.

In addition, anyone (including you) who remains within the vessel for at least 10 minutes gains the benefit of finishing a short rest, and anyone can add your proficiency bonus ([[/r @prof]]) to the number of hit points they regain if they spend any Hit Dice as part of a short rest there.

tcoegenSpells000.name: 扩展法术列表
tcoegenSpells000.description:
当你学习魔契师法术时，巨灵允许你从扩展法术列表中选择。巨灵扩展法术表展示了添加到你的魔契师法术列表中的巨灵法术，以及表中与你守护神种类（土巨灵、气巨灵、火巨灵或水巨灵）相关联的法术。

法术环阶

巨灵法术

土巨灵法术

气巨灵法术

火巨灵法术

水巨灵法术

1环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Mzh95utKDPIrjiH8]{侦测善恶 detect evil and good}
