Aura of Alacrity.name: Aura of Alacrity
Aura of Alacrity.description:
You emanate an aura that fills you and your companions with supernatural speed, allowing you to race across a battlefield in formation. Your walking speed increases by 10 feet. In addition, if you aren’t &Reference[incapacitated], the walking speed of any ally who starts their turn within 5 feet of you increases by 10 feet until the end of that turn.

When you reach 18th level in this class, the range of the aura increases to 10 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature will automatically apply the movement increase to your Actor by the Active Effect but the aura functionality is not automated for other creatures though it can be applied to other Actors as well.

Alacrity.name: Alacrity
Alacrity.description:
Your walking speed increases by 10 feet. In addition, if you aren’t incapacitated, the walking speed of any ally who starts their turn within 5 feet of you increases by 10 feet until the end of that turn.

When you reach 18th level in this class, the range of the aura increases to 10 feet.

Channel Divinity.name: Channel Divinity
Channel Divinity.description:
You gain the following two Channel Divinity options. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how Channel Divinity works.

Foundry Note

Use this to track all the various uses of Channel Divinity for the paladin.

Glorious Defense.name: Glorious Defense
Glorious Defense.description:
You can turn defense into a sudden strike. When you or another creature you can see within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to grant a bonus to the target’s AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier (minimum 1, currently: [[/r max(@abilities.cha.mod,1)]]).

If the attack misses, you can make one weapon attack against the attacker as part of this reaction, provided the attacker is within your weapon’s range.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

utility.condition: When you or another creature you can see within range is hit by an attack roll

Living Legend.name: Living Legend
Living Legend.description:
You can empower yourself with the legends—whether true or exaggerated—of your great deeds. As a bonus action, you gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

  • You are blessed with an otherworldly presence, gaining advantage on all Charisma checks.

  • Once on each of your turns when you make a weapon attack and miss, you can cause that attack to hit instead.

  • If you fail a saving throw, you can use your reaction to reroll it. You must use this new roll.

Once you use this bonus action, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a 5th-level spell slot to use it again.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that can be used as a reminder but does not automate the above benefits.

Living Legend.name: Living Legend
Living Legend.description:
You gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

  • You are blessed with an otherworldly presence, gaining advantage on all Charisma checks.

  • Once on each of your turns when you make a weapon attack and miss, you can cause that attack to hit instead.

  • If you fail a saving throw, you can use your reaction to reroll it. You must use this new roll.

Oath Spells.name: Oath Spells
Oath Spells.description:
You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed in the Oath of Glory Spells table. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how oath spells work.

Paladin Level

Spells

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7buEm5KhI5lP8m1z]{Guiding Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ge3Saet9zPTDyaoL]{Heroism}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9eOZDBImVKxbeOyZ]{Enhance Ability}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Sgjrf8qqv97CCWM4]{Magic Weapon}

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Szvk5FEVQW3uhJi5]{Haste}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.j8NtLXOOJ3GAKF8I]{Protection from Energy}

13th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.P6f1PPKPd9BCb742]{Compulsion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.da0a1t2FqaTjRZGT]{Freedom of Movement}

17th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.d54VDyFulD9xxY7J]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4]{Flame Strike}

Flurry of Healing and Harm.name: Flurry of Healing and Harm
Flurry of Healing and Harm.description:
You can now mete out a flurry of comfort and hurt. When you use Flurry of Blows, you can now replace each of the unarmed strikes with a use of your Hand of Healing, without spending ki points for the healing.

In addition, when you make an unarmed strike with Flurry of Blows, you can use Hand of Harm with that strike without spending the ki point for Hand of Harm. You can still use Hand of Harm only once per turn.

Hand of Harm.name: Hand of Harm
Hand of Harm.description: You use your ki to inflict wounds. When you hit a creature with an unarmed strike, you can spend 1 ki point to deal extra necrotic damage equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die + your Wisdom modifier. You can use this feature only once per turn.

damage.condition: When you hit a creature with an unarmed strike

Hand of Healing.name: Hand of Healing
Hand of Healing.description:
Your mystical touch can mend wounds. As an action, you can spend 1 ki point to touch a creature and restore a number of hit points equal to a roll of your Martial Arts die + your Wisdom modifier.

When you use your Flurry of Blows, you can replace one of the unarmed strikes with a use of this feature without spending a ki point for the healing.

Implements of Mercy.name: Implements of Mercy
Implements of Mercy.description:
You gain proficiency in the Insight and Medicine skills, and you gain proficiency with the herbalism kit.

You also gain a special mask, which you often wear when using the features of this subclass. You determine its appearance, or generate it randomly by rolling on the Merciful Mask table below:

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeMercifulMask caption=false]

Physician's Touch.name: Physician's Touch
Physician's Touch.description:
You can administer even greater cures with a touch, and if you feel it’s necessary, you can use your knowledge to cause harm.

When you use Hand of Healing on a creature, you can also end one disease or one of the following conditions affecting the creature: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], &Reference[poisoned], or &Reference[stunned].

When you use Hand of Harm on a creature, you can subject that creature to the &Reference[poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

The poisoned condition is included as an Active Effect on this feature which we can be applied to other creatures.

Physician's Touch.name: Physician's Touch
Physician's Touch.description: When you use Hand of Harm on a creature, you can subject that creature to the poisoned condition until the end of your next turn.

Hand of Ultimate Mercy.name: Hand of Ultimate Mercy
Hand of Ultimate Mercy.description:
Your mastery of life energy opens the door to the ultimate mercy. As an action, you can touch the corpse of a creature that died within the past 24 hours and expend 5 ki points. The creature then returns to life, regaining a number of hit points equal to 4d10 + your wisdom modifier. If the creature died while subject to any of the following conditions, it revives with them removed: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], &Reference[poisoned], and &Reference[stunned].

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.

heal.condition: Touch a creature's corpse that died within the past 24 hours

Dedicated Weapon.name: Dedicated Weapon
Dedicated Weapon.description:
You train yourself to use a variety of weapons as monk weapons, not just simple melee weapons and shortswords. Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can touch one weapon, focus your ki on it, and then count that weapon as a monk weapon until you use this feature again.

The chosen weapon must meet these criteria:

  • The weapon must be a simple or martial weapon.

  • You must be proficient with it.

  • It must lack the heavy and special properties.

Focused Aim.name: Focused Aim
Focused Aim.description:
When you miss with an attack roll, you can spend 1 to 3 ki points to increase your attack roll by 2 for each of these ki points you spend, potentially turning the miss into a hit.

Foundry Note

By default this feature will only use one ki point. Use the feature multiple times or manually reduce your ki points to use more.

utility.condition: When you miss with an attack roll

Ki-Fueled Attack.name: Ki-Fueled Attack
Ki-Fueled Attack.description: If you spend 1 ki point or more as part of your action on your turn, you can make one attack with an [[/item Unarmed Strike]] or a monk weapon as a bonus action before the end of the turn.

Quickened Healing.name: Quickened Healing
Quickened Healing.description: As an action, you can spend 2 ki points and roll a Martial Arts die (currently [[lookup @scale.monk.die]]). You regain a number of hit points equal to the number rolled plus your proficiency bonus.

tcoeordBonusProf.name: 附赠熟练
tcoeordBonusProf.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor. You also gain proficiency in the Intimidation or Persuasion skill (your choice).

Divine Strike.name: Divine Strike
Divine Strike.description:
[[/damage @scale.order-domain.die type=psychic]]{Roll Divine Strike damage}

You gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with divine energy. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 psychic damage to the target. When you reach 14th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8.

damage.condition: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon

Embodiment of the Law.name: Embodiment of the Law
Embodiment of the Law.description:
You have become remarkably adept at channeling magical energy to compel others.

If you cast a spell of the enchantment school using a spell slot of 1st level or higher, you can change the spell’s casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting, provided the spell’s casting time is normally 1 action.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

utility.condition: Casting an enchantment spell

Channel Divinity: Order's Demand.name: Channel Divinity: Order's Demand
Channel Divinity: Order's Demand.description:
你可以使用你的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.YpiLQEKGalROn7iJ]{引导神力 Channel Divinity}对他人施加威吓性的气场。

以一个动作,你展示你的圣徽,每个你选择的30尺内能看见或听见你的生物必须进行一次感知豁免,若失败则被你&Reference[charmed]直到你的下个回合结束,或直到被魅惑的生物受到任何伤害。当豁免失败时,你还可以使任何被魅惑的生物掉落其手持的物品。

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description:
• A charmed creature can’t attack the charmer or target the charmer with harmful abilities or magical effects.

  • The charmer has advantage on any ability check to interact socially with the creature.

Order's Wrath.name: Order's Wrath
Order's Wrath.description:
Enemies you designate for destruction wilt under the combined efforts of you and your allies. If you deal your @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeordDivineStr]{Divine Strike} damage to a creature on your turn, you can curse that creature until the start of your next turn. The next time one of your allies hits the cursed creature with an attack, the target also takes 2d8 psychic damage, and the curse ends. You can curse a creature in this way only once per turn.

Foundry Note

The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeordOrdersWra.ActiveEffect.ZHXQFuT9Tb2k8xdf]{Order's Curse} effect is included to optionally mark and track affected creatures.

damage.condition: When you deal Divine Strike damage

Order's Curse.name: Order's Curse
Order's Curse.description: The next time one of the Cleric's allies hits you with an attack, you also takes [[/damage 2d8 type=psychic]] damage, and this curse ends.

Domain Spells.name: Domain Spells
Domain Spells.description:
你在牧师等级达到秩序领域法术表中所列等级时获得领域法术。关于领域法术如何运作，请参阅《玩家手册》中的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.x637K2Icp2ZFM1TB]{神圣领域 Divine Domain}职业特性。

秩序领域法术

牧师等级法术

1环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]{命令术 command} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ge3Saet9zPTDyaoL]{英雄气概 heroism}

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4]{人类定身术 hold person} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CylBa7jR8DSbo8Z3]{诚实之域 zone of truth}

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.34ddoYIrnOZ2GFYi]{群体治愈真言 mass healing word} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yqUDoxk4x0NWG5Bz]{缓慢术 slow}

7环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.P6f1PPKPd9BCb742]{强迫术 compulsion} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.gXtzz9t1DTzJeLr4]{生物定位术 locate creature}

9环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.d54VDyFulD9xxY7J]{通神术 commune} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.91Sw6vOIaO7U8DvM]{支配人类 dominate person}

Voice of Authority.name: Voice of Authority
Voice of Authority.description:
You can invoke the power of law to embolden an ally to attack. If you cast a spell with a spell slot of 1st level or higher and target an ally with the spell, that ally can use their reaction immediately after the spell to make one weapon attack against a creature of your choice that you can see.

If the spell targets more than one ally, you choose the ally who can make the attack.

tcoepalFightingS.name: 战斗风格选项
tcoepalFightingS.description:
当你选择一种战斗风格时，以下风格会加入你的可选列表。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBlessedWarri]{受祝武者 Blessed Warrior}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBlindFightin]{盲斗 Blind Fighting}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeInterception]{拦截 Interception}

tcoepalHarnessDi.name: 神力掌控
tcoepalHarnessDi.description:
You can expend a use of your Channel Divinity to fuel your spells. As a bonus action, you touch your holy symbol, utter a prayer, and regain one expended spell slot, the level of which can be no higher than half your proficiency bonus (rounded up, currently [[ceil(@prof/2)]]). The number of times you can use this feature is based on the level you’ve reached in this class: 3rd level, once; 7th level, twice; and 15th level, thrice. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

Using this feature will subtract a usage of your Channel Divinity.

tcoepalMartialVe.name: 替换武术
tcoepalMartialVe.description: Whenever you reach a level in this class that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can replace a fighting style you know with another fighting style available to paladins. This replacement represents a shift of focus in your martial practice.

Additional Paladin Spells.name: Additional Paladin Spells
Additional Paladin Spells.description:
The spells in the following list expand the paladin spell list in the Player’s Handbook. The list is organized by spell level, not character level. Each spell is in the Player’s Handbook, unless it has an asterisk (a spell in chapter 3). Xanathar’s Guide to Everything also offers more spells.

Paladin Level

Spells

2nd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.n4JDcFKe5ikzYmAc]{Gentle Repose}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MOEmz9N0j0QPkKEE]{Prayer of Healing}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JVhKeanAXZH62DrF]{Warding Bond}

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSpiritShroud]{Spirit Shroud}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonCelest]{Summon Celestial}

Channel Divinity: Balm of Peace.name: Channel Divinity: Balm of Peace
Channel Divinity: Balm of Peace.description: 你可以使用你的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.YpiLQEKGalROn7iJ]{引导神力 Channel Divinity}使你自身的存在化为抚慰的香膏。以一个动作，你可以移动至多等于你速度的距离，且不触发借机攻击，当你在该动作期间移动至其他生物5尺范围内时，你可以为该生物恢复等于2d6+你感知调整值的生命值（至少为1点生命值）。每当你执行此动作时，一个生物只能以此方式获得一次治疗。

Emboldening Bond.name: Emboldening Bond
Emboldening Bond.description:
You can forge an empowering bond among people who are at peace with one another. As an action, you choose a number of willing creatures within 30 feet of you (this can include yourself) equal to your proficiency bonus. You create a magical bond among them for 10 minutes or until you use this feature again. While any bonded creature is within 30 feet of another, the creature can roll a [[/r 1d4]]{d4} and add the number rolled to an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw it makes. Each creature can add the d4 no more than once per turn.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Bonded.name: Bonded
Bonded.description:
While any bonded creature is within 30 feet of another, the creature can roll a [[/r 1d4]]{d4} and add the number rolled to an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw it makes. Each creature can add the d4 no more than once per turn.

Enable this effect prior to making a roll in which you want to apply this d4 bonus.

Expansive Bond.name: Expansive Bond
Expansive Bond.description:
你的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoepeaEmboldeni]{激励牵绊 Emboldening Bond} 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoepeaProtectiv]{守护牵绊 Protective Bond} 特性效益现在当生物彼此处于60尺范围内时生效。

此外，当生物使用守护牵绊来承受他人伤害时，该生物对伤害具有&Reference[damageresistance]{抗性 resistance}。

Implement of Peace.name: Implement of Peace
Implement of Peace.description: You gain proficiency in the &Reference[insight], &Reference[performance], or &Reference[persuasion] skill (your choice).

Potent Spellcasting.name: Potent Spellcasting
Potent Spellcasting.description: You add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

Protective Bond.name: Protective Bond
Protective Bond.description: 你在人们之间建立的牵绊能帮助他们彼此保护。当一个受你@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoepeaEmboldeni]{激励牵绊 Emboldening Bond}特性影响的生物即将受到伤害时，第二个与其牵绊的生物若在30尺内，可以使用其反应传送到距第一个生物5尺内的一个未占据空间。随后，第二个生物将承受全部伤害。

tcoepeaSpells000.name: 领域法术
tcoepeaSpells000.description:
你在牧师等级达到和平领域法术表中所列等级时获得领域法术。关于领域法术的运作方式，请参见@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.x637K2Icp2ZFM1TB]{神圣领域 Divine Domain}职业特性。

和平领域法术

牧师等级法术

1环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ge3Saet9zPTDyaoL]{英雄气概 heroism} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.gvdA9nPuWLck4tBl]{庇护术 sanctuary}

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Opwh2PdX4runSBlm]{援助术 aid} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JVhKeanAXZH62DrF]{守护之链 warding bond}

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ZU9d6woBdUP8pIPt]{希望信标 beacon of hope} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GtGjNjPBgUHxGYAD]{短讯术 sending}

7环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1ADstb0Xec6HHRcU]{净化灵光 aura of purity}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1ADstb0Xec6HHRcU]{欧提路克弹力法球 Otiluke’s resilient sphere}

9环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{高等复原术 greater restoration} @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uAwtVZkiSTyP6ORB]{雷里心灵联结 Rary’s telepathic bond}

Death's Friend.name: Death's Friend
Death's Friend.description:
你与死亡的关联已变得如此紧密，以至于你获得以下效益：

  • 当你使用你的[[/item Wails from the Grave]]时，你可以对第一个和第二个生物都造成暗蚀伤害。

  • 在一次长休结束时，若你没有任何灵魂饰物，一个@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSoulTrinket0]{灵魂饰物 soul trinket}会出现在你手中，因为亡者的精魄会被你吸引。

Ghost Walk.name: Ghost Walk
Ghost Walk.description:
You can phase partially into the realm of the dead, becoming like a ghost. As a bonus action, you assume a spectral form. While in this form, you have a flying speed of 10 feet, you can hover, and attack rolls have disadvantage against you. You can also move through creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[difficult-terrain], but you take [[/damage 1d10 type=force]] damage if you end your turn inside a creature or an object.

You stay in this form for 10 minutes or until you end it as a bonus action. To use this feature again, you must finish a long rest or destroy one of your soul trinkets as part of the bonus action you use to activate Ghost Walk.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automatically grants you a flying speed and the ability to hover. It does not automate attack rolls being at disadvantage or automatically expiration.

Ghost Walk.name: Ghost Walk
Ghost Walk.description: While in this form, you have a flying speed of 10 feet, you can hover, and attack rolls have disadvantage against you.

Tokens of the Departed.name: Tokens of the Departed
Tokens of the Departed.description:
当一个生命在你眼前消逝时，你能从离去的灵魂中攫取一枚信物，那是一丝生命精华的碎片，以实体形态显现：当你可见的一个生物在距离你30尺内死亡时，你能以一个反应动作张开空闲的手，令一个微型小饰品出现在那里，即一个@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSoulTrinket0]{灵魂信物 soul trinket}。由DM决定该信物的形态，或让你在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeTrinkets0000]{奇物 Trinkets}表上投掷以生成它。

你最多能持有的灵魂信物数量等于你的熟练加值（当前为[[lookup @prof]]），且当你达到上限时无法再创造。

你可以通过以下方式使用灵魂信物：

  • 当你随身携带一个灵魂信物时，你在死亡豁免和体质豁免上具有优势，因为你的生命力被物件中的生命精华所增强。

  • 当你在你的回合造成{偷袭 Sneak Attack}伤害时，你可以摧毁一个你随身携带的灵魂信物，然后立即使用[[/item Wails from the Grave]]，且不消耗该特性的使用次数。

  • 以一个动作，你可以摧毁你的一个灵魂信物，无论其位于何处。当你这样做时，你可以向与该信物关联的精魄提出一个问题。精魄会显现在你面前，并用它生前知晓的语言回答。它没有义务说实话，并且会尽可能简洁地回答，渴望获得自由。精魄仅知晓它生前所知之事，具体由DM决定。

Foundry 注

此特性不会自动执行在死亡或体质豁免上的优势。它拥有等于你熟练调整值的充能次数。你可以在每次创造/摧毁一个信物时调整该数值。

灵魂信物被配置为使用即毁的消耗品，以便于追踪每个被捕获的灵魂。

此特性中的"墓穴哀嚎"按钮将在你的角色卡上掷出该能力。取消勾选"消耗可用使用次数？"选项以自由使用它。

utility.condition: When a creature you can see dies within 30 feet

Wails from the Grave.name: Wails from the Grave
Wails from the Grave.description:
As you nudge someone closer to the grave, you can channel the power of death to harm someone else as well. Immediately after you deal your Sneak Attack damage to a creature on your turn, you can target a second creature that you can see within 30 feet of the first creature. Roll half the number of Sneak Attack dice for your level (round up), and the second creature takes necrotic damage equal to the roll’s total, as wails of the dead sound around them for a moment.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically determines the correct damage roll.

damage.condition: When you deal damage with sneak attack on your turn

Whispers of the Dead.name: Whispers of the Dead
Whispers of the Dead.description:
Echoes of those who have died cling to you. Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can choose one skill or tool proficiency that you lack and gain it, as a ghostly presence shares its knowledge with you. You lose this proficiency when you use this feature to choose a different proficiency that you lack.

Foundry Note

Mark the skill as proficient in your character sheet. Then apply this feature's Active Effect for tracking its usage.

Whispers of the Dead: Proficiency.name: Whispers of the Dead: Proficiency
Whispers of the Dead: Proficiency.description: This Active Effect tracks when you're using Whisper of the Dead to gain proficiency in a skill or tool using the Whispers of the Dead feature.

Bulwark of Force.name: Bulwark of Force
Bulwark of Force.description:
You can shield yourself and others with telekinetic force. As a bonus action, you can choose creatures, which can include you, that you can see within 30 feet of you, up to a number of creatures equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of one creature). Each of the chosen creatures is protected by &Reference[half-cover] for 1 minute or until you’re &Reference[incapacitated].

Once you take this bonus action, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to take it again.

Telekinetic Cover.name: Telekinetic Cover
Telekinetic Cover.description: You are protected by &Reference[half-cover] for 1 minute or until the Psi Warrior is &Reference[incapacitated].

Guarded Mind.name: Guarded Mind
Guarded Mind.description: The psionic energy flowing through you has bolstered your mind. You have resistance to psychic damage. Moreover, if you start your turn &Reference[charmed] or &Reference[frightened], you can expend a Psionic Energy die and end every effect on yourself subjecting you to those conditions.

utility.condition: Start your turn charmed or frightened

Telekinetic Master.name: Telekinetic Master
Telekinetic Master.description:
Your ability to move creatures and objects with your mind is matched by few. You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.HQfd7jJyULIoGxrZ]{telekinesis} spell, requiring no components, and your spellcasting ability for the spell is Intelligence. On each of your turns while you concentrate on the spell, including the turn when you cast it, you can make one attack with a weapon as a bonus action.

Once you cast the spell with this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to cast it again.

Psionic Power.name: 灵能力量
Psionic Power.description:
Current Psionic Energy dice: [[@item.uses.value]] [[/r @scale.psi-warrior.die]]

You harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. This energy is represented by your Psionic Energy dice, which are each a d6. You have a number of these dice equal to twice your proficiency bonus, and they fuel various psionic powers you have: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeProtectiveFi]{Protective Field}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePsionicStrik]{Psionic Strike}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeTelekineticM]{Telekinetic Movement}.

Some of your powers expend the Psionic Energy die they use, as specified in a power’s description, and you can’t use a power if it requires you to use a die when your dice are all expended. You regain all your expended Psionic Energy dice when you finish a long rest. In addition, as a bonus action, you can regain one expended Psionic Energy die, but you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeRegainPsioni]).

When you reach certain levels in this class, the size of your Psionic Energy dice increases: at 5th level (d8), 11th level (d10), and 17th level (d12).

Telekinetic Adept.name: Telekinetic Adept
Telekinetic Adept.description: 你已掌握了运用心灵遥控能力的新方法：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePsipoweredLe]{灵能飞跃 Psi-Powered Leap}和@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeTelekineticT]{心灵遥控推力 Telekinetic Thrust}

Deft Explorer.name: Deft Explorer
Deft Explorer.description:
Replaces @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.8fbZt2Qh7ZttwIan]

You are an unsurpassed explorer and survivor, both in the wilderness and in dealing with others on your travels. You gain the Canny benefit below, and you gain an additional benefit below when you reach 6th level and 10th level in this class.

Ranger LevelDeft Explorer Improvement

1st

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeCanny0000000]

6th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeRoving000000]

10th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeTireless0000]

Favored Foe.name: Favored Foe
Favored Foe.description:
取代 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.4Vpj9vCOB37GtXk6]{宿敌 Favored Enemy} 并与 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.3CaP1vFHVR8LgHjx]{宿敌猎杀者 Foe Slayer} 协同生效

当你以攻击检定命中一个生物时，可以呼唤与自然的神秘牵绊，将该目标标记为你的宿敌，持续1分钟或直至你失去专注(如同你正专注于一个法术)。

在你每回合首次命中该宿敌并对其造成伤害时(包括标记它的那次攻击)，你可以使该伤害增加1d4。

你可以使用此特性标记宿敌的次数等于你的熟练加值，且完成一次长休后重新获得所有已使用的次数。

此特性的额外伤害在你达到本职业的特定等级时提升：6级时增至1d6，14级时增至1d8。

damage.condition: Once during your turn, when you hit a creature with an attack

Marked.name: Marked
Marked.description: This creature is marked by a Ranger's @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeranFavoredFo]{Favored Foe} feature and takes extra damage once when attacked by the Ranger on their turn.

tcoeranFightingS.name: 战斗风格选项
tcoeranFightingS.description:
当你选择一个战斗风格时，以下风格会加入你的可选列表。

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeBlindFightin]{盲斗 Blind Fighting}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeDruidicWarri]{德鲁伊武者 Druidic Warrior}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeThrownWeapon]{投掷武器战斗 Thrown Weapon Fighting}

tcoeranMartialVe.name: 替换武术
tcoeranMartialVe.description:
Whenever you reach a level in this class that grants the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.sPy2OLoN7JaAcMl4]{Ability Score Improvement} feature, you can replace a fighting style you know with another fighting style available to rangers. This replacement represents a shift of focus in your martial practice.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.nJA3ISVmyj3uPRVM]{Fighting Style}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeranFightingS]{Fighting Style Options}

Nature's Veil.name: Nature's Veil
Nature's Veil.description:
Replaces @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.r0unvWK0lPsDthDx]

You draw on the powers of nature to hide yourself from view briefly. As a bonus action, you can magically become &Reference[invisible], along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, until the start of your next turn.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Veiled.name: Veiled
Veiled.description: 直到你的下个回合开始前，获得&Reference[invisible]{隐形 Invisible}状态。

Primal Awareness.name: Primal Awareness
Primal Awareness.description:
Replaces @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.kaHcUGiwi8AtfZIm]

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class if you don’t already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don’t count against the number of ranger spells you know.

Primal Awareness Spells

Ranger LevelSpell

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.aL1F8fvYLtNzUbKu]

5th

Beast Sense

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.2VXGS206tuChoeXy]

13th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.gXtzz9t1DTzJeLr4]

17th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.dp6xny4v8PDoIGjh]

You can cast each of these spells once without expending a spell slot. Once you cast a spell in this way, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

Spellcasting Focus.name: Spellcasting Focus
Spellcasting Focus.description: You can use a druidic focus as a spellcasting focus for your ranger spells. A druidic focus might be a sprig of mistletoe or holly, a wand or rod made of yew or another special wood, a staff drawn whole from a living tree, or an object incorporating feathers, fur, bones, and teeth from sacred animals.

Additional Ranger Spells.name: Additional Ranger Spells
Additional Ranger Spells.description:
The spells in the following list expand the ranger spell list in the Player’s Handbook. The list is organized by spell level, not character level. Each spell is in the Player’s Handbook, unless it has an asterisk (a spell in chapter 3). Xanathar’s Guide to Everything also offers more spells.

Level

Spells

1st

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.gMrWeG8fMDPRFiVe]{Entangle}, Searing smite

2nd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Opwh2PdX4runSBlm]{Aid}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9eOZDBImVKxbeOyZ]{Enhance ability}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FSMy6VAjDnXY9vWz]{Gust of wind}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Sgjrf8qqv97CCWM4]{Magic weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonBeast0]{Summon beast*}

3rd

Elemental weapon, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.64uo4fHriHLjRUrX]{Meld into stone}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LmRHHMtplpxr9fX6]{Revivify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonFey000]{Summon fey*}

4th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LrPvWHBPmiMQQsKB]{Dominate beast}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonElemen]{Summon elemental*}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{Greater restoration}

Steady Aim.name: Steady Aim
Steady Aim.description: As a bonus action, you give yourself advantage on your next attack roll on the current turn. You can use this bonus action only if you haven’t moved during this turn, and after you use the bonus action, your speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.

Steady Aim.name: Steady Aim
Steady Aim.description: Your speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.

tcoerunBonusProf.name: 附赠熟练
tcoerunBonusProf.description: You gain proficiency with smith’s tools, and you learn to speak, read, and write Giant.

Giant's Might.name: Giant's Might
Giant's Might.description:
Current max size and damage: [[lookup @scale.rune-knight.size]] [[/damage @scale.rune-knight.die]]

You have learned how to imbue yourself with the might of giants. As a bonus action, you magically gain the following benefits, which last for 1 minute:

  • If you are smaller than Large, you become that size, along with anything you are wearing. If you lack the room to become that size, your size doesn’t change.

  • You have advantage on [[/check ability=str]] checks and [[/save ability=str]] saving throws.

  • Once on each of your turns, one of your attacks with a weapon or an unarmed strike can deal extra 1d6 damage to a target on a hit.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

Imbued Might.name: Imbued Might
Imbued Might.description:
You magically gain the following benefits, which last for 1 minute:

  • If you are smaller than [[/r @scale.rune-knight.size]], you become that size, along with anything you are wearing. If you lack the room to become that size, your size doesn’t change.

  • You have advantage on [[/check ability=str]] checks and [[/save ability=str]] saving throws.

  • Once on each of your turns, one of your attacks with a weapon or an unarmed strike can deal extra damage to a target on a hit: [[/damage @scale.rune-knight.might]]

Great Stature.name: Great Stature
Great Stature.description:
The magic of your runes permanently alters you. When you gain this feature, roll [[/r 3d4#Inches Grown]]. You grow a number of inches in height equal to the roll.

Moreover, the extra damage you deal with your Giant’s Might feature increases to 1d8.

Foundry Note

The die size increase granted to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoerunGiantsMig] is contained within the scale value "@scale.rune-knight.die" and included in Giant's Might damage roll.

Runic Juggernaut.name: Runic Juggernaut
Runic Juggernaut.description:
You learn how to amplify your rune-powered transformation. As a result, the extra damage you deal with the Giant’s Might feature increases to 1d10. Moreover, when you use that feature, your size can increase to Huge, and while you are that size, your &Reference[reach] increases by 5 feet.

Foundry Note

The die size increase granted to @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoerunGiantsMig] is contained within the scale value "@scale.rune-knight.die" and included in Giant's Might damage roll.

Master of Runes.name: Master of Runes
Master of Runes.description: You can invoke each rune you know from your Rune Carver feature twice, rather than once, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

Rune Carver.name: Rune Carver
Rune Carver.description:
当前已知符文数量：[[lookup @scale.rune-knight.runes]]

你可以使用魔法符文来强化你的装备。你从下述符文中选择两个习得，并且每次在本职业升级时，你可以将已知的一个符文替换为本特性中的另一个符文。当你达到本职业的特定等级时，你将习得更多符文，如已知符文表所示。

战士等级已知符文数量

3级

2

7级

3

10级

4

15级

5

每当你完成一次长休，你可以触碰等于已知符文数量的物件，并在每个物件上刻印不同的符文。目标物件必须是武器、护甲、盾牌、珠宝或其他可佩戴或手持的物品。你的符文会持续存在于物件上直至你完成一次长休，且一个物件同一时间只能承载你的一个符文。

习得符文时，你可以从以下符文中选择。若符文有等级要求，你必须达到本职业相应等级才能习得。若符文需要豁免检定，你的符文魔法豁免DC等于8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的体质调整值：[[8 + @prof + @abilities.con.mod]]。

可用符文（当前战士等级：[[lookup @classes.fighter.levels]]）

无要求7级或更高战士等级

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeCloudRune000]{云符文 Cloud Rune}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeHillRune0000]{山丘符文 Hill Rune}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeFireRune0000]{火焰符文 Fire Rune}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeStormRune000]{暴风符文 Storm Rune}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeFrostRune000]{冰霜符文 Frost Rune}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeStoneRune000]{岩石符文 Stone Rune}

Runic Shield.name: Runic Shield
Runic Shield.description:
You learn to invoke your rune magic to protect your allies. When another creature you can see within 60 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to force the attacker to reroll the d20 and use the new roll.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

utility.condition: Another creature you can see within range is hit by an attack

Awakened Spellbook.name: Awakened Spellbook
Awakened Spellbook.description:
Using specially prepared inks and ancient incantations passed down by your wizardly order, you have awakened an arcane sentience within your spellbook.

While you are holding the book, it grants you the following benefits:

  • You can use the book as a spellcasting focus for your wizard spells.

  • When you cast a wizard spell with a spell slot, you can temporarily replace its damage type with a type that appears in another spell in your spellbook, which magically alters the spell’s formula for this casting only. The latter spell must be of the same level as the spell slot you expend.

  • When you cast a wizard spell as a ritual, you can use the spell’s normal casting time, rather than adding 10 minutes to it. Once you use this benefit, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

If necessary, you can replace the book over the course of a short rest by using your Wizardly Quill to write arcane sigils in a blank book or a magic spellbook to which you’re attuned. At the end of the rest, your spellbook’s consciousness is summoned into the new book, which the consciousness transforms into your spellbook, along with all its spells. If the previous book still existed somewhere, all the spells vanish from its pages.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a limited use for easier tracking.

utility.condition: When casting a wizard spell as a ritual

Manifest Mind.name: Manifest Mind
Manifest Mind.description:
You can conjure forth the mind of your Awakened Spellbook. As a bonus action while the book is on your person, you can cause the mind to manifest as a Tiny spectral object, hovering in an unoccupied space of your choice within 60 feet of you. The spectral mind is intangible and doesn’t occupy its space, and it sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius. It looks like a ghostly tome, a cascade of text, or a scholar from the past (your choice).

While manifested, the spectral mind can hear and see, and it has darkvision with a range of 60 feet. The mind can telepathically share with you what it sees and hears (no action required).

Whenever you cast a wizard spell on your turn, you can cast it as if you were in the spectral mind’s space, instead of your own, using its senses. You can do so a number of times per day equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

As a bonus action, you can cause the spectral mind to hover up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you or it can see. It can pass through creatures but not objects.

The spectral mind stops manifesting if it is ever more than 300 feet away from you, if someone casts dispel magic on it, if the Awakened Spellbook is destroyed, if you die, or if you dismiss the spectral mind as a bonus action.

Once you conjure the mind, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a spell slot of any level to conjure it again.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used to summon the Awakened Spellbook and to track uses of the spellcasting ability of this feature. When summoning, uncheck the "Consume Available Usage?" box.

Master Scrivener.name: Master Scrivener
Master Scrivener.description:
Whenever you finish a long rest, you can create one magic scroll by touching your Wizardly Quill to a blank piece of paper or parchment and causing one spell from your Awakened Spellbook to be copied onto the scroll. The spellbook must be within 5 feet of you when you make the scroll.

The chosen spell must be of 1st or 2nd level and must have a casting time of 1 action. Once in the scroll, the spell’s power is enhanced, counting as one level higher than normal. You can cast the spell from the scroll by reading it as an action. The scroll is unintelligible to anyone else, and the spell vanishes from the scroll when you cast it or when you finish your next long rest.

You are also adept at crafting spell scrolls, which are described in the treasure chapter of the Dungeon Master’s Guide. The gold and time you must spend to make such a scroll are halved if you use your Wizardly Quill.

Foundry Note

Right click on a spell in your character sheet and use the "Create Scroll" option. You will also have the opportunity to select a higher level to enhance its power.

One with the Word.name: One with the Word
One with the Word.description:
Your connection to your Awakened Spellbook has become so profound that your soul has become entwined with it. While the book is on your person, you have advantage on all Intelligence (Arcana) checks, as the spellbook helps you remember magical lore.

Moreover, if you take damage while your spellbook’s mind is manifested, you can prevent all of that damage to you by using your reaction to dismiss the spectral mind, using its magic to save yourself. Then roll 3d6. The spellbook temporarily loses spells of your choice that have a combined spell level equal to that roll or higher. For example, if the roll’s total is 9, spells vanish from the book that have a combined level of at least 9, which could mean one 9th-level spell, three 3rd-level spells, or some other combination. If there aren’t enough spells in the book to cover this cost, you drop to 0 hit points.

Until you finish [[/r 1d6]] long rests, you are incapable of casting the lost spells, even if you find them on a scroll or in another spellbook. After you finish the required number of rests, the spells reappear in the spellbook.

Once you use this reaction, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

This feature is marked as a reaction and includes the 3d6 in the "Other" formula but it does not otherwise automate the removal of spells.

utility.condition: When you take damage

Wizardly Quill.name: Wizardly Quill
Wizardly Quill.description:
As a bonus action, you can magically create a Tiny quill in your free hand. The magic quill has the following properties:

  • The quill doesn’t require ink. When you write with it, it produces ink in a color of your choice on the writing surface.

  • The time you must spend to copy a spell into your spellbook equals 2 minutes per spell level if you use the quill for the transcription.

  • You can erase anything you write with the quill if you wave the feather over the text as a bonus action, provided the text is within 5 feet of you.

This quill disappears if you create another one or if you die.

Magical Guidance.name: Magical Guidance
Magical Guidance.description: You can tap into your inner wellspring of magic to try to conjure success from failure. When you make an ability check that fails, you can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll the [[/r d20]], and you must use the new roll, potentially turning the failure into a success.

utility.condition: When you make an ability check that fails

Metamagic Options.name: Metamagic Options
Metamagic Options.description:
当你选择超魔法选项时，你可以使用以下额外选项：

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSeekingSpell]{寻踪法术 Seeking Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeTransmutedSp]{嬗变法术 Transmuted Spell}

Sorcerous Versatility.name: Sorcerous Versatility
Sorcerous Versatility.description:
Whenever you reach a level in this class that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can do one of the following, representing the magic within you flowing in new ways:

  • Replace one of the options you chose for the Metamagic feature with a different Metamagic option available to you.

  • Replace one cantrip you learned from this class’s Spellcasting feature with another cantrip from the sorcerer spell list.

Additional Sorcerer Spells.name: Additional Sorcerer Spells
Additional Sorcerer Spells.description:
The spells in the following list expand the sorcerer spell list in the Player’s Handbook. The list is organized by spell level, not character level. If a spell can be cast as a ritual, the ritual tag appears after the spell’s name. Each spell is in the Player’s Handbook, unless it has an asterisk (a spell in chapter 3). Xanathar’s Guide to Everything also offers more spells.

Level

Spells

Cantrip

Booming Blade, Green-flame Blade, Lightning Lure, Mind Sliver, Sword Burst

1st

Grease, Tasha's Caustic Brew

2nd

Flame Blade, Flaming Sphere, Magic Weapon, Tasha's Mind Whip

3rd

Intellect Fortress, Vampiric Touch

4th

Fire Shield

5th

Bigby's Hand

6th

Flesh to Stone, Otiluke's Freezing Sphere, Tasha's Otherworldly Guise

7th

Dream of the Blue Veil

8th

Demiplane

9th

Blade of Disaster

tcoesouBladesPsy.name: 念刃
tcoesouBladesPsy.description:
You can manifest your psionic power as shimmering blades of psychic energy. Whenever you take the Attack action, you can manifest a [[/item Psychic Blades]]{psychic blade} from your free hand and make the attack with that blade. This magic blade is a simple melee weapon with the finesse and thrown properties. It has a normal range of 60 feet and no long range, and on a hit, it deals psychic damage equal to 1d6 plus the ability modifier you used for the attack roll. The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target, and it leaves no mark on its target if it deals damage.

After you attack with the blade, you can make a melee or ranged weapon attack with a second psychic blade as a bonus action on the same turn, provided your other hand is free to create it. The damage die of this bonus attack is 1d4, instead of 1d6.

Foundry Note

To use this feature you can use the Psychic Blades item that is also granted by this subclass which features the correct properties and action options.

tcoesouPsionicPo.name: 灵能力量
tcoesouPsionicPo.description:
You harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. This energy is represented by your Psionic Energy dice, which are each a d6. You have a number of these dice equal to twice your proficiency bonus (currently, [[lookup @prof]]), and they fuel various psionic powers you have, which are detailed below.

Some of your powers expend the Psionic Energy die they use, as specified in a power’s description, and you can’t use a power if it requires you to use a die when your dice are all expended. You regain all your expended Psionic Energy dice when you finish a long rest. In addition, as a bonus action, you can regain one expended Psionic Energy die, but you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

When you reach certain levels in this class, the size of your Psionic Energy dice increases: at 5th level (d8), 11th level (d10), and 17th level (d12).

The powers below use your Psionic Energy dice and are granted as separate features:

  • [[/item Psi-Bolstered Knack]]

  • [[/item Psychic Whispers]]

Foundry Note

Foundry automatically handles scaling your Psionic Energy die and this feature is used for tracking the number of uses you have remaining.

Psychic Veil.name: Psychic Veil
Psychic Veil.description:
You can weave a veil of psychic static to mask yourself. As an action, you can magically become &Reference[invisible], along with anything you are wearing or carrying, for 1 hour or until you dismiss this effect (no action required). This invisibility ends early immediately after you deal damage to a creature or you force a creature to make a saving throw.

Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to use this feature again.

Foundry Note

To use the "free" usage of this feature uncheck the "Consume Resource?" option. To use the feature by expending a psionic energy die uncheck the "Consume Available Usage?" option.

This feature includes an Active Effect which will add the 'Invisible' status effect to your Token.

Psychic Veil.name: Psychic Veil
Psychic Veil.description: You are magically invisible, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, for 1 hour or until you dismiss this effect (no action required). This invisibility ends early immediately after you deal damage to a creature or you force a creature to make a saving throw.

Rend Mind.name: Rend Mind
Rend Mind.description:
You can sweep your [[/Item Psychic Blades]] directly through a creature’s mind. When you use your Psychic Blades to deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature, you can force that target to make a Wisdom saving throw. If the save fails, the target is &Reference[stunned] for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend three Psionic Energy dice to use it again.

Foundry Note

The stunned effect can be applied by selecting the token and using the "Apply" button above or by using the Active Effect attached to this feature.

To use the "free" usage of this feature uncheck the "Consume Resource?" option. To use the feature by expending a psionic energy die uncheck the "Consume Available Usage?" option.

save.condition: When you use your Psychic Blades to deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature

Mind Rent.name: Mind Rent
Mind Rent.description: The target is &Reference[stunned] for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Soul Blades.name: Soul Blades
Soul Blades.description:
Your Psychic Blades are now an expression of your psi-suffused soul, giving you these powers that use your Psionic Energy dice and which are granted as separate features:

  • [[/item Homing Strikes]]

  • [[/item Psychic Teleportation]]

Fungal Body.name: Fungal Body
Fungal Body.description: The fungal spores in your body alter you: you can’t be &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[frightened], or &Reference[poisoned], and any critical hit against you counts as a normal hit instead, unless you’re &Reference[incapacitated].

Fungal Infestation.name: Fungal Infestation
Fungal Infestation.description:
你的孢子获得侵染尸体并使其活化的能力。若一只小型或中型的野兽或类人生物在你周围10尺内死亡，你可以用你的反应使其活化，令其立即以1点生命值站起。该生物使用《怪物图鉴》中的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW]{丧尸 zombie}资料卡。它会保持活化状态1小时，之后便会倒下死亡。

在战斗中，丧尸的回合紧接在你的回合之后。它服从你的精神命令，且唯一能执行的动作是攻击动作，进行一次近战攻击。

你能使用该特性的次数等于你的感知调整值（至少一次），且当你完成一次长休后，重新获得所有已使用的次数。

summon.condition: A certain type of creature dies within range

Halo of Spores.name: Halo of Spores
Halo of Spores.description:
You are surrounded by invisible, necrotic spores that are harmless until you unleash them on a creature nearby. When a creature you can see moves into a space within 10 feet of you or starts its turn there, you can use your reaction to deal 1d4 necrotic damage to that creature unless it succeeds on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC.

The necrotic damage increases to 1d6 at 6th level, 1d8 at 10th level, and 1d10 at 14th level.

save.condition: A visible creature moves or starts within range

Circle Spells.name: Circle Spells
Circle Spells.description:
Your symbiotic link to fungi and your ability to tap into the cycle of life and death grants you access to certain spells. At 2nd level, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.vrN18tbTw7io5MWd]{chill touch} cantrip.

At 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th level you gain access to the spells listed for that level in the Circle of Spores Spells table. Once you gain access to one of these spells, you always have it prepared, and it doesn’t count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. If you gain access to a spell that doesn’t appear on the druid spell list, the spell is nonetheless a druid spell for you.

Circle of Spores Spells

Druid LevelSpells

2nd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.vrN18tbTw7io5MWd]{chill touch}

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zwGsAv6kmwzYGhh3]{blindness/deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.n4JDcFKe5ikzYmAc]{gentle repose}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.oyE5nVppa5mde5gT]{animate dead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz]{gaseous form}

7th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y]{blight}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{confusion}

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LkvI11Uue774QBKZ]{cloudkill}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CjIq8Ed7bu3vVwT1]{contagion}

Spreading Spores.name: Spreading Spores
Spreading Spores.description:
You gain the ability to seed an area with deadly spores. As a bonus action while your Symbiotic Entity feature is active, you can hurl spores up to 30 feet away, where they swirl in a 10-foot cube for 1 minute. The spores disappear early if you use this feature again, if you dismiss them as a bonus action, or if your Symbiotic Entity feature is no longer active.

Whenever a creature moves into the cube or starts its turn there, that creature takes your Halo of Spores damage, unless the creature succeeds on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature can take this damage no more than once per turn.

While the cube of spores persists, you can’t use your Halo of Spores reaction.

Symbiotic Entity.name: Symbiotic Entity
Symbiotic Entity.description:
You gain the ability to channel magic into your spores. As an action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to awaken those spores, rather than transforming into a beast form, and you gain 4 temporary hit points for each level you have in this class. While this feature is active, you gain the following benefits:

  • When you deal your Halo of Spores damage, roll the damage die a second time and add it to the total.

  • Your melee weapon attacks deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage to any target they hit.

These benefits last for 10 minutes, until you lose all these temporary hit points, or until you use your Wild Shape again.

Symbiotic Bonuses.name: Symbiotic Bonuses
Symbiotic Bonuses.description:
• When you deal your Halo of Spores damage, roll the damage die a second time and add it to the total.

  • Your melee weapon attacks deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage to any target they hit.

Cosmic Omen.name: Cosmic Omen
Cosmic Omen.description:
每当你完成一次长休后，你可以查阅你的星图以获取预兆。当你这样做时，投掷一次[[/r 1d2#Weal (even) or Woe (odd)]]{骰子 die}。直到你完成下一次长休前，根据你投出的骰子结果是偶数还是奇数，你将获得一个特殊的反应：

吉兆 (偶数). 每当你身边30尺内一个你能看见的生物即将进行一次攻击检定、豁免或属性检定时，你可以用你的反应投掷一枚d6，并将投出的数值加到总结果中。

凶兆 (奇数). 每当你身边30尺内一个你能看见的生物即将进行一次攻击检定、豁免或属性检定时，你可以用你的反应投掷一枚d6，并从总结果中减去投出的数值。

你可以使用此反应的次数等于你的熟练加值，并且当你完成一次长休后，重新获得所有已使用的次数。

Foundry 注

你可以使用密文块来追踪哪个反应可用。隐藏的块不会出现在聊天卡片中。

utility.condition: A creature in range is about to make a certain roll

Full of Stars.name: Full of Stars
Full of Stars.description: 处于你的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoestaStarryFor]{星界形态 Starry Form}时，你会变得部分虚体化，使你获得对钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的&Reference[damageresistance]{抗性 resistance}。

Star Map.name: Star Map
Star Map.description:
You’ve created a star chart as part of your heavenly studies. It is a Tiny object and can serve as a spellcasting focus for your druid spells. You determine its form by rolling on the Star Map table or by choosing one.

While holding this map, you have these benefits:

  • You know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.P7mF2MxSuVJwHRRY]{guidance} cantrip.

  • You have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7buEm5KhI5lP8m1z]{guiding bolt} spell prepared. It counts as a druid spell for you, and it doesn’t count against the number of spells you can have prepared.

  • You can cast guiding bolt without expending a spell slot. You can do so a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

If you lose the map, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to magically create a replacement. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and it destroys the previous map.

Star Map

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeStarMapForm0 caption=false]

Starry Form.name: Starry Form
Starry Form.description:
作为附赠动作，你可以消耗一次荒野形态的使用次数来呈现星界形态，而非变形为野兽。

处于星界形态时，你保留你的游戏资料卡，但你的身体变得发光；你的关节如星辰般闪烁，发光的线条如同星图般将它们连接起来。此形态散发出10尺半径的明亮光照和额外10尺的微光光照。该形态持续10分钟。如果你主动解除（无需动作）、陷入失能、死亡或再次使用此特性，则形态提前结束。

每当你呈现星界形态时，选择以下哪个星座在你身上闪耀；你的选择会在此形态下赋予你特定效益：

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeStarryarcher]{弓箭手 Archer}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeStarrychalic]{圣杯 Chalice}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeStarrydragon]{龙类 Dragon}

Foundry 注

在14级时，此特性@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoestaFullOfSta]{提升 improves}为在此形态下同时获得伤害抗性。为此，提供了一个可根据角色当前德鲁伊等级激活的主动效应。

Twinkling Constellations.name: Twinkling Constellations
Twinkling Constellations.description:
The constellations of your Starry Form improve. The 1d8 of the Archer and the Chalice becomes 2d8, and while the Dragon is active, you have a flying speed of 20 feet and can hover.

Moreover, at the start of each of your turns while in your Starry Form, you can change which constellation glimmers on your body.

Mighty Swarm.name: Mighty Swarm
Mighty Swarm.description:
你的集群在以下方面变得更加强大：

  • 集群的伤害扩展至1d8。

  • 若生物对抗集群移动的豁免失败，你还能使集群令该生物&Reference[prone]。

  • 当你被集群移动时，它会为你提供&Reference[half-cover]直至你的下个回合开始。

Foundry 注

选择激活该特性的命中效果时，可运用此特性替代 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeGatheredSwar]{集群 Gathered Swarm}。

save.condition: Once on each of your turns, after hitting with an attack

Swarm Protection.name: Swarm Protection
Swarm Protection.description: You are protected by &Reference[half-cover] until the start of your next turn.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If a creature fails its saving throw against being moved by Gathered Swarm, you can also cause the swarm to knock the creature &Reference[prone].

Swarmkeeper Magic.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
Swarmkeeper Magic.description:
You learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]{mage hand} cantrip if you don’t already know it. When you cast it, the hand takes the form of your swarming nature spirits.

You also learn an additional spell of 1st level or higher when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Swarmkeeper Spells table. Each spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn’t count against the number of ranger spells you know.

Swarmkeeper Spells

Ranger LevelSpell

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.UJJu9c2UvCzVljiP]

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz]

13th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ImlCJQwR1VL40Qem]

17th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.OVikYmSdHliAG2YD]

Swarming Dispersal.name: Swarming Dispersal
Swarming Dispersal.description:
你可以分解成你的集群，以规避风险。当你受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应使自身获得对该伤害的&Reference[damageresistance]{抗性 resistance}。你会消失在集群中，随后传送到一个你能看见的30尺内未占据空间，并在该处与集群一同重现。

你能使用该特性的次数等于你的熟练加值，且你在完成一次长休后重新获得所有已使用的次数。

utility.condition: When you take damage

Writhing Tide.name: Writhing Tide
Writhing Tide.description:
You can condense part of your swarm into a focused mass that lifts you up. As a bonus action, you gain a flying speed of 10 feet and can hover. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until you are incapacitated.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Writhing.name: Writhing
Writhing.description: 你获得10尺的&Reference[flying]{飞行速度 flying speed}并且可以悬停。此效果持续1分钟或直到你&Reference[incapacitated]{失能 incapacitated}。

tcoetwiBonusProf.name: 附赠熟练
tcoetwiBonusProf.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

tcoetwiDivineStr.name: 神圣打击
tcoetwiDivineStr.description:
[[/damage @scale.twilight-domain.die type=radiant]]{骰神圣打击伤害 Roll Divine Strike damage}

你获得将神圣能量注入武器打击的能力。在你的每个回合中一次，当你以武器攻击命中一个生物时，你可以使该攻击造成额外1d8光耀伤害。当你达到14级时，额外伤害扩展至2d8。

damage.condition: Once on your turn when you hit with a weapon

Eyes of Night.name: Eyes of Night
Eyes of Night.description:
你能看穿最深沉的黑暗。你拥有300尺范围的{黑暗视觉 darkvision}。在此{半径}内，你能在{微光光照 dim light}中视物如同{明亮光照 bright light}，在{黑暗术 darkness}中视物如同{微光光照 dim light}。

通过一个{动作}，你可以魔法性地将此{特性}的{黑暗视觉 darkvision}分享给10尺内你能看见的自愿{生物}，数量{等于}你的[[max(@abilities.wis.mod, 1)]]{感知调整值 Wisdom modifier}（至少{单一生物 one creature}）。共享的{黑暗视觉 darkvision}持续1{小时}。一旦你分享了它，直至完成一次长休前，你都无法再次使用它，除非你消耗任意环阶的{法术位 spell slot}来再次分享。

Eyes of Night.name: Eyes of Night
Eyes of Night.description: You have &Reference[darkvision] out to a range of 300 feet.

Shared Sight.name: Shared Sight
Shared Sight.description: You gain &Reference[darkvision] out to a range of 300 feet for 1 hour.

Twilight Shroud.name: Twilight Shroud
Twilight Shroud.description: The twilight that you summon offers a protective embrace: you and your allies have &Reference[half-cover] while in the sphere created by your @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoetwiTwilightS]{Twilight Sanctuary}.

Shrouded.name: Shrouded
Shrouded.description: You are protected by &Reference[half-cover] while inside the Cleric's @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoetwiTwilightS]{Twilight Sanctuary}.

tcoetwiSpells000.name: 领域法术
tcoetwiSpells000.description:
你在牧师等级达到暮光领域法术表中所列等级时获得领域法术。关于领域法术的运作方式，请参阅 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.x637K2Icp2ZFM1TB]{神圣领域 Divine Domain} 职业特性。

暮光领域法术

牧师等级法术

1环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]{妖火 faerie fire}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.KhwiSi9fwVfUPtku]{睡眠术 sleep}

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.bV3yun6MIuFj71Er]{月华之光 Moonbeam}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DQzlB5Y3k791W5bH]{识破隐形 see invisibility}

5环

{活力灵光 aura of vitality}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.NXWWWgHtWb7Nv21F]{李欧蒙小屋 Leomund's Tiny Hut}

7环

{生命灵光 aura of life}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ]{高等隐形术 greater invisibility}

9环

{原力法阵 circle of power}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MBMaQLwoy05qzMJ3]{假象术 mislead}

Steps of Night.name: Steps of Night
Steps of Night.description: You can draw on the mystical power of night to rise into the air. As a bonus action when you are in dim light or darkness, you can magically give yourself a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 minute. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary.name: Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary
Channel Divinity: Twilight Sanctuary.description:
你可以使用你的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Item.YpiLQEKGalROn7iJ]{引导神力 Channel Divinity}用抚慰的暮光恢复你的盟友。

以一个动作，你展示你的圣徽，一个暮光球体从你身上散发出来。该球体以你为中心，半径为30尺，并充满微光光照。该球体随你移动，持续1分钟或直到你&Reference[incapacitated]或死亡。每当一个生物(包括你)在该球体内结束其回合，你可以授予该生物以下一项效益：

  • 你授予其临时生命值等于[[/r 1d6 + @classes.cleric.levels]]{1d6加你的牧师等级}。

  • 你结束其身上一个导致其被&Reference[charmed]或&Reference[frightened]的效应。

Vigilant Blessing.name: Vigilant Blessing
Vigilant Blessing.description: The night has taught you to be vigilant. As an action, you give one creature you touch (including possibly yourself) advantage on the next initiative roll the creature makes. This benefit ends immediately after the roll or if you use this feature again.

Vigilant Blessing.name: Vigilant Blessing
Vigilant Blessing.description: You have advantage on your next initiative roll.

Eldritch Versatility.name: Eldritch Versatility
Eldritch Versatility.description:
Whenever you reach a level in this class that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can do one of the following, representing a change of focus in your occult studies:

  • Replace one cantrip you learned from this class’s Pact Magic feature with another cantrip from the warlock spell list.

  • Replace the option you chose for the Pact Boon feature with one of that feature’s other options.

  • If you’re 12th level or higher, replace one spell from your Mystic Arcanum feature with another warlock spell of the same level.

If this change makes you ineligible for any of your Eldritch Invocations, you must also replace them now, choosing invocations for which you qualify.

Pact Boon Option.name: Pact Boon Option
Pact Boon Option.description:
当你选择你的魔契恩泽特性时，以下选项对你可用：

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoePactOfTheTal]{护符魔契 Pact of the Talisman}

Additional Warlock Spells.name: Additional Warlock Spells
Additional Warlock Spells.description:
以下列表中的法术扩展了《玩家手册》中的魔契师法术列表。该列表按法术环阶而非角色等级排列。除非带有星号(第三章中的法术)，否则每个法术均出自《玩家手册》。《艾伯伦：从终末战争到废墟》也提供了更多法术。

环阶

法术

戏法

轰雷剑 Booming Blade, 翠炎剑 Green-flame Blade, 闪电牵引 Lightning Lure, 心灵穿刺 Mind Sliver, 剑刃爆发 Sword Burst

3环

心智堡垒 Intellect fortress *, 精魄缠身 Spirit shroud *, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoeSummonFey000]{召唤精类生物 Summon fey} *, 召唤影灵 Summon shadowspawn *, 召唤亡灵 Summon undead *

4环

召唤异怪 Summon Aberration

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MBMaQLwoy05qzMJ3]{假象术 Mislead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.42O2aNBW7vK90gTL]{异界誓缚 Planar binding}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8aWtP5hcrmcEesBW]{传送法阵 Teleportation circle}

6环

召唤邪魔 Summon Fiend, 塔莎异界斗篷 Tasha's Otherworldly Guise

7环

蔚蓝梦界 Dream of the Blue Veil

9环

灾厄黑刃 Blade of disaster *, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XbwGq5kDJNvAxNXV]{异界之门 Gate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Wl2vtJ4hCt2tpWfR]{怪影杀手 Weird}

Aura of the Sentinel.name: Aura of the Sentinel
Aura of the Sentinel.description:
You emit an aura of alertness while you aren’t &Reference[incapacitated]. When you and any creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you roll initiative, you all gain a bonus to initiative equal to your proficiency bonus (currently, [[lookup @prof]]).

At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature will automatically apply the movement increase to your Actor but the aura functionality is not automated for other creatures though the Active Effect can also be applied to them.

Alertness.name: Alertness
Alertness.description: When you and any creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you roll initiative, you all gain a bonus to initiative equal to your proficiency bonus. At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

tcoewatChannelDi.name: 引导神力
tcoewatChannelDi.description: You gain the following Channel Divinity options. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how Channel Divinity works.

Mortal Bulwark.name: Mortal Bulwark
Mortal Bulwark.description:
You manifest a spark of divine power in defense of the mortal realms. As a bonus action, you gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

  • You gain &Reference[truesight] with a range of 120 feet.

  • You have advantage on attack rolls against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, and fiends.

  • When you hit a creature with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also force it to make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the creature is magically banished to its native plane of existence if it’s currently not there. On a successful save, the creature can’t be banished by this feature for 24 hours.

Once you use this bonus action, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a 5th-level spell slot to use it again.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that grants you truesight but does not automate the other benefits. This feature also includes the Charisma saving throw.

Mortal Bulwark.name: Mortal Bulwark
Mortal Bulwark.description: You gain truesight with a range of 120 feet.

tcoewatSpells000.name: 圣誓法术
tcoewatSpells000.description:
你在圣武士等级获得守望者誓约法术表中列出的誓约法术。关于誓约法术的运作方式，请参阅神圣誓约职业特性。

圣武士等级

法术

3环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7p9IuWrSWFgfyQo2]{警报术 Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic}

5环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.bV3yun6MIuFj71Er]{月华之光 Moonbeam}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DQzlB5Y3k791W5bH]{识破隐形 See Invisibility}

9环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy]{法术反制 Counterspell}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.aU62xVUBYkAQWIHv]{回避侦测 Nondetection}

13环

净化灵光 Aura of Purity, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf]{放逐术 Banishment}

17环

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.l9Ju5KE7bbn3WpTm]{怪物定身术 Hold Monster}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.fVbCxFRaORalHB20]{探知 Scrying}

Vigilant Rebuke.name: Vigilant Rebuke
Vigilant Rebuke.description:
You’ve learned how to chastise anyone who dares wield beguilements against you and your wards. Whenever you or a creature you can see within 30 feet of you succeeds on an Intelligence, a Wisdom, or a Charisma saving throw, you can use your reaction to deal 2d8 + your Charisma modifier force damage to the creature that forced the saving throw.

Foundry Note

The damage is implemented in this feature.

damage.condition: Whenever you or a creature you can see within 30 feet succeeds on an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw

Blazing Revival.name: Blazing Revival
Blazing Revival.description:
The bond with your wildfire spirit can save you from death. If the spirit is within 120 feet of you when you are reduced to 0 hit points and thereby fall unconscious, you can cause the spirit to drop to 0 hit points. You then regain half your hit points and immediately rise to your feet.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.

heal.condition: If your spirit is within range when you reach 0 HP

Bolstering Magic.name: Bolstering Magic
Bolstering Magic.description:
You can harness your wild magic to bolster yourself or a companion. As an action, you can touch one creature (which can be yourself) and confer one of the following benefits of your choice to that creature:

  • For 10 minutes, the creature can roll a d3 whenever making an attack roll or an ability check and add the number rolled to the d20 roll.

  • Roll a [[/r 1d3#Recovered Spell Slot Level]]{d3}. The creature regains one expended spell slot, the level of which equals the number rolled or lower (the creature’s choice). Once a creature receives this benefit, that creature can’t receive it again until after a long rest.

You can take this action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Bolstered.name: Bolstered
Bolstered.description: For 10 minutes, you can roll a d3 whenever making an attack roll or an ability check and add the number rolled to the d20 roll.

Cauterizing Flames.name: Cauterizing Flames
Cauterizing Flames.description:
You gain the ability to turn death into magical flames that can heal or incinerate. When a Small or larger creature dies within 30 feet of you or your wildfire spirit, a harmless spectral flame springs forth in the dead creature’s space and flickers there for 1 minute. When a creature you can see enters that space, you can use your reaction to extinguish the spectral flame there and either heal the creature or deal fire damage to it. The healing or damage equals 2d10 + your Wisdom modifier.

You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking creatures which died within range.

damage.condition: When a visible creatures enters a spectral flame space

utility.condition: When a visible creatures enters a spectral flame space

Cauterized Flames.name: Cauterized Flames
Cauterized Flames.description:
This effect is for tracking small or larger creatures which were within 30 feet of you when they died. When a creature you can see enters that space, you can use your reaction to extinguish the spectral flame there and either heal the creature or deal fire damage to it. The healing or damage equals 2d10 + your Wisdom modifier.

You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Controlled Surge.name: Controlled Surge
Controlled Surge.description: Whenever you roll on the Wild Magic table, you can roll the die twice and choose which of the two effects to unleash. If you roll the same number on both dice, you can ignore the number and choose any effect on the table.

Enhanced Bond.name: Enhanced Bond
Enhanced Bond.description:
你与你的野火精魄之间的牵绊强化了你的毁灭与恢复法术。每当你施展一个造成火焰伤害或恢复生命值的法术且你的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-character-options.Item.tcoewilSummonWil]{野火精魄 wildfire spirit}被召唤时，投掷一次[[/r 1d8#火焰或治疗加值]]{d8}，你获得等于骰出数值的加值，将其应用于该法术的一次伤害或治疗骰。

此外，当你施展一个射程非自身的法术时，该法术可以源自你或你的野火精魄。

utility.condition: When you cast a fire or healing spell while your spirit is summoned

Magic Awareness.name: Magic Awareness
Magic Awareness.description:
As an action, you can open your awareness to the presence of concentrated magic. Until the end of your next turn, you know the location of any spell or magic item within 60 feet of you that isn’t behind &Reference[total-cover]. When you sense a spell, you learn which school of magic it belongs to.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

tcoewilSpells000.name: 结社法术
tcoewilSpells000.description:
You have formed a bond with a wildfire spirit, a primal being of creation and destruction. Your link with this spirit grants you access to some spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the Circle of Wildfire Spells table.

Once you gain access to one of these spells, you always have it prepared, and it doesn’t count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. If you gain access to a spell that doesn’t appear on the druid spell list, the spell is nonetheless a druid spell for you.

Circle of Wildfire Spells

Druid LevelSpells

2nd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5SuJewoa1CRWaj1F]{burning hands}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP]{cure wounds}

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FjYE214HTERCRZNm]{flaming sphere}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7u2obDvuvtZBkTfq]{scorching ray}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.YWtwzp6ZnQJMEmVW]{plant growth}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.LmRHHMtplpxr9fX6]{revivify}

7th

aura of life, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.avD5XUtkBPQQR97c]{fire shield}

9th

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4]{flame strike}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Pyzmm8R7rVsNAPsd]{mass cure wounds}

Summon Wildfire Spirit.name: Summon Wildfire Spirit
Summon Wildfire Spirit.description:
你可以召唤与你灵魂绑定的原始精魄。以一个动作，你可以消耗一次{荒野形态 Wild Shape}特性的使用次数来召唤你的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-actors.Actor.tcoeWildfireSpir]{野火精魄}，而非变身为野兽形态。

精魄出现在你周围30尺内你能看见且{未占据 unoccupied}的空间中。当它出现时，其周围10尺内除你以外的每个生物必须进行一次对抗你{法术豁免DC spell save DC}的{敏捷豁免 Dexterity saving throw}，若失败则受到2d6火焰伤害。

该精魄对你和你的同伴保持友善，并服从你的命令。其游戏数据详见{野火精魄 wildfire spirit}{资料卡 stat block}，其中多处使用你的{熟练加值 PB}。你可以决定精魄的外形——有些精魄会呈现为被火焰缠绕的扭曲树枝构成的{类人生物 humanoid}形态，有些则形似被烈火包裹的野兽。

战斗中，精魄共享你的{先攻值 initiative count}，但在你的回合结束后立即行动。它在自己回合内仅能执行{回避 Dodge}{动作 Action}，除非你在自己回合使用{附赠动作 Bonus Action}命令它执行其他动作。该动作可以是其资料卡中列出的动作或其他任意动作。若你陷入{失能 Incapacitated}状态，精魄可以选择执行任何动作，不仅限于{回避 Dodge}。

精魄会持续存在1小时，直到其{生命值 hit points}降至0、你再次使用此特性召唤精魄或你死亡为止。

Unstable Backlash.name: Unstable Backlash
Unstable Backlash.description: 当你在狂暴中陷入险境时，你体内的魔法可能爆发；在你狂暴期间受到伤害或豁免失败后，你可以立即用你的反应在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeWildMagicEru]{狂野魔法 Wild Magic}表上掷骰并立即产生掷出的效果。此效果会取代你当前的狂野魔法效果。

utility.condition: When taking damage or failing a save while raging

Wild Surge.name: Wild Surge
Wild Surge.description:
The magical energy roiling inside you sometimes erupts from you. When you enter your rage, roll on the Wild Magic table to determine the magical effect produced.

If the effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-tashas-cauldron.tcoe-tables.RollTable.tcoeWildMagicEru]

utility.condition: When you enter your rage

Cantrip Formulas.name: Cantrip Formulas
Cantrip Formulas.description: You have scribed a set of arcane formulas in your spellbook that you can use to formulate a cantrip in your mind. Whenever you finish a long rest and consult those formulas in your spellbook, you can replace one wizard cantrip you know with another cantrip from the wizard spell list.

Additional Wizard Spells.name: Additional Wizard Spells
Additional Wizard Spells.description:
The spells in the following list expand the wizard spell list in the Player’s Handbook. The list is organized by spell level, not character level. A spell’s school of magic is noted, and if a spell can be cast as a ritual, the ritual tag appears after the spell’s name. Each spell is in the Player’s Handbook, unless it has an asterisk (a spell in chapter 3). Xanathar’s Guide to Everything also offers more spells.

Level

Spells

Cantrip

Booming Blade, Green-flame Blade, Lightning Lure, Mind Sliver, Sword Burst

1st

Tasha's Caustic Brew

2nd

Augury, Enhance Ability, Tasha's Mind Whip

3rd

Intellect Fortress, Speak with Dead, Spirit Shroud, Summon Fey, Summon Shadowspawn, Summon Undead

4th

Divination, Summon Aberration, Summon Construct, Summon Elemental

6th

Summon Fiend, Tasha's Otherworldy Guise

7th

Dream of the Blue Veil

9th

Blade of Disaster
